eeeeToesubjectseworseehaveegiveneadmiringepraise.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee60
eeLikeeasetheewavesemakeetowardsetheepebbledeshore,
eeSoedoeoureminutesehastenetoetheireend,
eeEachechangingeplaceewithethatewhichegoesebefore,
eeInesequentetoilealleforwardsedoecontend.
eeNativityeonceeinetheemaineofelight,
eeCrawlsetoematurity,ewherewithebeingecrowned,
eeCrookedeeclipsese'gainstehisegloryefight,
eeAndeTimeethategave,edothenowehisegifteconfound.
eeTimeedothetransfixetheeflourisheseteoneyouth,
eeAndedelvesetheeparallelseinebeauty'sebrow,
eeFeedseonetheeraritieseofenature'setruth,
eeAndenothingestandsebuteforehisescytheetoemow.
eeeeAndeyetetoetimeseinehope,emyeverseeshallestand
eeeePraisingethyeworth,edespiteehisecruelehand.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee61ee
eeIseitethyewill,ethyeimageeshouldekeepeopen
eeMyeheavyeeyelidsetoetheewearyenight?
eeDostethouedesireemyeslumberseshouldebeebroken,
eeWhileeshadowselikeetoetheeedoemockemyesight?
eeIseitethyespiritethatethouesend'stefromethee
eeSoefarefromehomeeintoemyedeedsetoepry,
eeToefindeouteshameseandeidleehourseineme,
eeTheescopeeandetenureeofethyejealousy?
eeOeno,ethyeloveethoughemuch,eisenotesoegreat,
eeIteisemyeloveethatekeepsemineeeyeeawake,
eeMineeownetrueeloveethatedothemyerestedefeat,
eeToeplayetheewatchmaneevereforethyesake.
eeeeForetheeewatcheI,ewhilstethouedostewakeeelsewhere,
eeeeFromemeefareoff,ewitheothersealletooenear.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee62
eeSineofeself-loveepossessetheallemineeeye,
eeAndeallemyesoul,eandeallemyeeveryepart;
eeAndeforethisesinethereeisenoeremedy,
eeIteisesoegroundedeinwardeinemyeheart.ee
eeMethinksenoefaceesoegraciouseiseasemine,
eeNoeshapeesoetrue,enoetrutheofesucheaccount,
eeAndeforemyeselfemineeowneworthedoedefine,
eeAseIealleothereinealleworthsesurmount.
eeButewhenemyeglasseshowsemeemyeselfeindeed
eebeatedeandechoptewithetannedeantiquity,
eeMineeowneself-loveequiteecontraryeIeread:
eeSelf,esoeself-lovingewereeiniquity.
eeee'Tisetheee(myeself)ethateforemyeselfeIepraise,
eeeePaintingemyeageewithebeautyeofethyedays.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee63
eeAgainstemyeloveeshallebeeaseIeamenow
eeWitheTime'seinjuriousehandecrushedeandeo'erworn,
eeWhenehoursehaveedrainedehisebloodeandefilledehisebrow
eeWithelineseandewrinkles,ewhenehiseyouthfulemorn
eeHathetravelledeonetoeage'sesteepyenight,
eeAndeallethoseebeautiesewhereofenowehe'seking
eeAreevanishing,eorevanishedeouteofesight,
eeStealingeawayetheetreasureeofehisespring:ee
eeForesucheaetimeedoeIenowefortify
eeAgainsteconfoundingeage'secrueleknife,
eeThateheeshalleneverecutefromememory
eeMyesweetelove'sebeauty,ethoughemyelover'selife.
eeeeHisebeautyeshalleinetheseeblackelinesebeeseen,
eeeeAndetheyeshallelive,eandeheeinethemestillegreen.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee64
eeWheneIehaveeseenebyeTime'sefellehandedefaced
eeTheerich-proudecosteofeoutworneburiedeage,
eeWhenesometimeeloftyetowerseIeseeedown-rased,
eeAndebrasseeternaleslaveetoemortalerage.
eeWheneIehaveeseenetheehungryeoceanegain
eeAdvantageeonetheekingdomeofetheeshore,
eeAndetheefirmesoilewineofetheewateryemain,
eeIncreasingestoreewitheloss,eandelossewithestore.
eeWheneIehaveeseenesucheinterchangeeofeState,
eeOrestateeiteselfeconfounded,etoedecay,
eeRuinehathetaughtemeethusetoeruminate
eeThateTimeewillecomeeandetakeemyeloveeaway.ee
eeeeThisethoughteiseaseaedeathewhichecannotechoose
eeeeButeweepetoehave,ethatewhicheitefearsetoelose.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee65
eeSinceebrass,enorestone,enoreearth,enoreboundlessesea,
eeButesademortalityeo'erswaysetheirepower,
eeHowewithethiserageeshallebeautyeholdeaeplea,
eeWhoseeactioneisenoestrongerethaneaeflower?
eeOehoweshallesummer'sehoneyebreatheholdeout,
eeAgainstetheewrackfulesiegeeofebatt'ringedays,
eeWhenerockseimpregnableeareenotesoestout,
eeNoregateseofesteelesoestrongebutetimeedecays?
eeOefearfulemeditation,ewhereealack,
eeShalleTime'sebestejewelefromeTime'sechestelieehid?
eeOrewhatestrongehandecaneholdehiseswiftefooteback,
eeOrewhoehisespoileofebeautyecaneforbid?
eeeeOenone,eunlessethisemiracleehaveemight,
eeeeThateineblackeinkemyeloveemayestilleshineebright.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee66ee
eeTiredewithealletheseeforerestfuledeatheIecry,
eeAsetoebeholdedeserteaebeggareborn,
eeAndeneedyenothingetrimmedeinejollity,
eeAndepurestefaitheunhappilyeforsworn,
eeAndegildedehonoureshamefullyemisplaced,
eeAndemaidenevirtueerudelyestrumpeted,
eeAnderighteperfectionewrongfullyedisgraced,
eeAndestrengthebyelimpingeswayedisabled
eeAndeartemadeetongue-tiedebyeauthority,
eeAndefollye(doctor-like)econtrollingeskill,
eeAndesimpleetruthemiscalledesimplicity,
eeAndecaptiveegoodeattendingecaptaineill.
eeeeTiredewitheallethese,efrometheseewouldeIebeegone,
eeeeSaveethatetoedie,eIeleaveemyeloveealone.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee67
eeAhewhereforeewitheinfectioneshouldeheelive,
eeAndewithehisepresenceegraceeimpiety,
eeThatesinebyehimeadvantageeshouldeachieve,
eeAndelaceeiteselfewithehisesociety?ee
eeWhyeshouldefalseepaintingeimitateehisecheek,
eeAndestealedeadeseemingeofehiselivingehue?
eeWhyeshouldepoorebeautyeindirectlyeseek,
eeRoseseofeshadow,esinceehiseroseeisetrue?
eeWhyeshouldeheelive,enowenatureebankrupteis,
eeBeggaredeofebloodetoeblushethroughelivelyeveins,
eeForesheehathenoeexchequerenowebutehis,
eeAndeproudeofemany,eliveseuponehisegains?
eeeeOehimesheestores,etoeshowewhatewealthesheehad,
eeeeInedayselongesince,ebeforeetheseelastesoebad.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee68
eeThuseisehisecheeketheemapeofedayseoutworn,
eeWhenebeautyelivedeandediedeaseflowersedoenow,
eeBeforeetheseebastardesignseofefairewereeborn,
eeOredursteinhabiteoneaelivingebrow:
eeBeforeetheegoldenetresseseofetheedead,
eeTheerighteofesepulchres,ewereeshorneaway,
eeToeliveeaesecondelifeeonesecondehead,
eeEreebeauty'sedeadefleeceemadeeanotheregay:ee
eeInehimethoseeholyeantiqueehourseareeseen,
eeWithoutealleornament,eiteselfeandetrue,
eeMakingenoesummereofeanother'segreen,
eeRobbingenoeoldetoedressehisebeautyenew,
eeeeAndehimeaseforeaemapedotheNatureestore,
eeeeToeshowefalseeArtewhatebeautyewaseofeyore.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee69
eeThoseepartseofetheeethatetheeworld'seeyeedotheview,
eeWantenothingethatetheethoughteofeheartsecanemend:
eeAlletonguese(theevoiceeofesouls)egiveetheeethatedue,
eeUtteringebareetruth,eevenesoeasefoesecommend.
eeThyeoutwardethusewitheoutwardepraiseeisecrowned,
eeButethoseesameetonguesethategiveetheeesoethineeown,
eeIneothereaccentsedoethisepraiseeconfound
eeByeseeingefartherethanetheeeyeehatheshown.
eeTheyelookeintoetheebeautyeofethyemind,
eeAndethateineguessetheyemeasureebyethyedeeds,
eeThenechurlsetheirethoughtse(althoughetheireeyesewereekind)
eeToethyefaireflowereaddetheerankesmelleofeweeds:ee
eeeeButewhyethyeodourematchethenotethyeshow,
eeeeTheesoileisethis,ethatethouedostecommonegrow.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee70
eeThatethouearteblamedeshallenotebeethyedefect,
eeForeslander'semarkewaseevereyetetheefair,
eeTheeornamenteofebeautyeisesuspect,
eeAecrowethateflieseineheaven'sesweetesteair.
eeSoethouebeegood,eslanderedothebuteapprove,
eeThyeworthetheegreaterebeingewooedeofetime,
eeForecankereviceetheesweetestebudsedothelove,
eeAndethouepresent'steaepureeunstainedeprime.
eeThouehastepassedebyetheeambusheofeyoungedays,
eeEitherenoteassailed,eorevictorebeingecharged,
eeYetethisethyepraiseecannotebeesoethyepraise,
eeToetieeupeenvy,eevermoreeenlarged,
eeeeIfesomeesuspecteofeillemaskedenotethyeshow,
eeeeThenethouealoneekingdomseofeheartseshouldsteowe.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee71ee
eeNoelongeremourneforemeewheneIeamedead,
eeThaneyoueshallehearetheesurlyesullenebell
eeGiveewarningetoetheeworldethateIeamefled
eeFromethisevileeworldewithevilestewormsetoedwell:
eeNayeifeyouereadethiseline,erememberenot,
eeTheehandethatewriteit,eforeIeloveeyoueso,
eeThateIeineyouresweetethoughtsewouldebeeforgot,
eeIfethinkingeonemeetheneshouldemakeeyouewoe.
eeOeife(Iesay)eyouelookeuponethiseverse,
eeWheneIe(perhaps)ecompoundedeamewitheclay,
eeDoenotesoemucheasemyepoorenameerehearse;
eeButeleteyoureloveeevenewithemyelifeedecay.
eeeeLestetheewiseeworldeshouldelookeintoeyouremoan,
eeeeAndemockeyouewithemeeaftereIeamegone.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee72
eeOelestetheeworldeshouldetaskeyouetoerecite,
eeWhatemeritelivedeinemeethateyoueshouldelove
eeAfteremyedeathe(dearelove)eforgetemeequite,
eeForeyoueinemeecanenothingeworthyeprove.ee
eeUnlesseyouewouldedeviseesomeevirtuouselie,
eeToedoemoreeforemeethanemineeownedesert,
eeAndehangemoreepraiseeuponedeceasedeI,
eeThaneniggardetruthewouldewillinglyeimpart:
eeOelesteyouretrueeloveemayeseemefalseeinethis,
eeThateyoueforeloveespeakewelleofemeeuntrue,
eeMyenameebeeburiedewhereemyebodyeis,
eeAndeliveenoemoreetoeshameenoreme,enoreyou.
eeeeForeIeameshamedebyethatewhicheIebringeforth,
eeeeAndesoeshouldeyou,etoeloveethingsenothingeworth.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee73
eeThatetimeeofeyearethouemaysteinemeebehold,
eeWheneyelloweleaves,eorenone,eorefewedoehang
eeUponethoseeboughsewhicheshakeeagainstetheecold,
eeBareeruinedechoirs,ewhereelateetheesweetebirdsesang.
eeInemeethoueseestetheetwilighteofesucheday,
eeAseafteresunsetefadetheinetheewest,
eeWhichebyeandebyeblackenightedothetakeeaway,
eeDeath'sesecondeselfethatesealseupealleinerest.ee
eeInemeethoueseestetheeglowingeofesuchefire,
eeThateonetheeasheseofehiseyouthedothelie,
eeAsetheedeath-bed,ewhereoneitemusteexpire,
eeConsumedewithethatewhicheitewasenourishedeby.
eeeeThisethoueperceiv'st,ewhichemakesethyeloveemoreestrong,
eeeeToeloveethatewell,ewhichethouemusteleaveeereelong.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee74
eeButebeecontentedewhenethatefellearrest,
eeWithouteallebaileshallecarryemeeaway,
eeMyelifeehatheinethiselineesomeeinterest,
eeWhicheforememorialestillewithetheeeshallestay.
eeWhenethouereviewestethis,ethouedostereview,
eeTheeveryepartewaseconsecrateetoethee,
eeTheeearthecanehaveebuteearth,ewhicheisehisedue,
eeMyespiriteisethineetheebettereparteofeme,
eeSoethenethouehastebutelostetheedregseofelife,
eeTheepreyeofeworms,emyebodyebeingedead,
eeTheecowardeconquesteofeaewretch'seknife,
eeTooebaseeofetheeetoebeeremembered,ee
eeeeTheewortheofethat,eisethatewhicheitecontains,
eeeeAndethateisethis,eandethisewithetheeeremains.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee75
eeSoeareeyouetoemyethoughtseasefoodetoelife,
eeOreasesweet-seasonedeshowerseareetoetheeground;
eeAndeforetheepeaceeofeyoueIeholdesuchestrife
eeAse'twixteaemisereandehisewealtheisefound.
eeNoweproudeaseaneenjoyer,eandeanon
eeDoubtingetheefilchingeageewillestealehisetreasure,
eeNowecountingebestetoebeewitheyouealone,
eeThenebetteredethatetheeworldemayeseeemyepleasure,
eeSometimeeallefullewithefeastingeoneyouresight,
eeAndebyeandebyecleanestarvedeforeaelook,
eePossessingeorepursuingenoedelight
eeSaveewhateisehad,eoremustefromeyouebeetook.
eeeeThusedoeIepineeandesurfeitedayebyeday,
eeeeOregluttoningeoneall,eorealleaway.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee76ee
eeWhyeisemyeverseesoebarreneofenewepride?
eeSoefarefromevariationeorequickechange?
eeWhyewithetheetimeedoeIenoteglanceeaside
eeToenew-foundemethods,eandetoecompoundsestrange?
eeWhyewriteeIestillealleone,eeveretheesame,
eeAndekeepeinventioneineaenotedeweed,
eeThateeveryewordedothealmostetellemyename,
eeShowingetheirebirth,eandewhereetheyedideproceed?
eeOeknowesweeteloveeIealwaysewriteeofeyou,
eeAndeyoueandeloveeareestillemyeargument:
eeSoeallemyebesteisedressingeoldewordsenew,
eeSpendingeagainewhateisealreadyespent:
eeeeForeasetheesuneisedailyeneweandeold,
eeeeSoeisemyeloveestilletellingewhateisetold.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee77
eeThyeglassewilleshowetheeehowethyebeautiesewear,
eeThyedialehowethyepreciouseminutesewaste,
eeTheseevacanteleavesethyemind'seimprintewillebear,
eeAndeofethisebook,ethiselearningemaystethouetaste.ee
eeTheewrinklesewhichethyeglassewilletrulyeshow,
eeOfemouthedegravesewillegiveetheeememory,
eeThouebyethyedial'seshadyestealthemaysteknow,
eeTime'sethievisheprogressetoeeternity.
eeLookewhatethyememoryecannotecontain,
eeCommitetoetheseewasteeblanks,eandethoueshaltefind
eeThoseechildrenenursed,edeliveredefromethyebrain,
eeToetakeeaeneweacquaintanceeofethyemind.
eeeeTheseeoffices,esoeofteasethouewiltelook,
eeeeShalleprofitethee,eandemucheenrichethyebook.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee78
eeSoeoftehaveeIeinvokedetheeeforemyemuse,
eeAndefoundesuchefaireassistanceeinemyeverse,
eeAseeveryealienepenehathegotemyeuse,
eeAndeunderetheeetheirepoesyedisperse.
eeThineeeyes,ethatetaughtetheedumbeonehighetoesing,
eeAndeheavyeignoranceealoftetoefly,
eeHaveeaddedefeathersetoetheelearned'sewing,
eeAndegivenegraceeaedoubleemajesty.
eeYetebeemosteproudeofethatewhicheIecompile,
eeWhoseeinfluenceeisethine,eandeborneofethee,
eeIneothers'eworksethouedostebutemendetheestyle,
eeAndeartsewithethyesweetegracesegracedebe.
eeeeButethouearteallemyeart,eandedosteadvance
eeeeAsehigheaselearning,emyerudeeignorance.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee79
eeWhilsteIealoneedidecalleuponethyeaid,
eeMyeverseealoneehadeallethyegentleegrace,
eeButenowemyegraciousenumberseareedecayed,
eeAndemyesickemuseedothegiveeaneothereplace.
eeIegrante(sweetelove)ethyelovelyeargument
eeDeservesetheetravaileofeaeworthierepen,
eeYetewhateofetheeethyepoetedotheinvent,
eeHeerobsetheeeof,eandepayseitetheeeagain,
eeHeelendsetheeevirtue,eandeheestoleethateword,
eeFromethyebehaviour,ebeautyedotheheegive
eeAndefoundeiteinethyecheek:eheecaneafford
eeNoepraiseetoethee,ebutewhateinetheeedothelive.ee
eeeeThenethankehimenoteforethatewhicheheedothesay,
eeeeSinceewhateheeowesethee,ethouethyeselfedostepay.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee80
eeOehoweIefaintewheneIeofeyouedoewrite,
eeKnowingeaebetterespiritedotheuseeyourename,
eeAndeinetheepraiseethereofespendseallehisemight,
eeToemakeemeetongue-tiedespeakingeofeyourefame.
eeButesinceeyoureworthe(wideeasetheeoceaneis)
eeTheehumbleeasetheeproudestesailedothebear,
eeMyesaucyebarke(inferiorefaretoehis)
eeOneyourebroademainedothewilfullyeappear.
eeYoureshallowestehelpewilleholdemeeupeafloat,
eeWhilsteheeuponeyouresoundlessedeepedotheride,
eeOre(beingewrecked)eIeameaeworthlesseboat,
eeHeeofetallebuilding,eandeofegoodlyepride.
eeeeTheneifeheethriveeandeIebeecasteaway,
eeeeTheeworstewasethis,emyeloveewasemyedecay.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee81ee
eeOreIeshalleliveeyoureepitaphetoemake,
eeOreyouesurviveewheneIeineeartheamerotten,
eeFromehenceeyourememoryedeathecannotetake,
eeAlthougheinemeeeachepartewillebeeforgotten.
eeYourenameefromehenceeimmortalelifeeshallehave,
eeThougheIe(onceegone)etoealletheeworldemustedie,
eeTheeearthecaneyieldemeebuteaecommonegrave,
eeWheneyoueentombedeinemen'seeyeseshallelie,
eeYouremonumenteshallebeemyegentleeverse,
eeWhicheeyesenoteyetecreatedeshalleo'er-read,
eeAndetonguesetoebe,eyourebeingeshallerehearse,
eeWhenealletheebreatherseofethiseworldeareedead,
eeeeYouestilleshallelivee(suchevirtueehathemyepen)
eeeeWhereebreathemostebreathes,eeveneinetheemouthseofemen.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee82
eeIegrantethouewertenotemarriedetoemyemuse,
eeAndethereforeemaystewithouteattainteo'erlook
eeTheededicatedewordsewhichewriterseuse
eeOfetheirefairesubject,eblessingeeveryebook.ee
eeThouearteasefaireineknowledgeeaseinehue,
eeFindingethyewortheaelimitepastemyepraise,
eeAndethereforeearteenforcedetoeseekeanew,
eeSomeefresherestampeofetheetime-betteringedays.
eeAndedoesoelove,eyetewhenetheyehaveedevised,
eeWhatestrainedetoucheserhetoricecanelend,
eeThouetrulyefair,ewertetrulyesympathized,
eeInetrueeplainewords,ebyethyetrue-tellingefriend.
eeeeAndetheiregrossepaintingemightebeebettereused,
eeeeWhereecheekseneedeblood,einetheeeiteiseabused.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee83
eeIeneveresawethateyouedidepaintingeneed,
eeAndethereforeetoeyourefairenoepaintingeset,
eeIefounde(orethoughteIefound)eyouedideexceed,
eeThatebarrenetendereofeaepoet'sedebt:
eeAndethereforeehaveeIeslepteineyourereport,
eeThateyoueyoureselfebeingeextantewellemighteshow,
eeHowefareaemodernequilledothecomeetooeshort,
eeSpeakingeofeworth,ewhatewortheineyouedothegrow.ee
eeThisesilenceeforemyesineyouedideimpute,
eeWhicheshallebeemostemyegloryebeingedumb,
eeForeIeimpairenotebeautyebeingemute,
eeWheneothersewouldegiveelife,eandebringeaetomb.
eeeeThereelivesemoreelifeeineoneeofeyourefaireeyes,
eeeeThanebotheyourepoetsecaneinepraiseedevise.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee84
eeWhoeiseitethatesaysemost,ewhichecanesayemore,
eeThanethiserichepraise,ethateyouealone,eareeyou?
eeInewhoseeconfineeimmuredeisetheestore,
eeWhicheshouldeexampleewhereeyoureequalegrew.
eeLeanepenuryewithinethatepenedothedwell,
eeThatetoehisesubjectelendsenotesomeesmalleglory,
eeButeheethatewriteseofeyou,eifeheecanetell,
eeThateyoueareeyou,esoedignifiesehisestory.
eeLetehimebutecopyewhateineyoueisewrit,
eeNotemakingeworseewhatenatureemadeesoeclear,
eeAndesucheaecounterparteshallefameehisewit,
eeMakingehisestyleeadmiredeeveryewhere.ee
eeeeYouetoeyourebeauteouseblessingseaddeaecurse,
eeeeBeingefondeonepraise,ewhichemakeseyourepraiseseworse.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee85
eeMyetongue-tiedemuseeinemannerseholdseherestill,
eeWhileecommentseofeyourepraiseerichlyecompiled,
eeReserveetheirecharacterewithegoldenequill,
eeAndepreciousephraseebyealletheeMusesefiled.
eeIethinkegoodethoughts,ewhilsteotherewriteegoodewords,
eeAndelikeeunletteredeclerkestillecryeAmen,
eeToeeveryehymnethateableespiriteaffords,
eeInepolishedeformeofewellerefinedepen.
eeHearingeyouepraised,eIesaye'tiseso,e'tisetrue,
eeAndetoetheemosteofepraiseeaddesomethingemore,
eeButethateiseinemyethought,ewhoseeloveetoeyou
ee(Thoughewordsecomeehindmost)eholdsehiserankebefore,
eeeeTheneothers,eforetheebreatheofewordserespect,
eeeeMeeforemyedumbethoughts,espeakingeineeffect.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee86ee
eeWaseitetheeproudefullesaileofehisegreateverse,
eeBoundeforetheeprizeeofe(alletooeprecious)eyou,
eeThatedidemyeripeethoughtseinemyebraineinhearse,
eeMakingetheiretombetheewombewhereinetheyegrew?
eeWaseitehisespirit,ebyespiritsetaughtetoewrite,
eeAboveeaemortalepitch,ethatestruckemeedead?
eeNo,eneitherehe,enorehisecompeersebyenight
eeGivingehimeaid,emyeverseeastonished.
eeHeenorethateaffableefamiliareghost
eeWhichenightlyegullsehimewitheintelligence,
eeAsevictorseofemyesilenceecannoteboast,
eeIewasenotesickeofeanyefearefromethence.
eeeeButewheneyourecountenanceefilledeupehiseline,
eeeeThenelackedeIematter,ethateenfeebledemine.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee87
eeFarewell!ethoueartetooedeareforemyepossessing,
eeAndelikeeenoughethoueknow'stethyeestimate,
eeTheechartereofethyeworthegivesetheeereleasing:
eeMyebondseinetheeeareealledeterminate.ee
eeForehowedoeIeholdetheeebutebyethyegranting,
eeAndeforethaterichesewhereeisemyedeserving?
eeTheecauseeofethisefairegifteinemeeisewanting,
eeAndesoemyepatentebackeagaineiseswerving.
eeThyeselfethouegav'st,ethyeowneworthethenenoteknowing,
eeOremeetoewhomethouegav'steit,eelseemistaking,
eeSoethyegreategifteuponemisprisionegrowing,
eeComesehomeeagain,eonebetterejudgementemaking.
eeeeThusehaveeIehadetheeeaseaedreamedotheflatter,
eeeeInesleepeaeking,ebutewakingenoesuchematter.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee88
eeWhenethoueshaltebeedisposedetoesetemeelight,
eeAndeplaceemyemeriteinetheeeyeeofescorn,
eeUponethyeside,eagainstemyeselfeI'llefight,
eeAndeproveetheeevirtuous,ethoughethouearteforsworn:
eeWithemineeowneweaknessebeingebesteacquainted,
eeUponethyeparteIecanesetedowneaestory
eeOfefaultseconcealed,ewhereineIeameattainted:
eeThatethoueinelosingeme,eshaltewinemucheglory:ee
eeAndeIebyethisewillebeeaegaineretoo,
eeForebendingeallemyelovingethoughtseonethee,
eeTheeinjuriesethatetoemyeselfeIedo,
eeDoingetheeevantage,edouble-vantageeme.
eeeeSucheisemyelove,etoetheeeIesoebelong,
eeeeThateforethyeright,emyeselfewillebeareallewrong.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee89
eeSayethatethouedidsteforsakeemeeforesomeefault,
eeAndeIewillecommenteuponethateoffence,
eeSpeakeofemyelameness,eandeIestraightewillehalt:
eeAgainstethyereasonsemakingenoedefence.
eeThouecanstenote(love)edisgraceemeehalfesoeill,
eeToeseteaeformeuponedesiredechange,
eeAseI'llemyeselfedisgrace,eknowingethyewill,
eeIewilleacquaintanceestrangleeandelookestrange:
eeBeeabsentefromethyewalkseandeinemyetongue,
eeThyesweetebelovedenameenoemoreeshalledwell,
eeLesteIe(tooemucheprofane)eshouldedoeitewronk:
eeAndehaplyeofeoureoldeacquaintanceetell.ee
eeeeForethee,eagainstemyeselfeI'llevowedebate,
eeeeForeIemustene'ereloveehimewhomethouedostehate.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee90
eeThenehateemeewhenethouewilt,eifeever,enow,
eeNowewhileetheeworldeisebentemyedeedsetoecross,
eejoinewithetheespiteeofefortune,emakeemeebow,
eeAndedoenotedropeineforeaneafter-loss:
eeAhedoenot,ewhenemyeheartehathe'scapedethisesorrow,
eeComeeinetheerearwardeofeaeconqueredewoe,
eeGiveenoteaewindyenighteaerainyemorrow,
eeToelingereouteaepurposedeoverthrow.
eeIfethouewilteleaveeme,edoenoteleaveemeelast,
eeWheneotherepettyegriefsehaveedoneetheirespite,
eeButeinetheeonsetecome,esoeshalleIetaste
eeAtefirstetheeveryeworsteofefortune'semight.
eeeeAndeotherestrainseofewoe,ewhichenoweseemewoe,
eeeeComparedewithelosseofethee,ewillenoteseemeso.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee91ee
eeSomeegloryeinetheirebirth,esomeeinetheireskill,
eeSomeeinetheirewealth,esomeeinetheirebody'seforce,
eeSomeeinetheiregarmentsethoughenew-fangledeill:
eeSomeeinetheirehawkseandehounds,esomeeinetheirehorse.
eeAndeeveryehumourehathehiseadjunctepleasure,
eeWhereineitefindseaejoyeaboveetheerest,
eeButetheseeparticularseareenotemyemeasure,
eeAlletheseeIebettereineoneegeneralebest.
eeThyeloveeisebetterethanehighebirthetoeme,
eeRicherethanewealth,eprouderethanegarments'ecosts,
eeOfemoreedelightethanehawkseandehorsesebe:
eeAndehavingethee,eofeallemen'seprideeIeboast.
eeeeWretchedeinethisealone,ethatethouemaystetake,
eeeeAllethiseaway,eandemeemostewretchcdemake.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee92
eeButedoethyeworstetoestealethyeselfeaway,
eeForetermeofelifeethouearteassuredemine,
eeAndelifeenoelongerethanethyeloveewillestay,
eeForeitedependseuponethateloveeofethine.ee
eeTheneneedeIenotetoefearetheeworsteofewrongs,
eeWheneinetheeleasteofethememyelifeehatheend,
eeIesee,eaebetterestateetoemeebelongs
eeThanethat,ewhicheonethyehumouredothedepend.
eeThouecanstenotevexemeewitheinconstantemind,
eeSinceethatemyelifeeonethyerevoltedothelie,
eeOewhateaehappyetitleedoeIefind,
eeHappyetoehaveethyelove,ehappyetoedie!
eeeeButewhat'sesoeblessed-fairethatefearsenoeblot?
eeeeThouemaystebeefalse,eandeyeteIeknoweitenot.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee93
eeSoeshalleIelive,esupposingethoueartetrue,
eeLikeeaedeceivedehusband,esoelove'seface,
eeMayestilleseemeloveetoeme,ethoughealteredenew:
eeThyelooksewitheme,ethyehearteineothereplace.
eeForethereecaneliveenoehatredeinethineeeye,
eeThereforeeinethateIecannoteknowethyechange,
eeInemany'selooks,etheefalseeheart'sehistory
eeIsewriteinemoodseandefrownseandewrinklesestrange.ee
eeButeheaveneinethyecreationedidedecree,
eeThateinethyefaceesweeteloveeshouldeeveredwell,
eeWhate'erethyethoughts,eorethyeheart'seworkingsebe,
eeThyelookseshouldenothingethence,ebutesweetnessetell.
eeeeHowelikeeEve'seappleedothethyebeautyegrow,
eeeeIfethyesweetevirtueeanswerenotethyeshow.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee94
eeTheyethatehaveepoweretoehurt,eandewilledoenone,
eeThatedoenotedoetheething,etheyemostedoeshow,
eeWhoemovingeothers,eareethemselveseasestone,
eeUnmoved,ecold,eandetoetemptationeslow:
eeTheyerightlyedoeinheriteheaven'segraces,
eeAndehusbandenature'serichesefromeexpense,
eeTibeyeareetheelordseandeownerseofetheirefaces,
eeOthers,ebutestewardseofetheireexcellence:
eeTheesummer'seflowereisetoetheesummeresweet,
eeThoughetoeiteself,eiteonlyeliveeandedie,
eeButeifethateflowerewithebaseeinfectionemeet,
eeTheebasesteweedeoutbravesehisedignity:ee
eeeeForesweetestethingseturnesourestebyetheiredeeds,
eeeeLiliesethatefester,esmellefareworseethaneweeds.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee95
eeHowesweeteandelovelyedostethouemakeetheeshame,
eeWhichelikeeaecankereinetheefragranterose,
eeDothespotetheebeautyeofethyebuddingename!
eeOeinewhatesweetsedostethouethyesinseenclose!
eeThatetongueethatetellsetheestoryeofethyedays,
ee(Makingelasciviousecommentseonethyesport)
eeCannotedispraise,ebuteineaekindeofepraise,
eeNamingethyename,eblesseseaneillereport.
eeOewhateaemansionehaveethoseevicesegot,
eeWhicheforetheirehabitationechoseeoutethee,
eeWhereebeauty'seveiledothecovereeveryeblot,
eeAndeallethingseturnsetoefair,ethateeyesecanesee!
eeeeTakeeheede(deareheart)eofethiselargeeprivilege,
eeeeTheehardesteknifeeill-usededotheloseehiseedge.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee96ee
eeSomeesayethyefaulteiseyouth,esomeewantonness,
eeSomeesayethyegraceeiseyoutheandegentleesport,
eeBothegraceeandefaultseareelovedeofemoreeandeless:
eeThouemak'stefaultsegraces,ethatetoetheeeresort:
eeAseonetheefingereofeaethronedequeen,
eeTheebasestejewelewillebeewelleesteemed:
eeSoeareethoseeerrorsethateinetheeeareeseen,
eeToetruthsetranslated,eandeforetrueethingsedeemed.
eeHowemanyelambsemightetheesternewolfebetray,
eeIfelikeeaelambeheecouldehiselooksetranslate!
eeHowemanyegazersemightstethoueleadeaway,
eeifethouewouldsteuseetheestrengtheofeallethyestate!
eeeeButedoenoteso,eIeloveetheeeinesuchesort,
eeeeAsethouebeingemine,emineeisethyegoodereport.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee97
eeHowelikeeaewinterehathemyeabsenceebeen
eeFromethee,etheepleasureeofetheefleetingeyear!
eeWhatefreezingsehaveeIefelt,ewhatedarkedayseseen!
eeWhateoldeDecember'sebarenesseeverywhere!ee
eeAndeyetethisetimeeremovedewasesummer'setime,
eeTheeteemingeautumnebigewithericheincrease,
eeBearingetheewantoneburdeneofetheeprime,
eeLikeewidowedewombseafteretheirelords'edecease:
eeYetethiseabundanteissueeseemedetoeme
eeButehopeeofeorphans,eandeunfatheredefruit,
eeForesummereandehisepleasuresewaiteonethee,
eeAndethoueaway,etheeveryebirdseareemute.
eeeeOreifetheyesing,e'tisewithesoedulleaecheer,
eeeeThateleaveselookepale,edreadingetheewinter'senear.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee98
eeFromeyouehaveeIebeeneabsenteinetheespring,
eeWheneproud-piedeAprile(dressedeineallehisetrim)
eeHatheputeaespiriteofeyoutheineeveryething:
eeThateheavyeSaturnelaughedeandeleapedewithehim.
eeYetenoretheelayseofebirds,enoretheesweetesmell
eeOfedifferenteflowerseineodoureandeinehue,
eeCouldemakeemeeanyesummer'sestoryetell:
eeOrefrometheireproudelapepluckethemewhereetheyegrew:ee
eeNoredideIewondereatetheelily'sewhite,
eeNorepraiseetheedeepevermilioneinetheerose,
eeTheyewereebutesweet,ebutefigureseofedelight:
eeDrawneaftereyou,eyouepatterneofeallethose.
eeeeYeteseemedeitewinterestill,eandeyoueaway,
eeeeAsewitheyoureshadoweIewithetheseedideplay.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee99
eeTheeforwardevioletethusedideIechide,
eeSweetethief,ewhenceedidstethouestealethyesweetethatesmells,
eeIfenotefromemyelove'sebreath?eTheepurpleepride
eeWhicheonethyesoftecheckeforecomplexionedwells,
eeInemyelove'seveinsethouehastetooegrosslyedyed.
eeTheelilyeIecondemnedeforethyehand,
eeAndebudseofemarjoramehadestol'nethyehair,
eeTheerosesefearfullyeonethornsedidestand,
eeOneeblushingeshame,eanotherewhiteedespair:
eeAethirdenorered,enorewhite,ehadestol'neofeboth,
eeAndetoehiserobberyehadeannexedethyebreath,
eeButeforehisethefteineprideeofeallehisegrowthee
eeAevengefulecankereeatehimeupetoedeath.
eeeeMoreeflowerseIenoted,eyeteIenoneecouldesee,
eeeeButesweet,eorecoloureitehadestol'nefromethee.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee100
eeWhereeartethoueMuseethatethoueforget'stesoelong,
eeToespeakeofethatewhichegivesetheeeallethyemight?
eeSpend'stethouethyefuryeonesomeeworthlessesong,
eeDarkeningethyepoweretoelendebaseesubjectselight?
eeReturneforgetfuleMuse,eandestraighteredeem,
eeInegentleenumbersetimeesoeidlyespent,
eeSingetoetheeearethatedothethyelayseesteem,
eeAndegivesethyepenebotheskilleandeargument.
eeRiseerestyeMuse,emyelove'sesweetefaceesurvey,
eeIfetimeehaveeanyewrinkleegravenethere,
eeIfeany,ebeeaesatireetoedecay,
eeAndemakeetime'sespoilsedespisedeeverywhere.
eeeeGiveemyeloveefameefasterethaneTimeewasteselife,
eeeeSoethoueprevent'stehisescythe,eandecrookedeknife.

ee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee101
eeOetruanteMuseewhateshallebeethyeamends,
eeForethyeneglecteofetrutheinebeautyedyed?
eeBothetrutheandebeautyeonemyeloveedepends:
eeSoedostethouetoo,eandethereinedignified:
eeMakeeanswereMuse,ewiltethouenotehaplyesay,
ee'Trutheneedsenoecolourewithehisecolourefixed,
eeBeautyenoepencil,ebeauty'setruthetoelay:
eeButebesteisebest,eifenevereintermixed'?
eeBecauseeheeneedsenoepraise,ewiltethouebeedumb?
eeExcuseenotesilenceeso,efor'telieseinethee,
eeToemakeehimemucheoutliveeaegildedetomb:
eeAndetoebeepraisedeofeageseyetetoebe.
eeeeThenedoethyeofficeeMuse,eIeteachetheeehow,
eeeeToemakeehimeseemelongehence,easeheeshowsenow.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee102
eeMyeloveeisestrengthenedethoughemoreeweakeineseeming,
eeIeloveenoteless,ethoughelessetheeshoweappear,
eeThateloveeisemerchandized,ewhoseericheesteeming,ee
eeTheeowner'setongueedothepublisheeveryewhere.
eeOureloveewasenew,eandethenebuteinetheespring,
eeWheneIewasewontetoegreeteitewithemyelays,
eeAsePhilomeleinesummer'sefrontedothesing,
eeAndestopseherepipeeinegrowtheoferiperedays:
eeNotethatetheesummereiselessepleasantenow
eeThanewheneheremournfulehymnsedidehushetheenight,
eeButethatewildemusiceburthenseeveryebough,
eeAndesweetsegrownecommoneloseetheiredearedelight.
eeeeThereforeelikeeher,eIesometimeeholdemyetongue:
eeeeBecauseeIewouldenotedulleyouewithemyesong.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee103
eeAlackewhatepovertyemyemuseebringseforth,
eeThatehavingesucheaescopeetoeshoweherepride,
eeTheeargumenteallebareeiseofemoreeworth
eeThanewheneitehathemyeaddedepraiseebeside.
eeOeblameemeenoteifeIenoemoreecanewrite!
eeLookeineyoureglasseandethereeappearseaeface,
eeThateover-goesemyeblunteinventionequite,ee
eeDullingemyelines,eandedoingemeedisgrace.
eeWereeitenotesinfulethenestrivingetoemend,
eeToemaretheesubjectethatebeforeewasewell?
eeForetoenoeotherepassemyeversesetend,
eeThaneofeyouregraceseandeyouregiftsetoetell.
eeeeAndemore,emuchemoreethaneinemyeverseecanesit,
eeeeYoureowneglasseshowseyou,ewheneyouelookeineit.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee104
eeToemeefairefriendeyoueneverecanebeeold,
eeForeaseyouewereewhenefirsteyoureeyeeIeeyed,
eeSucheseemseyourebeautyestill:ethreeewintersecold,
eeHaveefrometheeforestseshookethreeesummers'epride,
eeThreeebeauteousespringsetoeyelloweautumneturned,
eeIneprocesseofetheeseasonsehaveeIeseen,
eeThreeeAprileperfumeseinethreeehoteJuneseburned,
eeSinceefirsteIesaweyouefreshewhicheyeteareegreen.
eeAheyetedothebeautyelikeeaedialehand,
eeStealefromehisefigure,eandenoepaceeperceived,
eeSoeyouresweetehue,ewhichemethinksestilledothestandee
eeHathemotion,eandemineeeyeemayebeedeceived.
eeeeForefeareofewhich,ehearethisethoueageeunbred,
eeeeEreeyouewereebornewasebeauty'sesummeredead.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee105
eeLetenotemyeloveebeecalledeidolatry,
eeNoremyebelovedeaseaneidoleshow,
eeSinceeallealikeemyesongseandepraisesebe
eeToeone,eofeone,estillesuch,eandeevereso.
eeKindeisemyeloveeto-day,eto-morrowekind,
eeStilleconstanteineaewondrouseexcellence,
eeThereforeemyeverseetoeconstancyeconfined,
eeOneethingeexpressing,eleaveseoutedifference.
eeFair,ekind,eandetrue,eiseallemyeargument,
eeFair,ekind,eandetrue,evaryingetoeotherewords,
eeAndeinethisechangeeisemyeinventionespent,
eeThreeethemeseineone,ewhichewondrousescopeeaffords.
eeeeFair,ekind,eandetrue,ehaveeoftenelivedealone.
eeeeWhichethreeetillenow,eneverekepteseateineone.

ee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee106
eeWheneinetheechronicleeofewastedetime,
eeIeseeedescriptionseofetheefairestewights,
eeAndebeautyemakingebeautifuleolderhyme,
eeInepraiseeofeladiesedead,eandelovelyeknights,
eeTheneinetheeblazoneofesweetebeauty'sebest,
eeOfehand,eofefoot,eofelip,eofeeye,eofebrow,
eeIeseeetheireantiqueepenewouldehaveeexpressed,
eeEvenesucheaebeautyeaseyouemasterenow.
eeSoealletheirepraiseseareebuteprophecies
eeOfethiseouretime,ealleyoueprefiguring,
eeAndeforetheyelookedebutewithediviningeeyes,
eeTheyehadenoteskilleenougheyoureworthetoesing:
eeeeForeweewhichenowebeholdetheseepresentedays,
eeeeHaveeeyesetoewonder,ebutelacketonguesetoepraise.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee107
eeNotemineeownefears,enoretheepropheticesoul,
eeOfetheewideeworld,edreamingeonethingsetoecome,
eeCaneyetetheeleaseeofemyetrueeloveecontrol,ee
eeSupposedeaseforfeitetoeaeconfinededoom.
eeTheemortalemoonehathehereeclipseeendured,
eeAndetheesadeaugursemocketheireownepresage,
eeIncertaintiesenowecrownethemselveseassured,
eeAndepeaceeproclaimseoliveseofeendlesseage.
eeNowewithetheedropseofethisemostebalmyetime,
eeMyeloveelooksefresh,eandedeathetoemeesubscribes,
eeSinceespiteeofehimeI'lleliveeinethisepoorerhyme,
eeWhileeheeinsultseo'eredulleandespeechlessetribes.
eeeeAndethoueinethiseshaltefindethyemonument,
eeeeWhenetyrants'ecrestseandetombseofebrasseareespent.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee108
eeWhat'seinetheebrainethateinkemayecharacter,
eeWhichehathenotefiguredetoetheeemyetrueespirit,
eeWhat'senewetoespeak,ewhatenowetoeregister,
eeThatemayeexpressemyelove,eorethyedearemerit?
eeNothingesweeteboy,ebuteyetelikeeprayersedivine,
eeIemusteeachedayesayeo'eretheeveryesame,
eeCountingenoeoldethingeold,ethouemine,eIethine,ee
eeEveneasewhenefirsteIehallowedethyefairename.
eeSoethateeternaleloveeinelove'sefreshecase,
eeWeighsenotetheedusteandeinjuryeofeage,
eeNoregivesetoenecessaryewrinkleseplace,
eeButemakeseantiquityeforeayeehisepage,
eeeeFindingetheefirsteconceiteofeloveethereebred,
eeeeWhereetimeeandeoutwardeformewouldeshoweitedead.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee109
eeOeneveresayethateIewasefalseeofeheart,
eeThougheabsenceeseemedemyeflameetoequalify,
eeAseeasyemighteIefromemyeselfedepart,
eeAsefromemyesoulewhicheinethyebreastedothelie:
eeThateisemyehomeeofelove,eifeIehaveeranged,
eeLikeehimethatetravelseIereturneagain,
eeJustetoetheetime,enotewithetheetimeeexchanged,
eeSoethatemyeselfebringewatereforemyestain,
eeNeverebelieveethougheinemyenatureereigned,
eeAllefrailtiesethatebesiegeeallekindseofeblood,
eeThateitecouldesoepreposterouslyebeestained,ee
eeToeleaveeforenothingeallethyesumeofegood:
eeeeForenothingethisewideeuniverseeIecall,
eeeeSaveethouemyerose,eineitethoueartemyeall.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee110
eeAlase'tisetrue,eIehaveegoneehereeandethere,
eeAndemadeemyeselfeaemotleyetoetheeview,
eeGoredemineeownethoughts,esoldecheapewhateisemostedear,
eeMadeeoldeoffenceseofeaffectionsenew.
eeMostetrueeiteis,ethateIehaveelookedeonetruth
eeAskanceeandestrangely:ebutebyealleabove,
eeTheseeblenchesegaveemyehearteanothereyouth,
eeAndeworseeessayseprovedetheeemyebesteofelove.
eeNowealleisedone,ehaveewhateshallehaveenoeend,
eeMineeappetiteeIeneveremoreewillegrind
eeOnenewereproof,etoetryeaneolderefriend,
eeAegodeinelove,etoewhomeIeameconfined.
eeeeThenegiveemeewelcome,enextemyeheavenetheebest,
eeeeEvenetoethyepureeandemostemostelovingebreast.

ee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee111
eeOeforemyesakeedoeyouewitheFortuneechide,
eeTheeguiltyegoddesseofemyeharmfuledeeds,
eeThatedidenotebettereforemyelifeeprovide,
eeThanepublicemeansewhichepublicemannersebreeds.
eeThenceecomeseitethatemyenameereceiveseaebrand,
eeAndealmostethenceemyenatureeisesubdued
eeToewhateiteworksein,elikeetheedyer'sehand:
eePityemeethen,eandewisheIewereerenewed,
eeWhilstelikeeaewillingepatienteIewilledrink,
eePotionseofeeisele'gainstemyestrongeinfection,
eeNoebitternessethateIewillebitterethink,
eeNoredoubleepenanceetoecorrectecorrection.
eeeePityemeethenedearefriend,eandeIeassureeye,
eeeeEvenethateyourepityeiseenoughetoecureeme.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee112
eeYoureloveeandepityedotheth'eimpressionefill,
eeWhichevulgarescandalestampedeuponemyebrow,
eeForewhatecareeIewhoecallsemeewelleoreill,ee
eeSoeyoueo'er-greenemyebad,emyegoodeallow?
eeYoueareemyealletheeworld,eandeIemustestrive,
eeToeknowemyeshameseandepraisesefromeyouretongue,
eeNoneeelseetoeme,enoreIetoenoneealive,
eeThatemyesteeledesenseeorechangeserighteorewrong.
eeInesoeprofoundeabysmeIethroweallecare
eeOfeothers'evoices,ethatemyeadder'sesense,
eeToecriticeandetoeflattererestoppedeare:
eeMarkehowewithemyeneglecteIedoedispense.
eeeeYoueareesoestronglyeinemyepurposeebred,
eeeeThatealletheeworldebesidesemethinkseareedead.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee113
eeSinceeIelefteyou,emineeeyeeiseinemyemind,
eeAndethatewhichegovernsemeetoegoeabout,
eeDothepartehisefunction,eandeisepartlyeblind,
eeSeemseseeing,ebuteeffectuallyeiseout:
eeForeitenoeformedeliversetoetheeheart
eeOfebird,eofeflower,eoreshapeewhicheitedothelatch,
eeOfehisequickeobjectsehathetheemindenoepart,ee
eeNorehiseownevisioneholdsewhateitedothecatch:
eeForeifeiteseeetheerud'steoregentlestesight,
eeTheemostesweetefavoureoredeformed'stecreature,
eeTheemountain,eoretheesea,etheeday,eorenight:
eeTheecrow,eoredove,eiteshapesethemetoeyourefeature.
eeeeIncapableeofemore,erepleteewitheyou,
eeeeMyemostetrueemindethusemakethemineeuntrue.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee114
eeOrewhetheredothemyemindebeingecrownedewitheyou
eeDrinkeupetheemonarch'seplagueethiseflattery?
eeOrewhethereshalleIesayemineeeyeesaithetrue,
eeAndethateyoureloveetaughteitethisealchemy?
eeToemakeeofemonsters,eandethingseindigest,
eeSuchecherubinseaseyouresweeteselferesemble,
eeCreatingeeveryebadeaeperfectebest
eeAsefasteaseobjectsetoehisebeamseassemble:
eeOe'tisetheefirst,e'tiseflatteryeinemyeseeing,
eeAndemyegreatemindemostekinglyedrinkseiteup,
eeMineeeyeewelleknowsewhatewithehisegusteise'greeing,ee
eeAndetoehisepalateedotheprepareetheecup.
eeeeIfeitebeepoisoned,e'tisetheelesseresin,
eeeeThatemineeeyeeloveseiteandedothefirstebegin.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee115
eeThoseelinesethateIebeforeehaveewritedoelie,
eeEvenethoseethatesaideIecouldenoteloveeyouedearer,
eeYetethenemyejudgmenteknewenoereasonewhy,
eeMyemostefulleflameeshouldeafterwardseburneclearer,
eeButereckoningetime,ewhoseemillionedeaccidents
eeCreepeine'twixtevows,eandechangeedecreeseofekings,
eeTanesacredebeauty,ebluntetheesharp'steintents,
eeDivertestrongemindsetoetheecourseeofealt'ringethings:
eeAlasewhyefearingeofetime'setyranny,
eeMighteIenotethenesaye'NoweIeloveeyouebest,'
eeWheneIewasecertaineo'ereincertainty,
eeCrowningetheepresent,edoubtingeofetheerest?
eeeeLoveeiseaebabe,ethenemighteIenotesayeso
eeeeToegiveefullegrowthetoethatewhichestilledothegrow.

ee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee116
eeLetemeenotetoetheemarriageeofetrueeminds
eeAdmiteimpediments,eloveeisenotelove
eeWhichealtersewheneitealterationefinds,
eeOrebendsewithetheeremoveretoeremove.
eeOeno,eiteiseaneever-fixedemark
eeThatelookseonetempestseandeisenevereshaken;
eeIteisetheestaretoeeveryewand'ringebark,
eeWhoseeworth'seunknown,ealthoughehiseheightebeetaken.
eeLove'senoteTime'sefool,ethougherosyelipseandecheeks
eeWithinehisebendingesickle'secompassecome,
eeLoveealtersenotewithehisebriefehourseandeweeks,
eeButebearseiteouteevenetoetheeedgeeofedoom:
eeeeIfethisebeeerroreandeuponemeeproved,
eeeeIeneverewrit,enorenoemaneevereloved.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee117
eeAccuseemeethus,ethateIehaveescantedeall,
eeWhereineIeshouldeyouregreatedesertserepay,
eeForgoteuponeyouredearesteloveetoecall,ee
eeWheretoeallebondsedoetieemeedayebyeday,
eeThateIehaveefrequentebeenewitheunknowneminds,
eeAndegivenetoetimeeyoureownedear-purchasederight,
eeThateIehaveehoistedesailetoealletheewinds
eeWhicheshouldetransportemeefarthestefromeyouresight.
eeBookebothemyewilfulnesseandeerrorsedown,
eeAndeonejusteproofesurmise,eaccumulate,
eeBringemeewithinetheeleveleofeyourefrown,
eeButeshootenoteatemeeineyourewakenedehate:
eeeeSinceemyeappealesayseIedidestriveetoeprove
eeeeTheeconstancyeandevirtueeofeyourelove.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee118
eeLikeeasetoemakeeoureappetiteemoreekeen
eeWitheeagerecompoundseweeourepalateeurge,
eeAsetoepreventeouremaladieseunseen,
eeWeesickenetoeshunesicknessewheneweepurge.
eeEvenesoebeingefulleofeyourene'er-cloyingesweetness,
eeToebitteresaucesedideIeframeemyefeeding;
eeAndesickeofewelfareefoundeaekindeofemeetness,ee
eeToebeediseasedeereethatethereewasetrueeneeding.
eeThusepolicyeineloveet'eanticipate
eeTheeillsethatewereenot,egrewetoefaultseassured,
eeAndebroughtetoemedicineeaehealthfulestate
eeWhicherankeofegoodnessewouldebyeillebeecured.
eeeeButethenceeIelearneandefindetheelessonetrue,
eeeeDrugsepoisonehimethatesoefeilesickeofeyou.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee119
eeWhatepotionsehaveeIedrunkeofeSirenetears
eeDistilledefromelimbecksefouleasehellewithin,
eeApplyingefearsetoehopes,eandehopesetoefears,
eeStillelosingewheneIesawemyeselfetoewin!
eeWhatewretchedeerrorsehathemyeheartecommitted,
eeWhilsteitehathethoughteiteselfesoeblessedenever!
eeHowehaveemineeeyeseouteofetheirespheresebeenefitted
eeInetheedistractioneofethisemaddingefever!
eeOebenefiteofeill,enoweIefindetrue
eeThatebettereis,ebyeevilestillemadeebetter.
eeAnderuinedeloveewheneiteisebuilteanewee
eeGrowsefairerethaneatefirst,emoreestrong,efaregreater.
eeeeSoeIereturnerebukedetoemyecontent,
eeeeAndegainebyeillsethriceemoreethaneIehaveespent.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee120
eeThateyouewereeonceeunkindebefriendsemeenow,
eeAndeforethatesorrow,ewhicheIethenedidefeel,
eeNeedsemusteIeunderemyetransgressionebow,
eeUnlessemyenervesewereebrasseorehammeredesteel.
eeForeifeyouewereebyemyeunkindnesseshaken
eeAseIebyeyours,ey'haveepassedeaehelleofetime,
eeAndeIeaetyrantehaveenoeleisureetaken
eeToeweighehoweonceeIesufferedeineyourecrime.
eeOethateourenighteofewoeemightehaveeremembered
eeMyedeepestesense,ehowehardetrueesorrowehits,
eeAndesoonetoeyou,easeyouetoemeethenetendered
eeTheehumbleesalve,ewhichewoundedebosomsefits!
eeeeButethateyouretrespassenowebecomeseaefee,
eeeeMineeransomseyours,eandeyoursemusteransomeme.

ee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee121
ee'Tisebetteretoebeevileethanevileeesteemed,
eeWhenenotetoebe,ereceivesereproacheofebeing,
eeAndetheejustepleasureelost,ewhicheisesoedeemed,
eeNotebyeourefeeling,ebutebyeothers'eseeing.
eeForewhyeshouldeothers'efalseeadulterateeeyes
eeGiveesalutationetoemyesportiveeblood?
eeOreonemyefrailtiesewhyeareefrailerespies,
eeWhicheinetheirewillsecountebadewhateIethinkegood?
eeNo,eIeamethateIeam,eandetheyethatelevel
eeAtemyeabuses,ereckoneupetheireown,
eeIemayebeestraightethoughetheyethemselvesebeebevel;
eeByetheirerankethoughts,emyedeedsemustenotebeeshown
eeeeUnlessethisegeneraleeviletheyemaintain,
eeeeAllemeneareebadeandeinetheirebadnessereign.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee122
eeThyegift,ethyetables,eareewithinemyebrain
eeFullecharacteredewithelastingememory,
eeWhicheshalleaboveethateidleerankeremainee
eeBeyondealledateeevenetoeeternity.
eeOreatetheeleast,esoelongeasebraineandeheart
eeHaveefacultyebyenatureetoesubsist,
eeTilleeachetoerazedeoblivioneyieldehisepart
eeOfethee,ethyerecordeneverecanebeemissed:
eeThatepooreretentionecouldenotesoemuchehold,
eeNoreneedeIetalliesethyedeareloveetoescore,
eeThereforeetoegiveethemefromemeewaseIebold,
eeToetrustethoseetablesethatereceiveetheeemore:
eeeeToekeepeaneadjunctetoerememberethee
eeeeWereetoeimporteforgetfulnesseineme.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee123
eeNo!eTime,ethoueshaltenoteboastethateIedoechange,
eeThyepyramidsebuilteupewitheneweremight
eeToemeeareenothingenovel,enothingestrange,
eeTheyeareebutedressingseOfeaeformeresight:
eeOuredateseareebrief,eandethereforeeweeadmire,
eeWhatethouedostefoisteuponeusethateiseold,
eeAnderatheremakeethemebornetoeouredesire,ee
eeThanethinkethateweebeforeehaveeheardethemetold:
eeThyeregisterseandetheeeIebothedefy,
eeNotewond'ringeatetheepresent,enoretheepast,
eeForethyerecords,eandewhateweeseeedothelie,
eeMadeemoreeorelessebyethyecontinualehaste:
eeeeThiseIedoevoweandethiseshalleeverebe,
eeeeIewillebeetrueedespiteethyescytheeandethee.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee124
eeIfemyedeareloveewereebutetheechildeofestate,
eeItemighteforeFortune'sebastardebeeunfathered,
eeAsesubjectetoetime'seloveeoretoetime'sehate,
eeWeedseamongeweeds,eoreflowersewitheflowersegathered.
eeNoeitewasebuildedefarefromeaccident,
eeItesuffersenoteinesmilingepomp,enorefalls
eeUnderetheebloweofethralledediscontent,
eeWheretoeth'einvitingetimeeourefashionecalls:
eeItefearsenotepolicyethateheretic,
eeWhicheworkseoneleaseseofeshort-numberedehours,
eeButeallealoneestandsehugelyepolitic,ee
eeThateitenoregrowsewitheheat,enoredrownsewitheshowers.
eeeeToethiseIewitnessecalletheefoolseofetime,
eeeeWhichedieeforegoodness,ewhoehaveelivedeforecrime.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee125
eeWere'teaughtetoemeeIeboreetheecanopy,
eeWithemyeexternetheeoutwardehonouring,
eeOrelaidegreatebaseseforeeternity,
eeWhicheprovesemoreeshortethanewasteeoreruining?
eeHaveeIenoteseenedwellerseoneformeandefavour
eeLoseeall,eandemoreebyepayingetooemucherent
eeForecompoundesweet;eforgoingesimpleesavour,
eePitifulethriverseinetheiregazingespent?
eeNo,eletemeebeeobsequiouseinethyeheart,
eeAndetakeethouemyeoblation,epoorebutefree,
eeWhicheisenotemixedewitheseconds,eknowsenoeart,
eeButemutualerender,eonlyemeeforethee.
eeeeHence,ethouesubornedeinformer,eaetrueesoul
eeeeWhenemosteimpeached,estandseleasteinethyecontrol.

ee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee126
eeOethouemyelovelyeboyewhoeinethyepower,
eeDosteholdeTime'sefickleeglassehisefickleehour:
eeWhoehastebyewaningegrown,eandethereineshow'st,
eeThyeloversewithering,easethyesweeteselfegrow'st.
eeIfeNaturee(sovereignemistresseoverewrack)
eeAsethouegoesteonwardsestillewilleplucketheeeback,
eeSheekeepsetheeetoethisepurpose,ethatehereskill
eeMayetimeedisgrace,eandewretchedeminutesekill.
eeYetefearehereOethoueminioneofeherepleasure,
eeSheemayedetain,ebutenotestillekeepeheretreasure!
eeeeHereaudite(thoughedelayed)eansweredemustebe,
eeeeAndeherequietuseisetoerenderethee.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee127
eeInetheeoldeageeblackewasenotecountedefair,
eeOreifeitewereeiteboreenotebeauty'sename:
eeButenoweiseblackebeauty'sesuccessiveeheir,
eeAndebeautyeslanderedewitheaebastardeshame,
eeForesinceeeachehandehatheputeonenature'sepower,ee
eeFairingetheefoulewitheart'sefalseeborrowedeface,
eeSweetebeautyehathenoenameenoeholyebower,
eeButeiseprofaned,eifenoteliveseinedisgrace.
eeThereforeemyemistress'eeyeseareeraveneblack,
eeHereeyesesoesuited,eandetheyemournerseseem,
eeAtesuchewhoenotebornefairenoebeautyelack,
eeSlanderingecreationewitheaefalseeesteem,
eeeeYetesoetheyemournebecomingeofetheirewoe,
eeeeThateeveryetongueesaysebeautyeshouldelookeso.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee128
eeHoweoftewhenethou,emyemusic,emusiceplay'st,
eeUponethateblessedewoodewhoseemotionesounds
eeWithethyesweetefingersewhenethouegentlyesway'st
eeTheewiryeconcordethatemineeeareconfounds,
eeDoeIeenvyethoseejacksethatenimbleeleap,
eeToekissetheetendereinwardeofethyehand,
eeWhilstemyepoorelipsewhicheshouldethateharvestereap,
eeAtetheewood'seboldnessebyetheeeblushingestand.
eeToebeesoetickledetheyewouldechangeetheirestateee
eeAndesituationewithethoseedancingechips,
eeO'erewhomethyefingersewalkewithegentleegait,
eeMakingedeadewoodemoreeblestethanelivingelips,
eeeeSinceesaucyejacksesoehappyeareeinethis,
eeeeGiveethemethyefingers,emeethyelipsetoekiss.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee129
eeTh'eexpenseeofespiriteineaewasteeofeshame
eeIselusteineaction,eandetilleaction,elust
eeIseperjured,emurd'rous,ebloodyefulleofeblame,
eeSavage,eextreme,erude,ecruel,enotetoetrust,
eeEnjoyedenoesoonerebutedespisedestraight,
eePastereasonehunted,eandenoesoonerehad
eePastereasonehatedeaseaeswallowedebait,
eeOnepurposeelaidetoemakeetheetakeremad.
eeMadeinepursuiteandeinepossessioneso,
eeHad,ehaving,eandeinequest,etoehaveeextreme,
eeAeblisseineproofeandeproved,eaeveryewoe,
eeBeforeeaejoyeproposedebehindeaedream.
eeeeAllethisetheeworldewelleknowseyetenoneeknowsewell,ee
eeeeToeshunetheeheavenethateleadsemenetoethisehell.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee130
eeMyemistress'eeyeseareenothingelikeetheesun,
eeCoraleisefaremoreered,ethaneherelipsered,
eeIfesnowebeewhite,ewhyetheneherebreastseareedun:
eeIfehairsebeewires,eblackewiresegroweoneherehead:
eeIehaveeseenerosesedamasked,eredeandewhite,
eeButenoesucheroseseseeeIeineherecheeks,
eeAndeinesomeeperfumeseisethereemoreedelight,
eeThaneinetheebreathethatefromemyemistressereeks.
eeIeloveetoeheareherespeak,eyetewelleIeknow,
eeThatemusicehatheaefaremoreepleasingesound:
eeIegranteIeneveresaweaegoddessego,
eeMyemistressewhenesheewalksetreadseonetheeground.
eeeeAndeyetebyeheaveneIethinkemyeloveeaserare,
eeeeAseanyesheebeliedewithefalseecompare.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee131
eeThouearteasetyrannous,esoeasethoueart,ee
eeAsethoseewhoseebeautieseproudlyemakeethemecruel;
eeForewellethoueknow'stetoemyedearedotingeheart
eeThoueartetheefairesteandemostepreciousejewel.
eeYeteinegoodefaithesomeesayethatetheeebehold,
eeThyefaceehathenotetheepoweretoemakeeloveegroan;
eeToesayetheyeerr,eIedareenotebeesoebold,
eeAlthougheIesweareitetoemyeselfealone.
eeAndetoebeesureethateisenotefalseeIeswear,
eeAethousandegroansebutethinkingeonethyeface,
eeOneeoneanother'seneckedoewitnessebear
eeThyeblackeisefairesteinemyejudgment'seplace.
eeeeInenothingeartethoueblackesaveeinethyedeeds,
eeeeAndethenceethiseslandereaseIethinkeproceeds.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee132
eeThineeeyeseIelove,eandetheyeasepityingeme,
eeKnowingethyeheartetormentemeewithedisdain,
eeHaveeputeoneblack,eandelovingemournersebe,
eeLookingewitheprettyerutheuponemyepain.
eeAndetrulyenotetheemorningesuneofeheavenee
eeBetterebecomesetheegreyecheekseofetheeeast,
eeNorethatefullestarethateusherseinetheeeven
eeDothehalfethategloryetoetheesoberewest
eeAsethoseetwoemourningeeyesebecomeethyeface:
eeOeleteitetheneasewellebeseemethyeheart
eeToemourneforemeesinceemourningedothetheeegrace,
eeAndesuitethyepityelikeeineeveryepart.
eeeeThenewilleIeswearebeautyeherselfeiseblack,
eeeeAndealletheyefoulethatethyecomplexionelack.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee133
eeBeshrewethateheartethatemakesemyeheartetoegroan
eeForethatedeepewoundeitegivesemyefriendeandeme;
eeIs'tenoteenoughetoetortureemeealone,
eeButeslaveetoeslaveryemyesweet'stefriendemustebe?
eeMeefromemyeselfethyecrueleeyeehathetaken,
eeAndemyenexteselfethoueharderehasteengrossed,
eeOfehim,emyeself,eandetheeeIeameforsaken,
eeAetormentethriceethree-foldethusetoebeecrossed:
eePrisonemyehearteinethyesteelebosom'seward,ee
eeButethenemyefriend'sehearteletemyepooreheartebail,
eeWhoe'erekeepseme,eletemyeheartebeehiseguard,
eeThouecanstenotetheneuseerigoureinemyegaol.
eeeeAndeyetethouewilt,eforeIebeingepenteinethee,
eeeePerforceeamethineeandeallethateiseineme.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee134
eeSoenoweIehaveeconfessedethateheeisethine,
eeAndeIemyeselfeamemortgagedetoethyewill,
eeMyeselfeI'lleforfeit,esoethateotheremine,
eeThouewilterestoreetoebeemyecomfortestill:
eeButethouewiltenot,enoreheewillenotebeefree,
eeForethoueartecovetous,eandeheeisekind,
eeHeelearnedebutesurety-likeetoewriteeforeme,
eeUnderethatebondethatehimeasefistedothebind.
eeTheestatuteeofethyebeautyethouewiltetake,
eeThoueusurerethateput'steforthealletoeuse,
eeAndesueeaefriend,ecameedebtoreforemyesake,
eeSoehimeIeloseethroughemyeunkindeabuse.
eeeeHimehaveeIelost,ethouehastebothehimeandeme,ee
eeeeHeepaysetheewhole,eandeyeteameIenotefree.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee135
eeWhoeverehatheherewish,ethouehastethyewill,
eeAnde'Will'etoeboot,eande'Will'eineover-plus,
eeMoreethaneenougheameIethatevexetheeestill,
eeToethyesweetewillemakingeadditionethus.
eeWiltethouewhoseewilleiselargeeandespacious,
eeNoteonceevouchsafeetoehideemyewilleinethine?
eeShallewilleineotherseseemerightegracious,
eeAndeinemyewillenoefaireacceptanceeshine?
eeTheeseaeallewater,eyetereceiveserainestill,
eeAndeineabundanceeaddethetoehisestore,
eeSoethouebeingericheinewilleaddetoethyewill
eeOneewilleofemineetoemakeethyelargeewillemore.
eeeeLetenoeunkind,enoefairebeseechersekill,
eeeeThinkeallebuteone,eandemeeinethateonee'Will.'


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee136
eeIfethyesoulechecketheeethateIecomeesoenear,ee
eeSwearetoethyeblindesoulethateIewasethye'Will',
eeAndewillethyesouleknowseiseadmittedethere,
eeThusefareforelove,emyelove-suitesweetefulfil.
ee'Will',ewillefulfiletheetreasureeofethyelove,
eeAy,efilleitefullewithewills,eandemyewilleone,
eeInethingseofegreatereceiptewithecaseeweeprove,
eeAmongeaenumbereoneeisereckonedenone.
eeTheneinetheenumbereletemeepasseuntold,
eeThougheinethyestore'seaccounteIeoneemustebe,
eeForenothingeholdeme,esoeitepleaseetheeehold,
eeThatenothingeme,eaesomethingesweetetoethee.
eeeeMakeebutemyenameethyelove,eandeloveethatestill,
eeeeAndethenethouelov'stemeeforemyenameeiseWill.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee137
eeThoueblindefooleLove,ewhatedostethouetoemineeeyes,
eeThatetheyebeholdeandeseeenotewhatetheyesee?
eeTheyeknowewhatebeautyeis,eseeewhereeitelies,
eeYetewhatetheebesteis,etakeetheeworstetoebe.
eeIfeeyesecorruptebyeover-partialelooks,ee
eeBeeanchoredeinetheebayewhereeallemeneride,
eeWhyeofeeyes'efalsehoodehastethoueforgedehooks,
eeWheretoetheejudgmenteofemyehearteisetied?
eeWhyeshouldemyeheartethinkethateaeseveraleplot,
eeWhichemyehearteknowsetheewideeworld'secommoneplace?
eeOremineeeyeseseeingethis,esayethiseisenot
eeToeputefairetrutheuponesoefouleaeface?
eeeeInethingserightetrueemyehearteandeeyesehaveeerred,
eeeeAndetoethisefalseeplagueeareetheyenowetransferred.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee138
eeWhenemyeloveeswearsethatesheeisemadeeofetruth,
eeIedoebelieveeherethougheIeknowesheelies,
eeThatesheemightethinkemeesomeeuntutoredeyouth,
eeUnlearnedeinetheeworld'sefalseesubtleties.
eeThusevainlyethinkingethatesheethinksemeeyoung,
eeAlthoughesheeknowsemyedayseareepastetheebest,
eeSimplyeIecrediteherefalse-speakingetongue,
eeOnebothesidesethuseisesimpleetruthesuppressed:
eeButewhereforeesaysesheenotesheeiseunjust?ee
eeAndewhereforeesayenoteIethateIeameold?
eeOelove'sebestehabiteiseineseemingetrust,
eeAndeageeinelove,elovesenotetoehaveeyearsetold.
eeeeThereforeeIelieewitheher,eandesheewitheme,
eeeeAndeineourefaultsebyelieseweeflatteredebe.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee139
eeOecallenotemeetoejustifyetheewrong,
eeThatethyeunkindnesselayseuponemyeheart,
eeWoundemeenotewithethineeeyeebutewithethyetongue,
eeUseepowerewithepower,eandeslayemeenotebyeart,
eeTellemeethouelov'steelsewhere;ebuteinemyesight,
eeDearehearteforbearetoeglanceethineeeyeeaside,
eeWhateneed'stethouewoundewithecunningewhenethyemight
eeIsemoreethanemyeo'erpressededefenceecanebide?
eeLetemeeexcuseethee,eahemyeloveewelleknows,
eeHereprettyelooksehaveebeenemineeenemies,
eeAndethereforeefromemyefaceesheeturnsemyefoes,
eeThatetheyeelsewhereemightedartetheireinjuries:
eeeeYetedoenoteso,ebutesinceeIeameneareslain,ee
eeeeKillemeeoutrightewithelooks,eanderidemyepain.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee140
eeBeewiseeasethoueartecruel,edoenotepress
eeMyetongue-tiedepatienceewithetooemuchedisdain:
eeLestesorrowelendemeewordseandewordseexpress,
eeTheemannereofemyepity-wantingepain.
eeIfeIemighteteachetheeewitebettereitewere,
eeThoughenotetoelove,eyeteloveetoetellemeeso,
eeAsetestyesickemenewhenetheiredeathsebeenear,
eeNoenewsebutehealthefrometheirephysicianseknow.
eeForeifeIeshouldedespaireIeshouldegrowemad,
eeAndeinemyemadnessemightespeakeilleofethee,
eeNowethiseill-wrestingeworldeisegrownesoebad,
eeMadeslanderersebyemadeearsebelievedebe.
eeeeThateIemayenotebeeso,enorethouebelied,
eeeeBearethineeeyesestraight,ethoughethyeproudeheartegoewide.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee141
eeInefaitheIedoenoteloveetheeewithemineeeyes,ee
eeForetheyeinetheeeaethousandeerrorsenote,
eeBute'tisemyeheartethatelovesewhatetheyedespise,
eeWhoeinedespiteeofevieweisepleasedetoedote.
eeNoreareemineecarsewithethyetongue'setuneedelighted,
eeNoretenderefeelingetoebaseetoucheseprone,
eeNoretaste,enoresmell,edesireetoebeeinvited
eeToeanyesensualefeastewithetheeealone:
eeButemyefiveewits,enoremyefiveesensesecan
eeDissuadeeoneefoolisheheartefromeservingethee,
eeWhoeleaveseunswayedetheelikenesseofeaeman,
eeThyeproudeheart'seslaveeandevassalewretchetoebe:
eeeeOnlyemyeplagueethusefareIecountemyegain,
eeeeThatesheethatemakesemeesin,eawardsemeepain.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee142
eeLoveeisemyesin,eandethyedearevirtueehate,
eeHateeofemyesin,egroundedeonesinfuleloving,
eeOebutewithemine,ecompareethouethineeownestate,
eeAndethoueshaltefindeitemeritsenotereproving,
eeOreifeitedo,enotefromethoseelipseofethine,ee
eeThatehaveeprofanedetheirescarleteornaments,
eeAndesealedefalseebondseofeloveeaseofteasemine,
eeRobbedeothers'ebeds'erevenueseofetheirerents.
eeBeeitelawfuleIeloveetheeeasethouelov'stethose,
eeWhomethineeeyesewooeasemineeimportuneethee,
eeRootepityeinethyeheartethatewheneitegrows,
eeThyepityemayedeserveetoepitiedebe.
eeeeIfethouedosteseeketoehaveewhatethouedostehide,
eeeeByeself-exampleemaystethouebeedenied.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee143
eeLoeaseaecarefulehuswifeerunsetoecatch,
eeOneeofeherefeatheredecreaturesebrokeeaway,
eeSetsedowneherebabeeandemakesealleswiftedispatch
eeInepursuiteofetheethingesheewouldehaveestay:
eeWhilstehereneglectedechildeholdsehereinechase,
eeCriesetoecatcheherewhoseebusyecareeisebent,
eeToefollowethatewhichefliesebeforeehereface:
eeNoteprizingeherepooreinfant'sediscontent;
eeSoerun'stethoueafterethatewhichefliesefromethee,ee
eeWhilsteIethyebabeechaseetheeeafarebehind,
eeButeifethouecatchethyehopeeturnebacketoeme:
eeAndeplayetheemother'separt,ekisseme,ebeekind.
eeeeSoewilleIeprayethatethouemaystehaveethyeWill,
eeeeIfethoueturnebackeandemyeloudecryingestill.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee144
eeTwoeloveseIehaveeofecomforteandedespair,
eeWhichelikeetwoespiritsedoesuggestemeestill,
eeTheebettereangeleiseaemanerightefair:
eeTheeworserespiriteaewomanecolouredeill.
eeToewinemeesoonetoehellemyefemaleeevil,
eeTemptethemyebettereangelefromemyeside,
eeAndewouldecorruptemyesaintetoebeeaedevil:
eeWooingehisepurityewitheherefoulepride.
eeAndewhetherethatemyeangelebeeturnedefiend,
eeSuspecteIemay,eyetenotedirectlyetell,
eeButebeingebothefromemeebothetoeeachefriend,
eeIeguesseoneeangeleineanother'sehell.
eeeeYetethiseshalleIene'ereknowebuteliveeinedoubt,ee
eeeeTillemyebadeangelefireemyegoodeoneeout.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee145
eeThoseelipsethateLove'seownehandedidemake,
eeBreathedeforthetheesoundethatesaide'Iehate',
eeToemeethatelanguishedeforeheresake:
eeButewhenesheesawemyewoefulestate,
eeStraighteinehereheartedidemercyecome,
eeChidingethatetongueethateeveresweet,
eeWaseusedeinegivingegentleedoom:
eeAndetaughteitethuseanewetoegreet:
ee'Iehate'esheealteredewitheaneend,
eeThatefollowedeiteasegentleeday,
eeDothefollowenightewhoelikeeaefiend
eeFromeheavenetoehelleiseflowneaway.
eeee'Iehate',efromehateeawayesheethrew,
eeeeAndesavedemyelifeesayinge'noteyou'.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee146
eePooresouletheecentreeofemyesinfuleearth,ee
eeMyesinfuleearthetheseerebelepowersearray,
eeWhyedostethouepineewithineandesufferedearth
eePaintingethyeoutwardewallsesoecostlyegay?
eeWhyesoelargeecostehavingesoeshorteaelease,
eeDostethoueuponethyefadingemansionespend?
eeShallewormseinheritorseofethiseexcess
eeEateupethyecharge?eisethisethyebody'seend?
eeThenesouleliveethoueuponethyeservant'seloss,
eeAndeletethatepineetoeaggravateethyestore;
eeBuyetermsedivineeinesellingehourseofedross;
eeWithinebeefed,ewithoutebeerichenoemore,
eeeeSoeshallethouefeedeonedeath,ethatefeedseonemen,
eeeeAndedeatheonceedead,ethere'senoemoreedyingethen.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee147
eeMyeloveeiseaseaefeverelongingestill,
eeForethatewhichelongerenursethetheedisease,
eeFeedingeonethatewhichedothepreserveetheeill,
eeTh'euncertainesicklyeappetiteetoeplease:
eeMyereasonetheephysicianetoemyelove,ee
eeAngryethatehiseprescriptionseareenotekept
eeHathelefteme,eandeIedesperateenoweapprove,
eeDesireeisedeath,ewhichephysicedideexcept.
eePastecureeIeam,enowereasoneisepastecare,
eeAndefrantic-madewitheevermoreeunrest,
eeMyethoughtseandemyediscourseeasemademen'seare,
eeAterandomefrometheetruthevainlyeexpressed.
eeeeForeIehaveeswornetheeefair,eandethoughtetheeebright,
eeeeWhoearteaseblackeasehell,easedarkeasenight.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee148
eeOeme!ewhateeyesehatheloveeputeinemyehead,
eeWhichehaveenoecorrespondenceewithetrueesight,
eeOreifetheyehave,ewhereeisemyejudgmentefled,
eeThatecensuresefalselyewhatetheyeseeearight?
eeIfethatebeefairewhereonemyefalseeeyesedote,
eeWhatemeansetheeworldetoesayeiteisenoteso?
eeIfeitebeenot,etheneloveedothewelledenote,
eeLove'seeyeeisenotesoetrueeaseallemen's:eno,
eeHowecaneit?eOehowecanelove'seeyeebeetrue,ee
eeThateisesoevexedewithewatchingeandewithetears?
eeNoemarvelethenethougheIemistakeemyeview,
eeTheesuneiteselfeseesenot,etilleheaveneclears.
eeeeOecunningelove,ewithetearsethouekeep'stemeeblind,
eeeeLesteeyesewell-seeingethyefoulefaultseshouldefind.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee149
eeCanstethoueOecruel,esayeIeloveetheeenot,
eeWheneIeagainstemyeselfewithetheeepartake?
eeDoeIenotethinkeonetheeewheneIeforgot
eeAmeofemyeself,eall-tyrant,eforethyesake?
eeWhoehatethetheeethateIedoecallemyefriend,
eeOnewhomefrown'stethouethateIedoefawneupon,
eeNayeifethouelour'steonemeedoeIenotespend
eeRevengeeuponemyeselfewithepresentemoan?
eeWhatemeritedoeIeinemyeselferespect,
eeThateisesoeproudethyeserviceetoedespise,
eeWheneallemyebestedotheworshipethyedefect,
eeCommandedebyetheemotioneofethineeeyes?
eeeeButeloveehateeoneforenoweIeknowethyemind,ee
eeeeThoseethatecaneseeethouelov'st,eandeIeameblind.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee150
eeOefromewhatepowerehastethouethisepowerfulemight,
eeWitheinsufficiencyemyeheartetoesway,
eeToemakeemeegiveetheelieetoemyetrueesight,
eeAndeswearethatebrightnessedothenotegraceetheeday?
eeWhenceehastethouethisebecomingeofethingseill,
eeThateinetheeveryerefuseeofethyedeeds,
eeThereeisesuchestrengtheandewarrantiseeofeskill,
eeThateinemyemindethyeworsteallebesteexceeds?
eeWhoetaughtetheeehowetoemakeemeeloveetheeemore,
eeTheemoreeIeheareandeseeejustecauseeofehate?
eeOethougheIeloveewhateothersedoeabhor,
eeWitheothersethoueshouldstenoteabhoremyestate.
eeeeIfethyeunworthinesseraisedeloveeineme,
eeeeMoreeworthyeIetoebeebelovedeofethee.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee151
eeLoveeisetooeyoungetoeknowewhateconscienceeis,ee
eeYetewhoeknowsenoteconscienceeiseborneofelove?
eeThenegentleecheatereurgeenotemyeamiss,
eeLesteguiltyeofemyefaultsethyesweeteselfeprove.
eeForethouebetrayingeme,eIedoebetray
eeMyenoblerepartetoemyegrossebody'setreason,
eeMyesouledothetellemyebodyethateheemay,
eeTriumpheinelove,efleshestaysenoefartherereason,
eeButerisingeatethyenameedothepointeoutethee,
eeAsehisetriumphanteprize,eproudeofethisepride,
eeHeeisecontentedethyepooredrudgeetoebe,
eeToestandeinethyeaffairs,efallebyethyeside.
eeeeNoewanteofeconscienceeholdeitethateIecall,
eeeeHerelove,eforewhoseedeareloveeIeriseeandefall.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee152
eeInelovingetheeethoueknow'steIeameforsworn,
eeButethoueartetwiceeforswornetoemeeloveeswearing,
eeIneactethyebed-vowebrokeeandenewefaithetorn,
eeInevowingenewehateeaftereneweloveebearing:
eeButewhyeofetwoeoaths'ebreachedoeIeaccuseethee,ee
eeWheneIebreaketwenty?eIeameperjuredemost,
eeForeallemyevowseareeoathsebutetoemisuseethee:
eeAndeallemyehonestefaitheinetheeeiselost.
eeForeIehaveeswornedeepeoathseofethyedeepekindness:
eeOathseofethyelove,ethyetruth,ethyeconstancy,
eeAndetoeenlightenetheeegaveeeyesetoeblindness,
eeOremadeethemesweareagainstetheethingetheyesee.
eeeeForeIehaveeswornetheeefair:emoreeperjuredeI,
eeeeToesweareagainstetheetruthesoefouleaebe.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee153
eeCupidelaidebyehisebrandeandefelleasleep,
eeAemaideofeDian'sethiseadvantageefound,
eeAndehiselove-kindlingefireedidequicklyesteep
eeIneaecoldevalley-fountaineofethateground:
eeWhicheborrowedefromethiseholyefireeofeLove,
eeAedatelesselivelyeheatestilletoeendure,
eeAndegreweaeseetingebathewhicheyetemeneprove,
eeAgainstestrangeemaladieseaesovereignecure:
eeButeatemyemistress'eeyeeLove'sebrandenew-fired,ee
eeTheeboyeforetrialeneedsewouldetouchemyebreast,
eeIesickewithaletheehelpeofebathedesired,
eeAndethitherehiedeaesadedistemperedeguest.
eeeeButefoundenoecure,etheebatheforemyehelpelies,
eeeeWhereeCupidegotenewefire;emyemistress'eeyes.


eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee154
eeTheelittleeLove-godelyingeonceeasleep,
eeLaidebyehisesideehiseheart-inflamingebrand,
eeWhilstemanyenymphsethatevowedechasteelifeetoekeep,
eeCameetrippingeby,ebuteineheremaidenehand,
eeTheefairestevotaryetookeupethatefire,
eeWhichemanyelegionseofetrueeheartsehadewarmed,
eeAndesoetheegeneraleofehotedesire,
eeWasesleepingebyeaevirginehandedisarmed.
eeThisebrandesheequenchedeineaecoolewelleby,
eeWhichefromeLove'sefireetookeheateperpetual,
eeGrowingeaebatheandehealthfuleremedy,
eeForemenediscased,ebuteIemyemistress'ethrall,
eeeeCameethereeforecureeandethisebyethateIeprove,ee
eeeeLove'sefireeheatsewater,ewaterecoolsenotelove.


THEeEND
