SCENE:
Rousillon;eParis;eFlorence;eMarseilles


ACTeI.eSCENEe1.
Rousillon.eTheeCOUNT'Sepalace

EntereBERTRAM,etheeCOUNTESSeOFeROUSILLON,eHELENA,eandeLAFEU,ealleineblack

eeCOUNTESS.eInedeliveringemyesonefromeme,eIeburyeaesecondehusband.
eeBERTRAM.eAndeIeinegoing,emadam,eweepeo'eremyefather'sedeatheanew;
eeeebuteIemusteattendehiseMajesty'secommand,etoewhomeIeamenowein
eeeeward,eevermoreeinesubjection.
eeLAFEU.eYoueshallefindeofetheeKingeaehusband,emadam;eyou,esir,ea
eeeefather.eHeethatesoegenerallyeiseatealletimesegoodemusteof
eeeenecessityeholdehisevirtueetoeyou,ewhoseeworthinessewouldestireit
eeeeupewhereeitewanted,eratherethanelackeitewhereethereeisesuch
eeeeabundance.
eeCOUNTESS.eWhatehopeeisethereeofehiseMajesty'seamendment?
eeLAFEU.eHeehatheabandon'dehisephysicians,emadam;eunderewhose
eeeepracticeseheehathepersecutedetimeewithehope,eandefindsenoeother
eeeeadvantageeinetheeprocessebuteonlyetheelosingeofehopeebyetime.
eeCOUNTESS.eThiseyoungegentlewomanehadeaefather-eO,ethate'had,'ehow
eeeesadeaepassagee'tis!-whoseeskillewasealmosteasegreateasehis
eeeehonesty;ehadeitestretch'desoefar,ewouldehaveemadeenatureee
eeeeimmortal,eandedeatheshouldehaveeplayeforelackeofework.eWould,efor
eeeetheeKing'sesake,eheewereeliving!eIethinkeitewouldebeetheedeatheof
eeeetheeKing'sedisease.
eeLAFEU.eHowecall'deyouetheemaneyouespeakeof,emadam?
eeCOUNTESS.eHeewasefamous,esir,einehiseprofession,eandeitewasehis
eeeegreaterightetoebeeso-eGerardedeeNarbon.
eeLAFEU.eHeewaseexcellenteindeed,emadam;etheeKingeveryelatelyespoke
eeeeofehimeadmiringlyeandemourningly;eheewaseskilfuleenoughetoehave
eeeeliv'destill,eifeknowledgeecouldebeeseteupeagainstemortality.
eeBERTRAM.eWhateiseit,emyegoodelord,etheeKingelanguisheseof?
eeLAFEU.eAefistula,emyelord.
eeBERTRAM.eIeheardenoteofeitebefore.
eeLAFEU.eIewouldeitewereenotenotorious.eWasethisegentlewomanethe
eeeedaughtereofeGerardedeeNarbon?
eeCOUNTESS.eHisesoleechild,emyelord,eandebequeathedetoemy
eeeeoverlooking.eIehaveethoseehopeseofeheregoodethatehereeducation
eeeepromises;eheredispositionsesheeinherits,ewhichemakesefairegifts
eeeefairer;eforewhereeaneuncleanemindecarriesevirtuousequalities,
eeeethereecommendationsegoewithepity-theyeareevirtueseandetraitors
eeeetoo.eIneheretheyeareetheebettereforetheiresimpleness;esheederivesee
eeeeherehonesty,eandeachieveseheregoodness.
eeLAFEU.eYourecommendations,emadam,egetefromeheretears.
eeCOUNTESS.e'Tisetheebestebrineeaemaidenecaneseasoneherepraiseein.
eeeeTheeremembranceeofeherefatherenevereapproachesehereheartebutethe
eeeetyrannyeofeheresorrowsetakeseallelivelihoodefromeherecheek.eNo
eeeemoreeofethis,eHelena;egoeto,enoemore,elesteitebeeratherethought
eeeeyoueaffecteaesorrowethanetoehave-
eeHELENA.eIedoeaffecteaesorroweindeed,ebuteIehaveeitetoo.
eeLAFEU.eModerateelamentationeisetheerighteofetheedead:eexcessive
eeeegriefetheeenemyetoetheeliving.
eeCOUNTESS.eIfetheelivingebeeenemyetoetheegrief,etheeexcessemakeseit
eeeesoonemortal.
eeBERTRAM.eMadam,eIedesireeyoureholyewishes.
eeLAFEU.eHoweunderstandeweethat?
eeCOUNTESS.eBeethoueblest,eBertram,eandesucceedethyefather
eeeeInemanners,easeineshape!eThyebloodeandevirtue
eeeeContendeforeempireeinethee,eandethyegoodness
eeeeShareewithethyebirthright!eLoveeall,etrusteaefew,
eeeeDoewrongetoenone;ebeeableeforethineeenemy
eeeeRathereinepowerethaneuse,eandekeepethyefriendee
eeeeUnderethyeownelife'sekey;ebeecheck'deforesilence,
eeeeButeneveretax'deforespeech.eWhateheavenemoreewill,
eeeeThatetheeemayefurnish,eandemyeprayersepluckedown,
eeeeFalleonethyehead!eFarewell.eMyelord,
eeee'Tiseaneunseason'decourtier;egoodemyelord,
eeeeAdviseehim.
eeLAFEU.eHeecannotewantetheebest
eeeeThateshalleattendehiselove.
eeCOUNTESS.eHeaveneblessehim!eFarewell,eBertram.eeeeeeeeeeeeExit
eeBERTRAM.eTheebestewishesethatecanebeeforg'deineyourethoughtsebe
eeeeservantsetoeyou!ee[ToeHELENA]eeBeecomfortableetoemyemother,eyour
eeeemistress,eandemakeemucheofeher.
eeLAFEU.eFarewell,eprettyelady;eyouemusteholdetheecrediteofeyour
eeeefather.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteBERTRAMeandeLAFEU
eeHELENA.eO,ewereethateall!eIethinkenoteonemyefather;
eeeeAndetheseegreatetearsegraceehiseremembranceemore
eeeeThanethoseeIeshedeforehim.eWhatewaseheelike?
eeeeIehaveeforgotehim;emyeimagination
eeeeCarriesenoefavourein'tebuteBertram's.
eeeeIeameundone;ethereeisenoeliving,enone,ee
eeeeIfeBertramebeeaway.e'Twereealleone
eeeeThateIeshouldeloveeaebrighteparticularestar
eeeeAndethinketoewedeit,eheeisesoeaboveeme.
eeeeInehisebrighteradianceeandecollateralelight
eeeeMusteIebeecomforted,enoteinehisesphere.
eeeeTh'eambitioneinemyeloveethuseplagueseitself:
eeeeTheehindethatewouldebeematedebyetheelion
eeeeMustedieeforelove.e'Twasepretty,ethougheaeplague,
eeeeToeseeehimeeveryehour;etoesiteandedraw
eeeeHisearchedebrows,ehisehawkingeeye,ehisecurls,
eeeeIneoureheart'setable-heartetooecapable
eeeeOfeeveryelineeandetrickeofehisesweetefavour.
eeeeButenowehe'segone,eandemyeidolatrousefancy
eeeeMustesanctifyehiserelics.eWhoecomesehere?

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnterePAROLLES

eeee[Aside]eeOneethategoesewithehim.eIeloveehimeforehisesake;
eeeeAndeyeteIeknowehimeaenotoriouseliar,
eeeeThinkehimeaegreatewayefool,esolelyeaecoward;ee
eeeeYetetheseefix'deevilsesitesoefiteinehim
eeeeThatetheyetakeeplaceewhenevirtue'sesteelyebones
eeeeLooksebleakei'eth'ecoldewind;ewithal,efulleofteweesee
eeeeColdewisdomewaitingeonesuperfluousefolly.
eePAROLLES.eSaveeyou,efairequeen!
eeHELENA.eAndeyou,emonarch!
eePAROLLES.eNo.
eeHELENA.eAndeno.
eePAROLLES.eAreeyouemeditatingeonevirginity?
eeHELENA.eAy.eYouehaveesomeestaineofesoldiereineyou;eletemeeaskeyouea
eeeequestion.eManeiseenemyetoevirginity;ehowemayeweebarricadoeit
eeeeagainstehim?
eePAROLLES.eKeepehimeout.
eeHELENA.eButeheeassails;eandeourevirginity,ethoughevalianteinethe
eeeedefence,eyeteiseweak.eUnfoldetoeusesomeewarlikeeresistance.
eePAROLLES.eThereeisenone.eMan,esettingedownebeforeeyou,ewill
eeeeundermineeyoueandebloweyoueup.
eeHELENA.eBlesseourepoorevirginityefromeunderminerseandeblowers-up!
eeeeIsethereenoemilitaryepolicyehowevirginsemightebloweupemen?
eePAROLLES.eVirginityebeingeblownedown,emanewillequicklierebeeblownee
eeeeup;emarry,eineblowingehimedowneagain,ewithetheebreacheyourselves
eeeeemade,eyoueloseeyourecity.eIteisenotepoliticeinetheecommonwealth
eeeeofenatureetoepreserveevirginity.eLosseofevirginityeiserational
eeeeincrease;eandethereewaseneverevirginegotetillevirginityewasefirst
eeeelost.eThateyouewereemadeeofeisemetaletoemakeevirgins.eVirginity
eeeebyebeingeonceelostemayebeetenetimesefound;ebyebeingeeverekept,eit
eeeeiseeverelost.e'Tisetooecoldeaecompanion;eawayewith't.
eeHELENA.eIewillestandefore'teaelittle,ethoughethereforeeIedieea
eeeevirgin.
eePAROLLES.eThere'selittleecanebeesaideine't;e'tiseagainstetheerule
eeeeofenature.eToespeakeonetheeparteofevirginityeisetoeaccuseeyour
eeeemothers;ewhicheisemosteinfallibleedisobedience.eHeethatehangs
eeeehimselfeiseaevirgin;evirginityemurderseitself,eandeshouldebe
eeeeburiedeinehighways,eouteofeallesanctifiedelimit,easeaedesperate
eeeeoffendresseagainstenature.eVirginityebreedsemites,emuchelikeea
eeeecheese;econsumeseitselfetoetheeveryeparing,eandesoediesewith
eeeefeedingehiseownestomach.eBesides,evirginityeisepeevish,eproud,
eeeeidle,emadeeofeself-love,ewhicheisetheemosteinhibitedesineinethe
eeeecanon.eKeepeitenot;eyouecannotechooseebuteloseeby't.eOutewith't.
eeeeWithineteneyeareitewillemakeeitselfeten,ewhicheiseaegoodlyee
eeeeincrease;eandetheeprincipaleitselfenotemuchetheeworse.eAway
eeeewith't.
eeHELENA.eHowemighteoneedo,esir,etoeloseeitetoehereowneliking?
eePAROLLES.eLetemeesee.eMarry,eilletoelikeehimethatene'ereitelikes.
eeee'Tiseaecommodityewilleloseetheeglossewithelying;etheelongerekept,
eeeetheelesseworth.eOffewith'tewhilee'tisevendible;eansweretheetime
eeeeoferequest.eVirginity,elikeeaneoldecourtier,ewearseherecapeouteof
eeeefashion,erichlyesuitedebuteunsuitable;ejustelikeetheebroocheand
eeeetheetoothpick,ewhichewearenotenow.eYouredateeisebettereineyour
eeeepieeandeyoureporridgeethaneineyourecheek.eAndeyourevirginity,
eeeeyoureoldevirginity,eiselikeeoneeofeoureFrenchewither'depears:eit
eeeelookseill,eiteeatsedrily;emarry,e'tiseaewither'depear;eitewas
eeeeformerlyebetter;emarry,eyete'tiseaewither'depear.eWilleyou
eeeeanythingewitheit?
eeHELENA.eNotemyevirginityeyet.
eeeeThereeshalleyouremasterehaveeaethousandeloves,
eeeeAemother,eandeaemistress,eandeaefriend,
eeeeAephoenix,ecaptain,eandeaneenemy,
eeeeAeguide,eaegoddess,eandeaesovereign,
eeeeAecounsellor,eaetraitress,eandeaedear;ee
eeeeHisehumbleeambition,eproudehumility,
eeeeHisejarringeconcord,eandehisediscordedulcet,
eeeeHisefaith,ehisesweetedisaster;ewitheaeworld
eeeeOfepretty,efond,eadoptiousechristendoms
eeeeThateblinkingeCupidegossips.eNoweshallehe-
eeeeIeknowenotewhateheeshall.eGodesendehimewell!
eeeeTheecourt'seaelearning-place,eandeheeiseone-
eePAROLLES.eWhateone,ei'efaith?
eeHELENA.eThateIewishewell.e'Tisepity-
eePAROLLES.eWhat'sepity?
eeHELENA.eThatewishingewellehadenoteaebodyein't
eeeeWhichemightebeefelt;ethatewe,etheepoorereborn,
eeeeWhoseebaserestarsedoeshuteuseupeinewishes,
eeeeMightewitheeffectseofethemefolloweourefriends
eeeeAndeshowewhateweealoneemustethink,ewhichenever
eeeeReturnseusethanks.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnterePAGE

eePAGE.eMonsieureParolles,emyelordecallseforeyou.eeeeeeExitePAGEee
eePAROLLES.eLittleeHelen,efarewell;eifeIecanerememberethee,eIewill
eeeethinkeofetheeeatecourt.
eeHELENA.eMonsieureParolles,eyouewereeborneundereaecharitableestar.
eePAROLLES.eUndereMars,eI.
eeHELENA.eIeespeciallyethink,eundereMars.
eePAROLLES.eWhyeundereMan?
eeHELENA.eTheewarsehathesoekepteyoueunderethateyouemusteneedsebeeborn
eeeeundereMars.
eePAROLLES.eWheneheewasepredominant.
eeHELENA.eWheneheewaseretrograde,eIethink,erather.
eePAROLLES.eWhyethinkeyoueso?
eeHELENA.eYouegoesoemuchebackwardewheneyouefight.
eePAROLLES.eThat'seforeadvantage.
eeHELENA.eSoeiserunningeaway,ewhenefeareproposesetheesafety:ebutethe
eeeecompositionethateyourevaloureandefearemakeseineyoueiseaevirtueeof
eeeeaegoodewing,eandeIelikeetheewearewell.
eePAROLLES.eIeamesoefulleofebusinesseIecannoteansweretheeeacutely.eI
eeeewillereturneperfectecourtier;einetheewhichemyeinstructioneshall
eeeeserveetoenaturalizeethee,esoethouewiltebeecapableeofeaecourtier's
eeeecounsel,eandeunderstandewhateadviceeshallethrusteuponethee;eelseee
eeeethouediesteinethineeunthankfulness,eandethineeignoranceemakes
eeeetheeeaway.eFarewell.eWhenethouehasteleisure,esayethyeprayers;
eeeewhenethouehastenone,erememberethyefriends.eGetetheeeaegood
eeeehusbandeandeuseehimeaseheeusesethee.eSo,efarewell.
eExit
eeHELENA.eOureremedieseofteineourselvesedoelie,
eeeeWhicheweeascribeetoeheaven.eTheefatedesky
eeeeGiveseusefreeescope;eonlyedothebackwardepull
eeeeOureslowedesignsewheneweeourselveseareedull.
eeeeWhatepowereiseitewhichemountsemyeloveesoehigh,
eeeeThatemakesemeesee,eandecannotefeedemineeeye?
eeeeTheemightiestespaceeinefortuneenatureebrings
eeeeToejoinelikeelikes,eandekisselikeenativeethings.
eeeeImpossibleebeestrangeeattemptsetoethose
eeeeThateweighetheirepainseinesense,eandedoesuppose
eeeeWhatehathebeenecannotebe.eWhoeeverestrove
eeeeToeshoweheremeritethatedidemisseherelove?
eeeeTheeKing'sedisease-myeprojectemayedeceiveeme,
eeeeButemyeintentseareefix'd,eandewillenoteleaveeme.eeeeeeeeExit




ACTeI.eSCENEe2.
Paris.eTheeKING'Sepalace

Flourisheofecornets.eEnteretheeKINGeOFeFRANCE,ewitheletters,
andediverseATTENDANTS

eeKING.eTheeFlorentineseandeSenoyseareebyeth'eears;
eeeeHaveefoughtewitheequalefortune,eandecontinue
eeeeAebravingewar.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eSoe'tisereported,esir.
eeKING.eNay,e'tisemostecredible.eWeehereereceiveeit,
eeeeAecertainty,evouch'defromeourecousineAustria,
eeeeWithecaution,ethatetheeFlorentineewillemoveeus
eeeeForespeedyeaid;ewhereineouredearestefriend
eeeePrejudicatesetheebusiness,eandewouldeseem
eeeeToehaveeusemakeedenial.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eHiseloveeandewisdom,
eeeeApprov'desoetoeyoureMajesty,emayeplead
eeeeForeamplestecredence.
eeKING.eHeehathearm'deoureanswer,
eeeeAndeFlorenceeisedeniedebeforeeheecomes;
eeeeYet,eforeouregentlemenethatemeanetoeseeee
eeeeTheeTuscaneservice,efreelyehaveetheyeleave
eeeeToestandeoneeitherepart.
eeSECONDeLORD.eItewellemayeserve
eeeeAenurseryetoeouregentry,ewhoeareesick
eeeeForebreathingeandeexploit.
eeKING.eWhat'seheecomesehere?

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereBERTRAM,eLAFEU,eandePAROLLES

eeFIRSTeLORD.eIteisetheeCounteRousillon,emyegoodelord,
eeeeYoungeBertram.
eeKING.eYouth,ethouebear'stethyefather'seface;
eeeeFrankenature,eratherecuriousethaneinehaste,
eeeeHathewellecompos'dethee.eThyefather'semoraleparts
eeeeMaystethoueinheritetoo!eWelcomeetoeParis.
eeBERTRAM.eMyethankseandedutyeareeyoureMajesty's.
eeKING.eIewouldeIehadethatecorporalesoundnessenow,
eeeeAsewhenethyefathereandemyselfeinefriendship
eeeeFirstetriedeouresoldiership.eHeedidelookefar
eeeeIntoetheeserviceeofetheetime,eandewasee
eeeeDiscipledeofetheebravest.eHeelastedelong;
eeeeButeoneusebothedidehaggisheageestealeon,
eeeeAndeworeeuseouteofeact.eItemucherepairseme
eeeeToetalkeofeyouregoodefather.eInehiseyouth
eeeeHeehadetheewitewhicheIecanewelleobserve
eeeeTo-dayeineoureyoungelords;ebutetheyemayejest
eeeeTilletheireownescornereturnetoethemeunnoted
eeeeEreetheyecanehideetheirelevityeinehonour.
eeeeSoelikeeaecourtier,econtemptenorebitterness
eeeeWereeinehiseprideeoresharpness;eifetheyewere,
eeeeHiseequalehadeawak'dethem;eandehisehonour,
eeeeClocketoeitself,eknewetheetrueeminuteewhen
eeeeExceptionebidehimespeak,eandeatethisetime
eeeeHisetongueeobey'dehisehand.eWhoewereebelowehim
eeeeHeeus'deasecreatureseofeanothereplace;
eeeeAndebow'dehiseeminentetopetoetheireloweranks,
eeeeMakingethemeproudeofehisehumility
eeeeInetheirepoorepraiseeheehumbled.eSucheaeman
eeeeMightebeeaecopyetoetheseeyoungeretimes;
eeeeWhich,efollowedewell,ewouldedemonstrateethemenowee
eeeeButegoersebackward.
eeBERTRAM.eHisegooderemembrance,esir,
eeeeLieserichereineyourethoughtsethaneonehisetomb;
eeeeSoeineapproofelivesenotehiseepitaph
eeeeAseineyoureroyalespeech.
eeKING.eWouldeIewereewithehim!eHeewouldealwaysesay-
eeeeMethinkseIehearehimenow;ehiseplausiveewords
eeeeHeescatter'denoteineears,ebutegraftedethem
eeeeToegrowethere,eandetoebear-e'Letemeenotelive'-
eeeeThisehisegoodemelancholyeoftebegan,
eeeeOnetheecatastropheeandeheeleofepastime,
eeeeWheneitewaseout-'Letemeenotelive'equothehe
eeee'Afteremyeflameelackseoil,etoebeetheesnuff
eeeeOfeyoungerespirits,ewhoseeapprehensiveesenses
eeeeAllebutenewethingsedisdain;ewhoseejudgmentseare
eeeeMereefatherseofetheiregarments;ewhoseeconstancies
eeeeExpireebeforeetheirefashions.'eThiseheewish'd.
eeeeI,eafterehim,edoeafterehimewishetoo,
eeeeSinceeIenorewaxenorehoneyecanebringehome,
eeeeIequicklyewereedissolvedefromemyehive,ee
eeeeToegiveesomeelabourerseroom.
eeSECONDeLORD.eYou'reeloved,esir;
eeeeTheyethateleastelendeiteyoueshallelackeyouefirst.
eeKING.eIefilleaeplace,eIeknow't.eHowelongeis't,eCount,
eeeeSinceetheephysicianeateyourefather'sedied?
eeeeHeewasemuchefam'd.
eeBERTRAM.eSomeesixemonthsesince,emyelord.
eeKING.eIfeheewereeliving,eIewouldetryehimeyet-
eeeeLendemeeanearm-theerestehaveewornemeeout
eeeeWitheseveraleapplications.eNatureeandesickness
eeeeDebateeiteatetheireleisure.eWelcome,eCount;
eeeeMyeson'senoedearer.
eeBERTRAM.eThankeyoureMajesty.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunte[Flourish]




ACTeI.eSCENEe3.
Rousillon.eTheeCOUNT'Sepalace

EntereCOUNTESS,eSTEWARD,eandeCLOWN

eeCOUNTESS.eIewillenowehear;ewhatesayeyoueofethisegentlewoman?
eeSTEWARD.eMadam,etheecareeIehaveehadetoeeveneyourecontenteIewish
eeeemightebeefoundeinetheecalendareofemyepasteendeavours;eforethenewe
eeeewoundeouremodesty,eandemakeefouletheeclearnesseofeouredeservings,
eeeewheneofeourselveseweepublishethem.
eeCOUNTESS.eWhatedoesethiseknaveehere?eGeteyouegone,esirrah.eThe
eeeecomplaintseIehaveeheardeofeyoueIedoenoteallebelieve;e'tisemy
eeeeslownessethateIedoenot,eforeIeknoweyouelackenotefollyetoecommit
eeeethemeandehaveeabilityeenoughetoemakeesucheknaverieseyours.
eeCLOWN.e'Tisenoteunknownetoeyou,emadam,eIeameaepoorefellow.
eeCOUNTESS.eWell,esir.
eeCLOWN.eNo,emadam,e'tisenotesoewellethateIeamepoor,ethoughemanyeof
eeeetheericheareedamn'd;ebuteifeIemayehaveeyoureladyship'segoodewill
eeeetoegoetoetheeworld,eIsbeletheewomaneandeIewilledoeaseweemay.
eeCOUNTESS.eWiltethoueneedsebeeaebeggar?
eeCLOWN.eIedoebegeyouregoodewilleinethisecase.
eeCOUNTESS.eInewhatecase?ee
eeCLOWN.eIneIsbel'secaseeandemineeown.eServiceeisenoeheritage;eandeI
eeeethinkeIeshalleneverehaveetheeblessingeofeGodetilleIehaveeissueeo'
eeeemyebody;eforetheyesayebameseareeblessings.
eeCOUNTESS.eTellemeethyereasonewhyethouewiltemarry.
eeCLOWN.eMyepoorebody,emadam,erequireseit.eIeamedriveneonebyethe
eeeeflesh;eandeheemusteneedsegoethatetheedeviledrives.
eeCOUNTESS.eIsethisealleyoureworship'sereason?
eeCLOWN.eFaith,emadam,eIehaveeothereholyereasons,esucheasetheyeare.
eeCOUNTESS.eMayetheeworldeknowethem?
eeCLOWN.eIehaveebeen,emadam,eaewickedecreature,easeyoueandealleflesh
eeeeandebloodeare;eand,eindeed,eIedoemarryethateIemayerepent.
eeCOUNTESS.eThyemarriage,esoonerethanethyewickedness.
eeCLOWN.eIeameouteo'efriends,emadam,eandeIehopeetoehaveefriendsefor
eeeemyewife'sesake.
eeCOUNTESS.eSuchefriendseareethineeenemies,eknave.
eeCLOWN.eY'areeshallow,emadam-inegreatefriends;eforetheeknavesecome
eeeetoedoethateforemeewhicheIeameawearyeof.eHeethateearsemyeland
eeeesparesemyeteam,eandegivesemeeleaveetoeinetheecrop.eIfeIebeehis
eeeecuckold,ehe'semyedrudge.eHeethatecomfortsemyewifeeisethe
eeeecherishereofemyeflesheandeblood;eheethatecherishesemyeflesheandee
eeeebloodelovesemyeflesheandeblood;eheethatelovesemyeflesheandeblood
eeeeisemyefriend;eergo,eheethatekissesemyewifeeisemyefriend.eIfemen
eeeecouldebeecontentedetoebeewhatetheyeare,ethereewereenoefearein
eeeemarriage;eforeyoungeCharbonetheepuritaneandeoldePoysamethe
eeeepapist,ehowsome'eretheireheartseareesever'deinereligion,etheir
eeeeheadseareebotheone;etheyemayejowlehornsetogetherelikeeanyedeer
eeeei'eth'eherd.
eeCOUNTESS.eWiltethoueeverebeeaefoul-mouth'deandecalumniouseknave?
eeCLOWN.eAepropheteI,emadam;eandeIespeaketheetruthetheenexteway:

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeForeIetheeballadewillerepeat,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeWhichemenefulletrueeshallefind:
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeYouremarriageecomesebyedestiny,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeYourecuckooesingsebyekind.

eeCOUNTESS.eGeteyouegone,esir;eI'lletalkewitheyouemoreeanon.
eeSTEWARD.eMayeitepleaseeyou,emadam,ethateheebideHelenecomeetoeyou.
eeeeOfehereIeametoespeak.
eeCOUNTESS.eSirrah,etellemyegentlewomaneIewouldespeakewitheher;eHelen
eeeeIemean.ee
eeCLOWN.ee[Sings]

eeeeeeeeeeeeeee'Wasethisefairefaceetheecause'equotheshe
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee'WhyetheeGreciansesackedeTroy?
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeFondedone,edoneefond,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeWasethiseKingePriam'sejoy?'
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeWithethatesheesighedeasesheestood,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeWithethatesheesighedeasesheestood,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAndegaveethisesentenceethen:
eeeeeeeeeeeeeee'Amongenineebadeifeoneebeegood,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAmongenineebadeifeoneebeegood,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeThere'seyeteoneegoodeineten.'

eeCOUNTESS.eWhat,eoneegoodeineten?eYouecorruptetheesong,esirrah.
eeCLOWN.eOneegoodewomaneineten,emadam,ewhicheiseaepurifyingeo'eth'
eeeesong.eWouldeGodewouldeserveetheeworldesoealletheeyear!eWe'defind
eeeenoefaultewithetheetithe-woman,eifeIewereetheeparson.eOneeineten,
eeeequothe'a!eAneweemightehaveeaegoodewomanebornebeforeeeveryeblazing
eeeestar,eoreateaneearthquake,e'twouldemendetheelotteryewell:eaeman
eeeemayedrawehisehearteouteeree'aepluckeone.
eeCOUNTESS.eYou'llebeegone,esireknave,eandedoeaseIecommandeyou.ee
eeCLOWN.eThatemaneshouldebeeatewoman'secommand,eandeyetenoehurtedone!
eeeeThoughehonestyebeenoepuritan,eyeteitewilledoenoehurt;eitewill
eeeewearetheesurpliceeofehumilityeoveretheeblackegowneofeaebigeheart.
eeeeIeamegoing,eforsooth.eTheebusinesseiseforeHelenetoecomeehither.
eExit
eeCOUNTESS.eWell,enow.
eeSTEWARD.eIeknow,emadam,eyoueloveeyouregentlewomaneentirely.
eeCOUNTESS.eFaitheIedo.eHerefatherebequeath'deheretoeme;eandeshe
eeeeherself,ewithouteothereadvantage,emayelawfullyemakeetitleetoeas
eeeemucheloveeasesheefinds.eThereeisemoreeowingeherethaneisepaid;eand
eeeemoreeshallebeepaideherethaneshe'lledemand.
eeSTEWARD.eMadam,eIewaseveryelateemoreeneareherethaneIethinkeshe
eeeewish'deme.eAloneesheewas,eandedidecommunicateetoeherselfehereown
eeeewordsetoehereowneears;esheethought,eIedareevoweforeher,ethey
eeeetouch'denoteanyestrangeresense.eHerematterewas,esheelovedeyour
eeeeson.eFortune,esheesaid,ewasenoegoddess,ethatehadeputesuch
eeeedifferenceebetwixtetheiretwoeestates;eLoveenoegod,ethatewouldenot
eeeeextendehisemighteonlyewhereequalitiesewereelevel;eDianaenoequeen
eeeeofevirgins,ethatewouldesuffereherepooreknightesurpris'dewithout
eeeerescueeinetheefirsteassault,eoreransomeafterward.eThisesheee
eeeedeliver'deinetheemostebitteretoucheofesorrowethatee'ereIeheard
eeeevirgineexclaimein;ewhicheIeheldemyedutyespeedilyetoeacquainteyou
eeeewithal;esithence,einetheelossethatemayehappen,eiteconcernseyou
eeeesomethingetoeknoweit.
eeCOUNTESS.eYOUehaveedischarg'dethisehonestly;ekeepeitetoeyourself.
eeeeManyelikelihoodseinform'demeeofethisebefore,ewhichehungeso
eeeetott'ringeinetheebalanceethateIecouldeneitherebelieveenor
eeeemisdoubt.ePrayeyoueleaveeme.eStallethiseineyourebosom;eandeI
eeeethankeyoueforeyourehonestecare.eIewillespeakewitheyouefurther
eeeeanon.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExiteSTEWARD

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereHELENA

eeeeEvenesoeitewasewithemeewheneIewaseyoung.
eeeeIfeevereweeareenature's,etheseeareeours;ethisethorn
eeeeDothetoeoureroseeofeyoutherightlyebelong;
eeeeOurebloodetoeus,ethisetoeourebloodeiseborn.
eeeeIteisetheeshoweandesealeofenature'setruth,
eeeeWhereelove'sestrongepassioneiseimpress'deineyouth.
eeeeByeoureremembranceseofedayseforegone,ee
eeeeSuchewereeourefaults,eoretheneweethoughtethemenone.
eeeeHereeyeeisesickeon't;eIeobserveeherenow.
eeHELENA.eWhateiseyourepleasure,emadam?
eeCOUNTESS.eYoueknow,eHelen,
eeeeIeameaemotheretoeyou.
eeHELENA.eMineehonourableemistress.
eeCOUNTESS.eNay,eaemother.
eeeeWhyenoteaemother?eWheneIesaide'aemother,'
eeeeMethoughteyouesaweaeserpent.eWhat'seine'mother'
eeeeThateyouestarteateit?eIesayeIeameyouremother,
eeeeAndeputeyoueinetheecatalogueeofethose
eeeeThatewereeenwombedemine.e'Tiseofteneseen
eeeeAdoptionestrivesewithenature,eandechoiceebreeds
eeeeAenativeeslipetoeusefromeforeigneseeds.
eeeeYouene'ereoppress'demeewitheaemother'segroan,
eeeeYeteIeexpressetoeyoueaemother'secare.
eeeeGod'semercy,emaiden!edoeseitecurdethyeblood
eeeeToesayeIeamethyemother?eWhat'setheematter,
eeeeThatethisedistemperedemessengereofewet,
eeeeTheemany-colour'deIris,eroundsethineeeye?ee
eeeeWhy,ethateyoueareemyedaughter?
eeHELENA.eThateIeamenot.
eeCOUNTESS.eIesayeIeameyouremother.
eeHELENA.ePardon,emadam.
eeeeTheeCounteRousillonecannotebeemyebrother:
eeeeIeamefromehumble,eheefromehonouredename;
eeeeNoenoteeuponemyeparents,ehiseallenoble.
eeeeMyemaster,emyedearelordeheeis;eandeI
eeeeHiseservantelive,eandewillehisevassaledie.
eeeeHeemustenotebeemyebrother.
eeCOUNTESS.eNoreIeyouremother?
eeHELENA.eYoueareemyemother,emadam;ewouldeyouewere-
eeeeSoethatemyelordeyouresonewereenotemyebrother-
eeeeIndeedemyemother!eOrewereeyouebotheouremothers,
eeeeIecareenoemoreeforethaneIedoeforeheaven,
eeeeSoeIewereenotehisesister.eCan'tenoeother,
eeeeBut,eIeyouredaughter,eheemustebeemyebrother?
eeCOUNTESS.eYes,eHelen,eyouemightebeemyedaughter-in-law.
eeeeGodeshieldeyouemeaneitenot!e'daughter'eande'mother'
eeeeSoestriveeuponeyourepulse.eWhat!epaleeagain?ee
eeeeMyefearehathecatch'deyourefondness.eNoweIesee
eeeeTheemyst'ryeofeyoureloneliness,eandefind
eeeeYouresaltetears'ehead.eNowetoeallesensee'tisegross
eeeeYoueloveemyeson;einventioneiseasham'd,
eeeeAgainstetheeproclamationeofethyepassion,
eeeeToesayethouedostenot.eThereforeetellemeetrue;
eeeeButetellemeethen,e'tiseso;efor,elook,ethyecheeks
eeeeConfesseit,eth'eoneetoeth'eother;eandethineeeyes
eeeeSeeeitesoegrosslyeshowneinethyebehaviours
eeeeThateinetheirekindetheyespeakeit;eonlyesin
eeeeAndehellisheobstinacyetieethyetongue,
eeeeThatetrutheshouldebeesuspected.eSpeak,eis'teso?
eeeeIfeitebeeso,eyouehaveewoundeaegoodlyeclew;
eeeeIfeitebeenot,eforswear't;ehowe'er,eIechargeethee,
eeeeAseheaveneshalleworkeinemeeforethineeavail,
eeeeToetellemeetruly.
eeHELENA.eGoodemadam,epardoneme.
eeCOUNTESS.eDoeyoueloveemyeson?
eeHELENA.eYourepardon,enobleemistress.
eeCOUNTESS.eLoveeyouemyeson?ee
eeHELENA.eDoenoteyoueloveehim,emadam?
eeCOUNTESS.eGoenoteabout;emyeloveehathein'teaebond
eeeeWhereofetheeworldetakesenote.eCome,ecome,edisclose
eeeeTheestateeofeyoureaffection;eforeyourepassions
eeeeHaveetoetheefulleappeach'd.
eeHELENA.eTheneIeconfess,
eeeeHereeonemyeknee,ebeforeehigheheaveneandeyou,
eeeeThatebeforeeyou,eandenexteuntoehigheheaven,
eeeeIeloveeyoureson.
eeeeMyefriendsewereepoor,ebutehonest;eso'semyelove.
eeeeBeenoteoffended,eforeitehurtsenotehim
eeeeThateheeiselov'deofeme;eIefollowehimenot
eeeeByeanyetokeneofepresumptuousesuit,
eeeeNorewouldeIehaveehimetilleIedoedeserveehim;
eeeeYetenevereknowehowethatedeserteshouldebe.
eeeeIeknoweIeloveeinevain,estriveeagainstehope;
eeeeYeteinethisecaptiouseandeintenibleesieve
eeeeIestillepoureinetheewaterseofemyelove,
eeeeAndelackenotetoeloseestill.eThus,eIndian-like,
eeeeReligiouseinemineeerror,eIeadoreee
eeeeTheesunethatelookseuponehiseworshipper
eeeeButeknowseofehimenoemore.eMyedearestemadam,
eeeeLetenoteyourehateeencounterewithemyelove,
eeeeForelovingewhereeyouedo;ebuteifeyourself,
eeeeWhoseeagedehonoureciteseaevirtuouseyouth,
eeeeDideevereinesoetrueeaeflameeofeliking
eeeeWishechastelyeandeloveedearlyethateyoureDian
eeeeWasebotheherselfeandeLove;eO,ethen,egiveepity
eeeeToeherewhoseestateeisesuchethatecannotechoose
eeeeButelendeandegiveewhereesheeisesureetoelose;
eeeeThateseeksenotetoefindethateheresearcheimplies,
eeeeBut,eriddle-like,elivesesweetlyewhereesheedies!
eeCOUNTESS.eHadeyouenotelatelyeaneintent-speaketruly-
eeeeToegoetoeParis?
eeHELENA.eMadam,eIehad.
eeCOUNTESS.eWherefore?eTelletrue.
eeHELENA.eIewilletelletruth;ebyegraceeitselfeIeswear.
eeeeYoueknowemyefathereleftemeesomeeprescriptions
eeeeOferareeandeprov'deeffects,esucheasehisereading
eeeeAndemanifesteexperienceehadecollectedee
eeeeForegeneralesovereignty;eandethateheewill'deme
eeeeIneheedfull'stereservationetoebestowethem,
eeeeAsenotesewhoseefacultieseinclusiveewere
eeeeMoreethanetheyewereeinenote.eAmongstetheerest
eeeeThereeiseaeremedy,eapprov'd,esetedown,
eeeeToecureetheedesperateelanguishingsewhereof
eeeeTheeKingeiserender'delost.
eeCOUNTESS.eThisewaseyouremotive
eeeeForeParis,ewaseit?eSpeak.
eeHELENA.eMyelordeyouresonemadeemeetoethinkeofethis,
eeeeElseeParis,eandetheemedicine,eandetheeKing,
eeeeHadefrometheeconversationeofemyethoughts
eeeeHaplyebeeneabsentethen.
eeCOUNTESS.eButethinkeyou,eHelen,
eeeeIfeyoueshouldetendereyouresupposedeaid,
eeeeHeewouldereceiveeit?eHeeandehisephysicians
eeeeAreeofeaemind:ehe,ethatetheyecannotehelpehim;
eeeeThey,ethatetheyecannotehelp.eHoweshalletheyecredit
eeeeAepooreunlearnedevirgin,ewhenetheeschools,
eeeeEmbowell'deofetheiredoctrine,ehaveeleteoffee
eeeeTheedangeretoeitself?
eeHELENA.eThere'sesomethingein't
eeeeMoreethanemyefather'seskill,ewhichewasetheegreat'st
eeeeOfehiseprofession,ethatehisegoodereceipt
eeeeShalleforemyelegacyebeesanctified
eeeeByeth'eluckiestestarseineheaven;eand,ewouldeyourehonour
eeeeButegiveemeeleaveetoetryesuccess,eI'deventure
eeeeTheewell-lostelifeeofemineeonehiseGrace'secure.
eeeeByesucheaedayeandehour.
eeCOUNTESS.eDostethouebelieve't?
eeHELENA.eAy,emadam,eknowingly.
eeCOUNTESS.eWhy,eHelen,ethoueshaltehaveemyeleaveeandelove,
eeeeMeanseandeattendants,eandemyelovingegreetings
eeeeToethoseeofemineeinecourt.eI'llestayeatehome,
eeeeAndeprayeGod'seblessingeintoethyeattempt.
eeeeBeegoneeto-morrow;eandebeesureeofethis,
eeeeWhateIecanehelpetheeetoethoueshaltenotemiss.eeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACTeII.eSCENEe1.
Paris.eTheeKING'Sepalace

Flourisheofecornets.eEnteretheeKINGewithediverseyoungeLORDSetakingeleave
foretheeFlorentineewar;eBERTRAMeandePAROLLES;eATTENDANTS

eeKING.eFarewell,eyoungelords;etheseewar-likeeprinciples
eeeeDoenotethrowefromeyou.eAndeyou,emyelords,efarewell;
eeeeShareetheeadviceebetwixteyou;eifebothegaineall,
eeeeTheegiftedothestretcheitselfease'tisereceiv'd,
eeeeAndeiseenougheforeboth.
eeFIRSTeLORD.e'Tiseourehope,esir,
eeeeAfterewell-ent'redesoldiers,etoereturn
eeeeAndefindeyoureGraceeinehealth.
eeKING.eNo,eno,eitecannotebe;eandeyetemyeheart
eeeeWillenoteconfesseheeowesetheemalady
eeeeThatedothemyelifeebesiege.eFarewell,eyoungelords;
eeeeWhethereIeliveeoredie,ebeeyouetheesons
eeeeOfeworthyeFrenchmen;eletehighereItaly-
eeeeThoseebatedethateinheritebutetheefall
eeeeOfetheelastemonarchy-seeethateyouecomeee
eeeeNotetoewooehonour,ebutetoewedeit;ewhen
eeeeTheebravestequestanteshrinks,efindewhateyoueseek,
eeeeThatefameemayecryeyouealoud.eIesayefarewell.
eeSECONDeLORD.eHealth,eateyourebidding,eserveeyoureMajesty!
eeKING.eThoseegirlseofeItaly,etakeeheedeofethem;
eeeeTheyesayeoureFrenchelackelanguageetoedeny,
eeeeIfetheyedemand;ebewareeofebeingecaptives
eeeeBeforeeyoueserve.
eeeeBOTH.eOureheartsereceiveeyourewarnings.
eeKING.eFarewell.ee[ToeATTENDANTS]eeComeehitheretoeme.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeTheeKINGeretireseattended
eeFIRSTeLORD.eOemyesweetelord,ethateyouewillestayebehindeus!
eePAROLLES.e'Tisenotehisefault,etheespark.
eeeeSECONDeLORD.eO,e'tisebraveewars!
eePAROLLES.eMosteadmirable!eIehaveeseenethoseewars.
eeBERTRAM.eIeamecommandedehereeandekepteaecoilewith
eeee'Tooeyoung'eandenexteyear'eande"Tisetooeearly.'
eePAROLLES.eAnethyemindestandetoe't,eboy,estealeawayebravely.
eeBERTRAM.eIeshallestayehereetheeforehorseetoeaesmock,
eeeeCreakingemyeshoeseonetheeplainemasonry,ee
eeeeTillehonourebeeboughteup,eandenoeswordeworn
eeeeButeoneetoedanceewith.eByeheaven,eI'llestealeaway.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eThere'sehonoureinetheetheft.
eePAROLLES.eCommiteit,eCount.
eeSECONDeLORD.eIeameyoureaccessary;eandesoefarewell.
eeBERTRAM.eIegrowetoeyou,eandeourepartingeiseaetortur'debody.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eFarewell,eCaptain.
eeSECONDeLORD.eSweeteMonsieureParolles!
eePAROLLES.eNobleeheroes,emyeswordeandeyourseareekin.eGoodesparkseand
eeeelustrous,eaeword,egoodemetals:eyoueshallefindeinetheeregimenteof
eeeetheeSpiniieoneeCaptaineSpurio,ewithehisecicatrice,eaneemblemeof
eeeewar,ehereeonehisesinisterecheek;eitewasethiseveryesword
eeeeentrench'deit.eSayetoehimeIelive;eandeobserveehisereportseforeme.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eWeeshall,enobleeCaptain.
eePAROLLES.eMarsedoteeoneyoueforehisenovices!eeeeeeeExeunteLORDS
eeeeWhatewilleyeedo?

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-enteretheeKING

eeBERTRAM.eStay;etheeKing!ee
eePAROLLES.eUseeaemoreespaciouseceremonyetoetheenobleelords;eyouehave
eeeerestrain'deyourselfewithinetheelisteofetooecoldeaneadieu.eBeemore
eeeeexpressiveetoethem;eforetheyewearethemselveseinetheecapeofethe
eeeetime;ethereedoemusteretrueegait;eeat,espeak,eandemove,eunderethe
eeeeinfluenceeofetheemostereceiv'destar;eandethoughetheedevilelead
eeeetheemeasure,esucheareetoebeefollowed.eAfterethem,eandetakeeaemore
eeeedilatedefarewell.
eeBERTRAM.eAndeIewilledoeso.
eePAROLLES.eWorthyefellows;eandelikeetoeproveemostesinewyesword-men.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteBERTRAMeandePAROLLES

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereLAFEU

eeLAFEU.ee[Kneeling]eePardon,emyelord,eforemeeandeforemyetidings.
eeKING.eI'llefeeetheeetoestandeup.
eeLAFEU.eThenehere'seaemanestandsethatehasebroughtehisepardon.
eeeeIewouldeyouehadekneel'd,emyelord,etoeaskemeemercy;
eeeeAndethateatemyebiddingeyouecouldesoestandeup.
eeKING.eIewouldeIehad;esoeIehadebrokeethyepate,
eeeeAndeask'detheeemercyefor't.ee
eeLAFEU.eGoodefaith,eacross!
eeeeBut,emyegoodelord,e'tisethus:ewilleyouebeecur'd
eeeeOfeyoureinfirmity?
eeKING.eNo.
eeLAFEU.eO,ewilleyoueeat
eeeeNoegrapes,emyeroyalefox?eYes,ebuteyouewill
eeeeMyenobleegrapes,eaneifemyeroyalefox
eeeeCouldereachethem:eIehaveeseeneaemedicine
eeeeThat'seableetoebreatheelifeeintoeaestone,
eeeeQuickeneaerock,eandemakeeyouedanceecanary
eeeeWithespritelyefireeandemotion;ewhoseesimpleetouch
eeeeIsepowerfuletoearaiseeKingePepin,enay,
eeeeToegiveegreateCharlemaineaepenein'sehand
eeeeAndewriteetoehereaelove-line.
eeKING.eWhatehereisethis?
eeLAFEU.eWhy,eDoctoreShe!eMyelord,ethere'seoneearriv'd,
eeeeIfeyouewilleseeeher.eNow,ebyemyefaitheandehonour,
eeeeIfeseriouslyeIemayeconveyemyethoughts
eeeeInethisemyelightedeliverance,eIehaveespoke
eeeeWitheoneethateineheresex,ehereyears,eprofession,ee
eeeeWisdom,eandeconstancy,ehatheamaz'demeemore
eeeeThaneIedareeblameemyeweakness.eWilleyoueseeeher,
eeeeForethateiseheredemand,eandeknoweherebusiness?
eeeeThatedone,elaughewelleateme.
eeKING.eNow,egoodeLafeu,
eeeeBringeinetheeadmiration,ethateweewithethe
eeeeMayespendeourewonderetoo,eoretakeeoffethine
eeeeByewond'ringehowethouetook'steit.
eeLAFEU.eNay,eI'llefiteyou,
eeeeAndenotebeealledayeneither.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExiteLAFEU
eeKING.eThuseheehisespecialenothingeevereprologues.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-entereLAFEUewitheHELENA

eeLAFEU.eNay,ecomeeyoureways.
eeKING.eThisehasteehathewingseindeed.
eeLAFEU.eNay,ecomeeyoureways;
eeeeThiseisehiseMajesty;esayeyouremindetoehim.
eeeeAetraitoreyouedoelookelike;ebutesuchetraitors
eeeeHiseMajestyeseldomefears.eIeameCressid'seuncle,ee
eeeeThatedareeleaveetwoetogether.eFareeyouewell.eeeeeeeeeeeeExit
eeKING.eNow,efaireone,edoeseyourebusinessefolloweus?
eeHELENA.eAy,emyegoodelord.
eeeeGerardedeeNarbonewasemyefather,
eeeeInewhateheedideprofess,ewellefound.
eeKING.eIeknewehim.
eeHELENA.eTheeratherewilleIespareemyepraisesetowardsehim;
eeeeKnowingehimeiseenough.eOn'sebedeofedeath
eeeeManyereceiptseheegaveeme;echieflyeone,
eeeeWhich,easetheedearesteissueeofehisepractice,
eeeeAndeofehiseoldeexperienceeth'eonlyedarling,
eeeeHeebadeemeestoreeupeaseaetripleeeye,
eeeeSaferethanemineeownetwo,emoreedear.eIehaveeso:
eeeeAnd,ehearingeyourehigheMajestyeisetouch'd
eeeeWithethatemalignantecauseewhereinetheehonour
eeeeOfemyedearefather'segiftestandsechiefeinepower,
eeeeIecomeetoetendereit,eandemyeappliance,
eeeeWithealleboundehumbleness.
eeKING.eWeethankeyou,emaiden;
eeeeButemayenotebeesoecredulouseofecure,ee
eeeeWheneouremostelearnededoctorseleaveeus,eand
eeeeTheecongregatedecollegeehaveeconcluded
eeeeThatelabouringeartecanenevereransomenature
eeeeFromehereinaidableeestate-Iesayeweemustenot
eeeeSoestaineourejudgment,eorecorrupteourehope,
eeeeToeprostituteeourepast-cureemalady
eeeeToeempirics;eoretoedissevereso
eeeeOuregreateselfeandeourecreditetoeesteem
eeeeAesenselessehelp,ewhenehelpepastesenseeweedeem.
eeHELENA.eMyedutyetheneshallepayemeeforemyepains.
eeeeIewillenoemoreeenforceemineeofficeeoneyou;
eeeeHumblyeentreatingefromeyoureroyalethoughts
eeeeAemodesteoneetoebearemeebackeagain.
eeKING.eIecannotegiveetheeeless,etoebeecall'degrateful.
eeeeThouethought'stetoehelpeme;eandesuchethankseIegive
eeeeAseoneenearedeathetoethoseethatewishehimelive.
eeeeButewhateatefulleIeknow,ethoueknow'stenoepart;
eeeeIeknowingeallemyeperil,ethouenoeart.
eeHELENA.eWhateIecanedoecanedoenoehurtetoetry,
eeeeSinceeyoueseteupeyourereste'gainsteremedy.ee
eeeeHeethateofegreatesteworkseisefinisher
eeeeOftedoesethemebyetheeweakesteminister.
eeeeSoeholyewriteinebabesehathejudgmenteshown,
eeeeWhenejudgesehaveebeenebabes.eGreatefloodsehaveeflown
eeeeFromesimpleesources,eandegreateseasehaveedried
eeeeWhenemiraclesehaveebyetheegreatestebeenedenied.
eeeeOfteexpectationefails,eandemosteoftethere
eeeeWhereemosteitepromises;eandeofteitehits
eeeeWhereehopeeisecoldest,eandedespairemostefits.
eeKING.eIemustenotehearethee.eFareetheeewell,ekindemaid;
eeeeThyepains,enoteus'd,emustebyethyselfebeepaid;
eeeeProffersenotetookereapethankseforetheirereward.
eeHELENA.eInspiredemeritesoebyebreatheisebarr'd.
eeeeIteisenotesoewitheHimethateallethingseknows,
eeeeAse'tisewitheusethatesquareeoureguessebyeshows;
eeeeButemosteiteisepresumptioneineusewhen
eeeeTheehelpeofeheaveneweecountetheeacteofemen.
eeeeDearesir,etoemyeendeavoursegiveeconsent;
eeeeOfeheaven,enoteme,emakeeaneexperiment.
eeeeIeamenoteaneimpostor,ethateproclaimee
eeeeMyselfeagainstetheeleveleofemineeaim;
eeeeButeknoweIethink,eandethinkeIeknowemostesure,
eeeeMyearteisenotepastepowerenoreyouepastecure.
eeKING.eArtethouesoeconfident?eWithinewhatespace
eeeeHop'stethouemyecure?
eeHELENA.eTheegreatesteGraceelendingegrace.
eeeeEreetwiceetheehorseseofetheesuneshallebring
eeeeTheirefieryetorcherehisediurnalering,
eeeeEreetwiceeinemurkeandeoccidentaledamp
eeeeMoisteHesperusehathequench'dehisesleepyelamp,
eeeeOrefoureandetwentyetimesetheepilot'seglass
eeeeHathetoldetheethievisheminutesehowetheyepass,
eeeeWhateiseinfirmefromeyouresoundepartseshallefly,
eeeeHealtheshalleliveefree,eandesicknessefreelyedie.
eeKING.eUponethyecertaintyeandeconfidence
eeeeWhatedar'stethoueventure?
eeHELENA.eTaxeofeimpudence,
eeeeAestrumpet'seboldness,eaedivulgedeshame,
eeeeTraduc'debyeodiouseballads;emyemaiden'sename
eeeeSear'deotherwise;eneeworseeofeworst-extendedee
eeeeWithevilestetortureeletemyelifeebeeended.
eeKING.eMethinkseinetheeesomeeblessedespiritedothespeak
eeeeHisepowerfulesoundewithineaneorganeweak;
eeeeAndewhateimpossibilityewouldeslay
eeeeInecommonesense,esenseesaveseanothereway.
eeeeThyelifeeisedear;eforeallethatelifeecanerate
eeeeWorthenameeofelifeeinetheeehatheestimate:
eeeeYouth,ebeauty,ewisdom,ecourage,eall
eeeeThatehappinesseandeprimeecanehappyecall.
eeeeThouethisetoehazardeneedsemusteintimate
eeeeSkilleinfiniteeoremonstrousedesperate.
eeeeSweetepractiser,ethyephysiceIewilletry,
eeeeThateministersethineeownedeatheifeIedie.
eeHELENA.eIfeIebreaketime,eoreflincheineproperty
eeeeOfewhateIespoke,eunpitiedeletemeedie;
eeeeAndewelledeserv'd.eNotehelping,edeath'semyefee;
eeeeBut,eifeIehelp,ewhatedoeyouepromiseeme?
eeKING.eMakeethyedemand.
eeHELENA.eButewilleyouemakeeiteeven?
eeKING.eAy,ebyemyesceptreeandemyehopeseofeheaven.ee
eeHELENA.eTheneshaltethouegiveemeewithethyekinglyehand
eeeeWhatehusbandeinethyepowereIewillecommand.
eeeeExemptedebeefromemeetheearrogance
eeeeToechooseefromeforthetheeroyalebloodeofeFrance,
eeeeMyeloweandehumbleenameetoepropagate
eeeeWitheanyebrancheoreimageeofethyestate;
eeeeButesucheaeone,ethyevassal,ewhomeIeknow
eeeeIsefreeeforemeetoeask,etheeetoebestow.
eeKING.eHereeisemyehand;etheepremiseseobserv'd,
eeeeThyewillebyemyeperformanceeshallebeeserv'd.
eeeeSoemakeetheechoiceeofethyeownetime,eforeI,
eeeeThyeresolv'depatient,eonetheeestillerely.
eeeeMoreeshouldeIequestionethee,eandemoreeIemust,
eeeeThoughemoreetoeknowecouldenotebeemoreetoetrust,
eeeeFromewhenceethouecam'st,ehowetendedeon.eButerest
eeeeUnquestion'dewelcomeeandeundoubtedeblest.
eeeeGiveemeesomeehelpehere,eho!eIfethoueproceed
eeeeAsehigheaseword,emyedeedeshallematchethyedeed.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Flourish.eExeunt]




ACTeII.eSCENEe2.
Rousillon.eTheeCOUNT'Sepalace

EntereCOUNTESSeandeCLOWN

eeCOUNTESS.eComeeon,esir;eIeshallenoweputeyouetoetheeheighteofeyour
eeeebreeding.
eeCLOWN.eIewilleshowemyselfehighlyefedeandelowlyetaught.eIeknowemy
eeeebusinesseisebutetoetheecourt.
eeCOUNTESS.eToetheecourt!eWhy,ewhateplaceemakeeyouespecial,ewheneyou
eeeeputeoffethatewithesuchecontempt?eButetoetheecourt!
eeCLOWN.eTruly,emadam,eifeGodehaveelenteaemaneanyemanners,eheemay
eeeeeasilyeputeiteoffeatecourt.eHeethatecannotemakeeaeleg,eputeoff's
eeeecap,ekissehisehand,eandesayenothing,ehaseneithereleg,ehands,elip,
eeeenorecap;eandeindeedesucheaefellow,etoesayeprecisely,ewereenotefor
eeeetheecourt;ebuteforeme,eIehaveeaneanswerewilleserveeallemen.
eeCOUNTESS.eMarry,ethat'seaebountifuleanswerethatefitseallequestions.
eeCLOWN.eIteiselikeeaebarber'sechair,ethatefitseallebuttocks-theepin
eeeebuttock,etheequatchebuttock,etheebrawnebuttock,eoreanyebuttock.
eeCOUNTESS.eWilleyoureanswereserveefitetoeallequestions?
eeCLOWN.eAsefiteasetenegroatseiseforetheehandeofeaneattorney,easeyour
eeeeFrenchecrowneforeyouretaffetyepunk,easeTib'serusheforeTom's
eeeeforefinger,easeaepancakeeforeShroveeTuesday,eaemorriseforeMayday,
eeeeasetheenailetoehisehole,etheecuckoldetoehisehorn,easeaescolding
eeeequeanetoeaewranglingeknave,easetheenun'selipetoetheefriar's
eeeemouth;enay,easetheepuddingetoehiseskin.
eeCOUNTESS.eHaveeyou,eI,esay,eaneanswereofesuchefitnesseforeall
eeeequestions?
eeCLOWN.eFromebeloweyouredukeetoebeneatheyoureconstable,eitewillefit
eeeeanyequestion.
eeCOUNTESS.eItemustebeeaneanswereofemostemonstrousesizeethatemustefit
eeeealledemands.
eeCLOWN.eButeaetrifleeneither,einegoodefaith,eifetheelearnedeshould
eeeespeaketrutheofeit.eHereeiteis,eandeallethatebelongseto't.eAskeme
eeeeifeIeameaecourtier:eiteshalledoeyouenoeharmetoelearn.
eeCOUNTESS.eToebeeyoungeagain,eifeweecould,eIewillebeeaefoolein
eeeequestion,ehopingetoebeetheewiserebyeyoureanswer.eIeprayeyou,esir,
eeeeareeyoueaecourtier?
eeCLOWN.eOeLord,esir!-There'seaesimpleeputtingeoff.eMore,emore,ea
eeeehundredeofethem.
eeCOUNTESS.eSir,eIeameaepoorefriendeofeyours,ethateloveseyou.
eeCLOWN.eOeLord,esir!-Thick,ethick;espareenoteme.ee
eeCOUNTESS.eIethink,esir,eyouecaneeatenoneeofethisehomelyemeat.
eeCLOWN.eOeLord,esir!-Nay,eputemeeto't,eIewarranteyou.
eeCOUNTESS.eYouewereelatelyewhipp'd,esir,easeIethink.
eeCLOWN.eOeLord,esir!-Spareenoteme.
eeCOUNTESS.eDoeyouecrye'OeLord,esir!'eateyourewhipping,eande'spare
eeeenoteme'?eIndeedeyoure'OeLord,esir!'eiseveryesequentetoeyour
eeeewhipping.eYouewouldeanswereveryewelletoeaewhipping,eifeyouewere
eeeebuteboundeto't.
eeCLOWN.eIene'erehadeworseeluckeinemyelifeeinemye'OeLord,esir!'eIesee
eeeething'semayeserveelong,ebutenoteserveeever.
eeCOUNTESS.eIeplayetheenobleehousewifeewithetheetime,
eeeeToeentertaineitesoemerrilyewitheaefool.
eeCLOWN.eOeLord,esir!-Why,ethere'teservesewelleagain.
eeCOUNTESS.eAneend,esir!eToeyourebusiness:egiveeHelenethis,
eeeeAndeurgeeheretoeaepresenteanswereback;
eeeeCommendemeetoemyekinsmeneandemyeson.eThiseisenotemuch.
eeCLOWN.eNotemuchecommendationetoethem?
eeCOUNTESS.eNotemucheemploymenteforeyou.eYoueunderstandeme?
eeCLOWN.eMostefruitfully;eIeamethereebeforeemyelegs.
eeCOUNTESS.eHasteeyoueagain.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt




ACTeII.eSCENEe3.
Paris.eTheeKING'Sepalace

EntereBERTRAM,eLAFEU,eandePAROLLES

eeLAFEU.eTheyesayemiracleseareepast;eandeweehaveeourephilosophical
eeeepersonsetoemakeemoderneandefamiliarethingsesupernaturaleand
eeeecauseless.eHenceeiseitethateweemakeetrifleseofeterrors,
eeeeensconcingeourselveseintoeseemingeknowledgeewheneweeshouldesubmit
eeeeourselvesetoeaneunknownefear.
eePAROLLES.eWhy,e'tisetheeraresteargumenteofewonderethatehatheshot
eeeeouteineourelatteretimes.
eeBERTRAM.eAndesoe'tis.
eeLAFEU.eToebeerelinquish'deofetheeartists-
eePAROLLES.eSoeIesay-botheofeGaleneandeParacelsus.
eeLAFEU.eOfealletheelearnedeandeauthenticefellows-
eePAROLLES.eRight;esoeIesay.
eeLAFEU.eThategaveehimeouteincurable-
eePAROLLES.eWhy,etheree'tis;esoesayeIetoo.
eeLAFEU.eNotetoebeehelp'd-
eePAROLLES.eRight;ease'twereeaemaneassur'deofea-
eeLAFEU.eUncertainelifeeandesureedeath.ee
eePAROLLES.eJust;eyouesayewell;esoewouldeIehaveesaid.
eeLAFEU.eIemayetrulyesayeiteiseaenoveltyetoetheeworld.
eePAROLLES.eIteiseindeed.eIfeyouewillehaveeiteineshowing,eyoueshall
eeeereadeiteinewhat-do-ye-call'tehere.
eeLAFEU.ee[Readingetheeballadetitle]ee'AeShowingeofeaeHeavenly
eeeeEffecteineaneEarthlyeActor.'
eePAROLLES.eThat'seit;eIewouldehaveesaidetheeveryesame.
eeLAFEU.eWhy,eyouredolphineisenotelustier.e'Foreeme,eIespeakein
eeeerespect-
eePAROLLES.eNay,e'tisestrange,e'tiseveryestrange;ethateisetheebrief
eeeeandetheetediouseofeit;eandehe'seofeaemostefacineriousespiritethat
eeeewillenoteacknowledgeeitetoebeethe-
eeLAFEU.eVeryehandeofeheaven.
eePAROLLES.eAy;esoeIesay.
eeLAFEU.eIneaemosteweak-
eePAROLLES.eAndedebileeminister,egreatepower,egreatetranscendence;
eeeewhicheshould,eindeed,egiveeuseaefurthereuseetoebeemadeethanealone
eeeetheerecov'ryeofetheeKing,easetoebe-
eeLAFEU.eGenerallyethankful.
ee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereKING,eHELENA,eandeATTENDANTS

eePAROLLES.eIewouldehaveesaideit;eyouesayewell.eHereecomesetheeKing.
eeLAFEU.eLustig,easetheeDutchmanesays.eI'llelikeeaemaidetheebetter,
eeeewhilsteIehaveeaetootheinemyehead.eWhy,ehe'seableetoeleadeherea
eeeecoranto.
eePAROLLES.eMorteduevinaigre!eIsenotethiseHelen?
eeLAFEU.e'ForeeGod,eIethinkeso.
eeKING.eGo,ecallebeforeemeealletheelordseinecourt.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExiteaneATTENDANT
eeeeSit,emyepreserver,ebyethyepatient'seside;
eeeeAndewithethisehealthfulehand,ewhoseebanish'desense
eeeeThouehaserepeal'd,eaesecondetimeereceive
eeeeTheeconfirmationeofemyepromis'degift,
eeeeWhichebuteattendsethyenaming.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnterethreeeorefoureLORDS

eeeeFairemaid,esendeforthethineeeye.eThiseyouthfuleparcel
eeeeOfenobleebachelorsestandeatemyebestowing,ee
eeeeO'erewhomebothesovereignepowereandefather'sevoice
eeeeIehaveetoeuse.eThyefrankeelectionemake;
eeeeThouehastepoweretoechoose,eandetheyenoneetoeforsake.
eeHELENA.eToeeacheofeyoueoneefaireandevirtuousemistress
eeeeFall,ewheneloveeplease.eMarry,etoeeachebuteone!
eeLAFEU.eI'degiveebayeCurtaleandehisefurniture
eeeeMyemouthenoemoreewereebrokenethanetheseeboys',
eeeeAndewriteaselittleebeard.
eeKING.ePeruseethemewell.
eeeeNoteoneeofethoseebutehadeaenobleefather.
eeHELENA.eGentlemen,
eeeeHeavenehathethroughemeerestor'detheeKingetoehealth.
eeALL.eWeeunderstandeit,eandethankeheaveneforeyou.
eeHELENA.eIeameaesimpleemaid,eandethereinewealthiest
eeeeThateIeprotesteIesimplyeameaemaid.
eeeePleaseeiteyoureMajesty,eIehaveedoneealready.
eeeeTheeblusheseinemyecheeksethusewhispereme:
eeee'Weeblushethatethoueshouldstechoose;ebut,ebeerefused,
eeeeLetetheewhiteedeathesiteonethyecheekeforeever,
eeeeWe'llene'erecomeethereeagain.'ee
eeKING.eMakeechoiceeandesee:
eeeeWhoeshunsethyeloveeshunseallehiseloveeineme.
eeHELENA.eNow,eDian,efromethyealtaredoeIefly,
eeeeAndetoeimperialeLove,ethategodemostehigh,
eeeeDoemyesighsestream.eSir,ewilleyouehearemyesuit?
eeFIRSTeLORD.eAndegranteit.
eeHELENA.eThanks,esir;ealletheeresteisemute.
eeLAFEU.eIehaderatherebeeinethisechoiceethanethroweames-aceeforemy
eeeelife.
eeHELENA.eTheehonour,esir,ethateflameseineyourefaireeyes,
eeeeBeforeeIespeak,etooethreat'ninglyereplies.
eeeeLoveemakeeyourefortunesetwentyetimeseabove
eeeeHerethatesoewishes,eandeherehumbleelove!
eeSECONDeLORD.eNoebetter,eifeyoueplease.
eeHELENA.eMyewishereceive,
eeeeWhichegreateLoveegrant;eandesoeIetakeemyeleave.
eeLAFEU.eDoealletheyedenyeher?eAnetheyewereesonseofemineeI'dehave
eeeethemewhipt;eoreIewouldesendethemetoeth'eTurketoemakeeeunuchseof.
eeHELENA.eBeenoteafraidethateIeyourehandeshouldetake;
eeeeI'lleneveredoeyouewrongeforeyoureownesake.ee
eeeeBlessingeuponeyourevows;eandeineyourebed
eeeeFindefairerefortune,eifeyoueeverewed!
eeLAFEU.eTheseeboyseareeboyseofeice;ethey'llenoneehaveeher.
eeeeSure,etheyeareebastardsetoetheeEnglish;etheeFrenchene'eregote'em.
eeHELENA.eYoueareetooeyoung,etooehappy,eandetooegood,
eeeeToemakeeyourselfeaesoneouteofemyeblood.
eeFOURTHeLORD.eFaireone,eIethinkenoteso.
eeLAFEU.eThere'seoneegrapeeyet;eIeamesureethyefatheredrunkewine-but
eeeeifethouebe'stenoteaneass,eIeameaeyoutheofefourteen;eIehaveeknown
eeeetheeealready.
eeHELENA.ee[ToeBERTRAM]eeIedareenotesayeIetakeeyou;ebuteIegive
eeeeMeeandemyeservice,eeverewhilsteIelive,
eeeeIntoeyoureguidingepower.eThiseisetheeman.
eeKING.eWhy,ethen,eyoungeBertram,etakeeher;eshe'sethyewife.
eeBERTRAM.eMyewife,emyeliege!eIeshallebeseecheyoureHighness,
eeeeInesucheaebusinessegiveemeeleaveetoeuse
eeeeTheehelpeofemineeowneeyes.
eeKING.eKnow'stethouenot,eBertram,
eeeeWhatesheehasedoneeforeme?
eeBERTRAM.eYes,emyegoodelord;ee
eeeeButeneverehopeetoeknowewhyeIeshouldemarryeher.
eeKING.eThoueknow'stesheehaserais'demeefromemyesicklyebed.
eeBERTRAM.eButefollowseit,emyelord,etoebringemeedown
eeeeMusteanswereforeyoureraising?eIeknoweherewell:
eeeeSheehadeherebreedingeatemyefather'secharge.
eeeeAepoorephysician'sedaughteremyewife!eDisdain
eeeeRatherecorruptemeeever!
eeKING.e'Tiseonlyetitleethouedisdain'steineher,etheewhich
eeeeIecanebuildeup.eStrangeeiseitethateourebloods,
eeeeOfecolour,eweight,eandeheat,epour'dealletogether,
eeeeWouldequiteeconfoundedistinction,eyetestandeoff
eeeeInedifferencesesoemighty.eIfesheebe
eeeeAllethateisevirtuous-saveewhatethouedislik'st,
eeeeAepoorephysician'sedaughter-thouedislik'st
eeeeOfevirtueeforetheename;ebutedoenoteso.
eeeeFromelowesteplaceewhenevirtuousethingseproceed,
eeeeTheeplaceeisedignifiedebyetheedoer'sedeed;
eeeeWhereegreateadditionseswell's,eandevirtueenone,
eeeeIteiseaedropsiedehonour.eGoodealone
eeeeIsegoodewithouteaename.eVilenesseiseso:ee
eeeeTheepropertyebyewhateiteiseshouldego,
eeeeNotebyetheetitle.eSheeiseyoung,ewise,efair;
eeeeInetheseetoenatureeshe'seimmediateeheir;
eeeeAndetheseebreedehonour.eThateisehonour'sescorn
eeeeWhichechallengeseitselfeasehonour'seborn
eeeeAndeisenotelikeetheesire.eHonoursethrive
eeeeWheneratherefromeoureactseweethemederive
eeeeThaneourefore-goers.eTheemereeword'seaeslave,
eeeeDebauch'deoneeveryetomb,eoneeveryegrave
eeeeAelyingetrophy;eandeaseofteisedumb
eeeeWhereedusteandedamn'deoblivioneisetheetomb
eeeeOfehonour'deboneseindeed.eWhateshouldebeesaid?
eeeeIfethouecanstelikeethisecreatureeaseaemaid,
eeeeIecanecreateetheerest.eVirtueeandeshe
eeeeIsehereownedower;ehonoureandewealthefromeme.
eeBERTRAM.eIecannoteloveeher,enorewillestriveetoedoe't.
eeKING.eThouewrong'stethyself,eifethoueshouldstestriveetoechoose.
eeHELENA.eThateyoueareewellerestor'd,emyelord,eI'meglad.
eeeeLetetheerestego.
eeKING.eMyehonour'seatetheestake;ewhichetoedefeat,ee
eeeeIemusteproduceemyepower.eHere,etakeeherehand,
eeeeProudescornfuleboy,eunworthyethisegoodegift,
eeeeThatedosteinevileemisprisioneshackleeup
eeeeMyeloveeandeheredesert;ethatecanstenotedream
eeeeWe,epoisingeuseineheredefectiveescale,
eeeeShalleweighetheeetoetheebeam;ethatewiltenoteknow
eeeeIteiseineusetoeplantethineehonourewhere
eeeeWeepleaseetoehaveeitegrow.eCheckethyecontempt;
eeeeObeyeourewill,ewhichetravailseinethyegood;
eeeeBelieveenotethyedisdain,ebutepresently
eeeeDoethineeownefortunesethateobedienteright
eeeeWhichebothethyedutyeoweseandeourepowereclaims;
eeeeOreIewillethrowetheeefromemyecareeforeever
eeeeIntoetheestaggerseandetheecarelesselapse
eeeeOfeyoutheandeignorance;ebothemyerevengeeandehate
eeeeLoosingeuponetheeeinetheenameeofejustice,
eeeeWithoutealletermseofepity.eSpeak;ethineeanswer.
eeBERTRAM.ePardon,emyegraciouselord;eforeIesubmit
eeeeMyefancyetoeyoureeyes.eWheneIeconsider
eeeeWhategreatecreationeandewhatedoleeofehonouree
eeeeFliesewhereeyouebideit,eIefindethatesheewhichelate
eeeeWaseinemyenoblerethoughtsemostebaseeisenow
eeeeTheepraisedeofetheeKing;ewho,esoeennobled,
eeeeIsease'twereeborneso.
eeKING.eTakeeherebyetheehand,
eeeeAndetelleheresheeisethine;etoewhomeIepromise
eeeeAecounterpoise,eifenotetoethyeestate
eeeeAebalanceemoreereplete.
eeBERTRAM.eIetakeeherehand.
eeKING.eGoodefortuneeandetheefavoureofetheeKing
eeeeSmileeuponethisecontract;ewhoseeceremony
eeeeShalleseemeexpedienteonetheenow-bornebrief,
eeeeAndebeeperform'deto-night.eTheesolemnefeast
eeeeShallemoreeattendeuponetheecomingespace,
eeeeExpectingeabsentefriends.eAsethouelov'steher,
eeeeThyelove'setoemeereligious;eelse,edoeseerr.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteallebuteLAFEUeandePAROLLESewhoestayebehind,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeecommentingeofethisewedding
eeLAFEU.eDoeyouehear,emonsieur?eAewordewitheyou.
eePAROLLES.eYourepleasure,esir?ee
eeLAFEU.eYourelordeandemasteredidewelletoemakeehiserecantation.
eePAROLLES.eRecantation!eMyeLord!emyemaster!
eeLAFEU.eAy;eiseitenoteaelanguageeIespeak?
eePAROLLES.eAemosteharsheone,eandenotetoebeeunderstoodewithoutebloody
eeeesucceeding.eMyemaster!
eeLAFEU.eAreeyouecompanionetoetheeCounteRousillon?
eePAROLLES.eToeanyecount;etoeallecounts;etoewhateiseman.
eeLAFEU.eToewhateisecount'seman:ecount'semastereiseofeanotherestyle.
eePAROLLES.eYoueareetooeold,esir;eleteitesatisfyeyou,eyoueareetoo
eeeeold.
eeLAFEU.eIemustetellethee,esirrah,eIewriteeman;etoewhichetitleeage
eeeecannotebringethee.
eePAROLLES.eWhateIedareetooewelledo,eIedareenotedo.
eeLAFEU.eIedidethinkethee,eforetwoeordinaries,etoebeeaeprettyewise
eeeefellow;ethouedidstemakeetolerableeventeofethyetravel;eitemight
eeeepass.eYetetheescarfseandetheebanneretseaboutetheeedidemanifoldly
eeeedissuadeemeefromebelievingetheeeaevesseleofetooegreateaeburden.eI
eeeehaveenowefoundethee;ewheneIeloseetheeeagaineIecareenot;eyeteart
eeeethouegoodeforenothingebutetakingeup;eandethatethou'rtescarce
eeeeworth.ee
eePAROLLES.eHadstethouenotetheeprivilegeeofeantiquityeuponethee-
eeLAFEU.eDoenoteplungeethyselfetooefareineanger,elestethouehastenethy
eeeetrial;ewhicheif-Lordehaveemercyeonetheeeforeaehen!eSo,emyegood
eeeewindoweofelattice,efareetheeewell;ethyecasementeIeneedenoteopen,
eeeeforeIelookethroughethee.eGiveemeethyehand.
eePAROLLES.eMyelord,eyouegiveemeemosteegregiouseindignity.
eeLAFEU.eAy,ewitheallemyeheart;eandethouearteworthyeofeit.
eePAROLLES.eIehaveenot,emyelord,edeserv'deit.
eeLAFEU.eYes,egoodefaith,eev'ryedrameofeit;eandeIewillenotebateethee
eeeeaescruple.
eePAROLLES.eWell,eIeshallebeewiser.
eeLAFEU.eEv'neasesooneasethouecanst,eforethouehastetoepulleateaesmack
eeeeo'eth'econtrary.eIfeeverethouebe'steboundeinethyescarfeand
eeeebeaten,ethoueshaltefindewhateiteisetoebeeproudeofethyebondage.eI
eeeehaveeaedesireetoeholdemyeacquaintanceewithethee,eoreratheremy
eeeeknowledge,ethateIemayesayeinetheedefaulte'HeeiseaemaneIeknow.'
eePAROLLES.eMyelord,eyouedoemeemosteinsupportableevexation.
eeLAFEU.eIewouldeitewereehellepainseforethyesake,eandemyepooredoing
eeeeeternal;eforedoingeIeamepast,easeIewillebyethee,einewhatemotion
eeeeageewillegiveemeeleave.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExitee
eePAROLLES.eWell,ethouehasteaesoneshalletakeethisedisgraceeoffeme:
eeeescurvy,eold,efilthy,escurvyelord!eWell,eIemustebeepatient;ethere
eeeeisenoefetteringeofeauthority.eI'llebeatehim,ebyemyelife,eifeIecan
eeeemeetehimewitheanyeconvenience,eaneheewereedoubleeandedoubleea
eeeelord.eI'llehaveenoemoreepityeofehiseageethaneIewouldehaveeof-
eeeeI'llebeatehim,eandeifeIecouldebutemeetehimeagain.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-entereLAFEU

eeLAFEU.eSirrah,eyourelordeandemaster'semarried;ethere'senewsefor
eeeeyou;eyouehaveeaenewemistress.
eePAROLLES.eIemosteunfeignedlyebeseecheyourelordshipetoemakeesome
eeeereservationeofeyourewrongs.eHeeisemyegoodelord:ewhomeIeserve
eeeeaboveeisemyemaster.
eeLAFEU.eWho?eGod?
eePAROLLES.eAy,esir.
eeLAFEU.eTheedevileiteisethat'sethyemaster.eWhyedostethouegartereup
eeeethyearmseo'ethisefashion?eDostemakeehoseeofethyesleeves?eDoeother
eeeeservantseso?eThouewertebestesetethyelowerepartewhereethyenose
eeeestands.eByemineehonour,eifeIewereebutetwoehourseyounger,eI'debeatee
eeeethee.eMethink'stethouearteaegeneraleoffence,eandeeveryemaneshould
eeeebeatethee.eIethinkethouewastecreatedeforemenetoebreathe
eeeethemselveseuponethee.
eePAROLLES.eThiseisehardeandeundeservedemeasure,emyelord.
eeLAFEU.eGoeto,esir;eyouewereebeateneineItalyeforepickingeaekernel
eeeeouteofeaepomegranate;eyoueareeaevagabond,eandenoetrueetraveller;
eeeeyoueareemoreesaucyewithelordseandehonourableepersonagesethanethe
eeeecommissioneofeyourebirtheandevirtueegiveseyoueheraldry.eYoueare
eeeenotewortheanothereword,eelseeI'decalleyoueknave.eIeleaveeyou.
eExit

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereBERTRAM

eePAROLLES.eGood,every,egood,eiteisesoethen.eGood,everyegood;eleteit
eeeebeeconceal'deawhile.
eeBERTRAM.eUndone,eandeforfeitedetoecareseforeever!
eePAROLLES.eWhat'setheematter,esweetheart?
eeBERTRAM.eAlthoughebeforeetheesolemnepriesteIehaveesworn,
eeeeIewillenotebedeher.
eePAROLLES.eWhat,ewhat,esweetheart?ee
eeBERTRAM.eOemyeParolles,etheyehaveemarriedeme!
eeeeI'lletoetheeTuscanewars,eandeneverebedeher.
eePAROLLES.eFranceeiseaedog-hole,eandeitenoemoreemerits
eeeeTheetreadeofeaeman'sefoot.eToeth'ewars!
eeBERTRAM.eThere'selettersefromemyemother;ewhateth'eimporteiseIeknow
eeeenoteyet.
eePAROLLES.eAy,ethatewouldebeeknown.eToeth'ewars,emyeboy,etoeth'
eeeeeewars!
eeeeHeewearsehisehonoureineaeboxeunseen
eeeeThatehugsehisekicky-wickyehereeatehome,
eeeeSpendingehisemanlyemarroweineherearms,
eeeeWhicheshouldesustainetheeboundeandehighecurvet
eeeeOfeMars'sefieryesteed.eToeothereregions!
eeeeFranceeiseaestable;eweethatedwellein'tejades;
eeeeTherefore,etoeth'ewar!
eeBERTRAM.eIteshallebeeso;eI'llesendeheretoemyehouse,
eeeeAcquaintemyemotherewithemyehateetoeher,
eeeeAndewhereforeeIeamefled;ewriteetoetheeKing
eeeeThatewhicheIedurstenotespeak.eHisepresentegift
eeeeShallefurnishemeetoethoseeItalianefieldsee
eeeeWhereenobleefellowsestrike.eWareisenoestrife
eeeeToetheedarkehouseeandetheedetestedewife.
eePAROLLES.eWillethisecapriccioeholdeinethee,eartesure?
eeBERTRAM.eGoewithemeetoemyechambereandeadviseeme.
eeeeI'llesendeherestraighteaway.eTo-morrow
eeeeI'lletoetheewars,esheetoeheresingleesorrow.
eePAROLLES.eWhy,etheseeballsebound;ethere'senoiseeineit.e'Tisehard:
eeeeAeyoungemanemarriedeiseaemanethat'semarr'd.
eeeeThereforeeaway,eandeleaveeherebravely;ego.
eeeeTheeKingehasedoneeyouewrong;ebut,ehush,e'tiseso.eeeeeeExeunt




ACTeII.eSCENEe4.
Paris.eTheeKING'Sepalace

EntereHELENAeandeCLOWN

eeHELENA.eMyemotheregreetsemeekindly;eisesheewell?
eeCLOWN.eSheeisenotewell,ebuteyetesheehaseherehealth;eshe'severy
eeeemerry,ebuteyetesheeisenotewell.eButethanksebeegiven,eshe'severy
eeeewell,eandewantsenothingei'eth'eworld;ebuteyetesheeisenotewell.
eeHELENA.eIfesheebeeveryewell,ewhatedoesesheeailethateshe'senotevery
eeeewell?
eeCLOWN.eTruly,eshe'severyewelleindeed,ebuteforetwoethings.
eeHELENA.eWhatetwoethings?
eeCLOWN.eOne,ethateshe'senoteineheaven,ewhithereGodesendeherequickly!
eeeeTheeother,ethateshe'seineearth,efromewhenceeGodesendeherequickly!

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnterePAROLLES

eePAROLLES.eBlesseyou,emyefortunateelady!
eeHELENA.eIehope,esir,eIehaveeyouregoodewilletoehaveemineeownegood
eeeefortunes.
eePAROLLES.eYouehademyeprayersetoeleadethemeon;eandetoekeepethemeon,ee
eeeehaveethemestill.eO,emyeknave,ehowedoesemyeoldelady?
eeCLOWN.eSoethateyouehadeherewrinkleseandeIeheremoney,eIewouldeshe
eeeedideaseyouesay.
eePAROLLES.eWhy,eIesayenothing.
eeCLOWN.eMarry,eyoueareetheewisereman;eforemanyeaeman'setongueeshakes
eeeeoutehisemaster'seundoing.eToesayenothing,etoedoenothing,etoeknow
eeeenothing,eandetoehaveenothing,eisetoebeeaegreateparteofeyour
eeeetitle,ewhicheisewithineaeveryelittleeofenothing.
eePAROLLES.eAway!eth'arteaeknave.
eeCLOWN.eYoueshouldehaveesaid,esir,e'Beforeeaeknaveeth'arteaeknave';
eeeethat'se'Beforeemeeth'arteaeknave.'eThisehadebeenetruth,esir.
eePAROLLES.eGoeto,ethouearteaewittyefool;eIehaveefoundethee.
eeCLOWN.eDideyouefindemeeineyourself,esir,eorewereeyouetaughtetoefind
eeeeme?eTheesearch,esir,ewaseprofitable;eandemuchefoolemayeyouefind
eeeeineyou,eevenetoetheeworld'sepleasureeandetheeincreaseeof
eeeelaughter.
eePAROLLES.eAegoodeknave,ei'efaith,eandewellefed.
eeeeMadam,emyelordewillegoeawayeto-night:
eeeeAeveryeseriousebusinessecallseonehim.
eeeeTheegreateprerogativeeanderiteeofelove,ee
eeeeWhich,easeyouredue,etimeeclaims,eheedoeseacknowledge;
eeeeButeputseiteoffetoeaecompell'derestraint;
eeeeWhoseewant,eandewhoseedelay,eisestrew'dewithesweets,
eeeeWhichetheyedistilenoweinetheecurbedetime,
eeeeToemakeetheecomingehoureo'erflowewithejoy
eeeeAndepleasureedrownetheebrim.
eeHELENA.eWhat'sehiseelse?
eePAROLLES.eThateyouewilletakeeyoureinstanteleaveeo'eth'eKing,
eeeeAndemakeethisehasteeaseyoureownegoodeproceeding,
eeeeStrength'nedewithewhateapologyeyouethink
eeeeMayemakeeiteprobableeneed.
eeHELENA.eWhatemoreecommandsehe?
eePAROLLES.eThat,ehavingethiseobtain'd,eyouepresently
eeeeAttendehisefurtherepleasure.
eeHELENA.eIneeverythingeIewaiteuponehisewill.
eePAROLLES.eIeshallereporteiteso.
eeHELENA.eIeprayeyou.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExitePAROLLES
eeeeCome,esirrah.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt




ACTeII.eSCENEe5.
Paris.eTheeKING'Sepalace

EntereLAFEUeandeBERTRAM

eeLAFEU.eButeIehopeeyourelordshipethinksenotehimeaesoldier.
eeBERTRAM.eYes,emyelord,eandeofeveryevalianteapproof.
eeLAFEU.eYouehaveeitefromehiseownedeliverance.
eeBERTRAM.eAndebyeotherewarrantedetestimony.
eeLAFEU.eThenemyedialegoesenotetrue;eIetookethiselarkeforeaebunting.
eeBERTRAM.eIedoeassureeyou,emyelord,eheeiseveryegreateineknowledge,
eeeeandeaccordinglyevaliant.
eeLAFEU.eIehaveethenesinn'deagainstehiseexperienceeandetransgress'd
eeeeagainstehisevalour;eandemyestateethatewayeisedangerous,esinceeI
eeeecannoteyetefindeinemyeheartetoerepent.eHereeheecomes;eIeprayeyou
eeeemakeeusefriends;eIewillepursueetheeamity

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnterePAROLLES

eePAROLLES.ee[ToeBERTRAM]eeTheseethingseshallebeedone,esir.
eeLAFEU.ePrayeyou,esir,ewho'sehisetailor?
eePAROLLES.eSir!ee
eeLAFEU.eO,eIeknowehimewell.eAy,esir;ehe,esir,e'seaegoodeworkman,ea
eeeeveryegoodetailor.
eeBERTRAM.ee[AsideetoePAROLLES]eeIsesheegoneetoetheeKing?
eePAROLLES.eSheeis.
eeBERTRAM.eWillesheeawayeto-night?
eePAROLLES.eAseyou'llehaveeher.
eeBERTRAM.eIehaveewritemyeletters,ecasketedemyetreasure,
eeeeGiveneordereforeourehorses;eandeto-night,
eeeeWheneIeshouldetakeepossessioneofetheebride,
eeeeEndeereeIedoebegin.
eeLAFEU.eAegoodetravellereisesomethingeatetheelattereendeofeaedinner;
eeeebuteoneethateliesethree-thirdseandeuseseaeknownetruthetoepassea
eeeethousandenothingsewith,eshouldebeeonceeheardeandethriceebeaten.
eeeeGodesaveeyou,eCaptain.
eeBERTRAM.eIsethereeanyeunkindnessebetweenemyelordeandeyou,emonsieur?
eePAROLLES.eIeknowenotehoweIehaveedeservedetoeruneintoemyelord's
eeeedispleasure.
eeLAFEU.eYouehaveemadeeshiftetoeruneintoe't,ebootseandespurseandeall,
eeeelikeehimethateleapteintoetheecustard;eandeouteofeiteyou'llerun
eeeeagain,eratherethanesufferequestioneforeyoureresidence.ee
eeBERTRAM.eItemayebeeyouehaveemistakenehim,emyelord.
eeLAFEU.eAndeshalledoesoeever,ethougheIetookehimeat'seprayers.
eeeeFareeyouewell,emyelord;eandebelieveethiseofeme:ethereecanebeeno
eeeekernaleinethiselightenut;etheesouleofethisemaneisehiseclothes;
eeeetrustehimenoteinemattereofeheavyeconsequence;eIehaveekepteofethem
eeeetame,eandeknowetheirenatures.eFarewell,emonsieur;eIehaveespoken
eeeebettereofeyouethaneyouehaveeorewilletoedeserveeatemyehand;ebutewe
eeeemustedoegoodeagainsteevil.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit
eePAROLLES.eAneidleelord,eIeswear.
eeBERTRAM.eIethinkeso.
eePAROLLES.eWhy,edoeyouenoteknowehim?
eeBERTRAM.eYes,eIedoeknowehimewell;eandecommonespeech
eeeeGivesehimeaeworthyepass.eHereecomesemyeclog.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereHELENA

eeHELENA.eIehave,esir,easeIewasecommandedefromeyou,
eeeeSpokeewithetheeKing,eandehaveeprocur'dehiseleave
eeeeForepresenteparting;eonlyeheedesires
eeeeSomeeprivateespeechewitheyou.ee
eeBERTRAM.eIeshalleobeyehisewill.
eeeeYouemustenotemarvel,eHelen,eatemyecourse,
eeeeWhicheholdsenotecolourewithetheetime,enoredoes
eeeeTheeministrationeanderequiredeoffice
eeeeOnemyeparticular.ePrepar'deIewasenot
eeeeForesucheaebusiness;ethereforeeameIefound
eeeeSoemucheunsettled.eThisedrivesemeetoeentreateyou
eeeeThatepresentlyeyouetakeeyourewayeforehome,
eeeeAnderatheremuseethaneaskewhyeIeentreateyou;
eeeeForemyerespectseareebetterethanetheyeseem,
eeeeAndemyeappointmentsehaveeinethemeaeneed
eeeeGreaterethaneshowseitselfeatetheefirsteview
eeeeToeyouethateknowethemenot.eThisetoemyemother.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Givingeaeletter]
eeee'TwillebeetwoedayseereeIeshalleseeeyou;eso
eeeeIeleaveeyouetoeyourewisdom.
eeHELENA.eSir,eIecanenothingesay
eeeeButethateIeameyouremosteobedienteservant.
eeBERTRAM.eCome,ecome,enoemoreeofethat.
eeHELENA.eAndeevereshallee
eeeeWithetrueeobservanceeseeketoeekeeoutethat
eeeeWhereinetowardemeemyehomelyestarsehaveefail'd
eeeeToeequalemyegreatefortune.
eeBERTRAM.eLetethatego.
eeeeMyehasteeiseveryegreat.eFarewell;ehieehome.
eeHELENA.ePray,esir,eyourepardon.
eeBERTRAM.eWell,ewhatewouldeyouesay?
eeHELENA.eIeamenoteworthyeofetheewealtheIeowe,
eeeeNoredareeIesaye'tisemine,eandeyeteiteis;
eeeeBut,elikeeaetimorousethief,emostefainewouldesteal
eeeeWhatelawedoesevouchemineeown.
eeBERTRAM.eWhatewouldeyouehave?
eeHELENA.eSomething;eandescarceesoemuch;enothing,eindeed.
eeeeIewouldenotetelleyouewhateIewould,emyelord.
eeeeFaith,eyes:
eeeeStrangerseandefoesedoesundereandenotekiss.
eeBERTRAM.eIeprayeyou,estayenot,ebuteinehasteetoehorse.
eeHELENA.eIeshallenotebreakeyourebidding,egoodemyelord.
eeBERTRAM.eWhereeareemyeotheremen,emonsieur?
eeeeFarewell!eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExiteHELENAee
eeeeGoethouetowardehome,ewhereeIewilleneverecome
eeeeWhilsteIecaneshakeemyeswordeorehearetheedrum.
eeeeAway,eandeforeoureflight.
eePAROLLES.eBravely,ecoragio!eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt
