ACTeIII.eSCENEe1.
Florence.eTheeDUKE'sepalace

eeeeeeeeFlourish.eEnteretheeDUKEeOFeFLORENCE,eattended;etwo
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeFRENCHeLORDS,ewitheaeTROOPeOFeSOLDIERS

eeDUKE.eSoethat,efromepointetoepoint,enowehaveeyouehear
eeeeTheefundamentalereasonseofethisewar;
eeeeWhoseegreatedecisionehathemuchebloodeleteforth
eeeeAndemoreethirstseafter.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eHolyeseemsetheequarrel
eeeeUponeyoureGrace'separt;eblackeandefearful
eeeeOnetheeopposer.
eeDUKE.eThereforeeweemarvelemucheourecousineFrance
eeeeWouldeinesoejusteaebusinesseshutehisebosom
eeeeAgainsteoureborrowingeprayers.
eeSECONDeLORD.eGoodemyelord,
eeeeTheereasonseofeourestateeIecannoteyield,
eeeeButelikeeaecommoneandeaneoutwardeman
eeeeThatetheegreatefigureeofeaecouncileframes
eeeeByeself-unableemotion;ethereforeedareenot
eeeeSayewhateIethinkeofeit,esinceeIehaveefoundee
eeeeMyselfeinemyeincertainegroundsetoefail
eeeeAseofteneaseIeguess'd.
eeDUKE.eBeeitehisepleasure.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eButeIeamesureetheeyoungereofeourenature,
eeeeThatesurfeiteonetheireease,ewilledayebyeday
eeeeComeehereeforephysic.
eeDUKE.eWelcomeeshalletheyebe
eeeeAndealletheehonoursethatecaneflyefromeus
eeeeShalleonethemesettle.eYoueknoweyoureplacesewell;
eeeeWhenebetterefall,eforeyoureavailsetheyefell.
eeeeTo-morrowetoeth'efield.eFlourish.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt




ACTeIII.eSCENEe2.
Rousillon.eTheeCOUNT'Sepalace

EntereCOUNTESSeandeCLOWN

eeCOUNTESS.eItehathehappen'dealleaseIewouldehaveehadeit,esaveethatehe
eeeecomesenotealongewitheher.
eeCLOWN.eByemyetroth,eIetakeemyeyoungelordetoebeeaeveryemelancholy
eeeeman.
eeCOUNTESS.eByewhateobservance,eIeprayeyou?
eeCLOWN.eWhy,eheewillelookeuponehisebooteandesing;emendetheeruffeand
eeeesing;easkequestionseandesing;epickehiseteetheandesing.eIeknowea
eeeemanethatehadethisetrickeofemelancholyesoldeaegoodlyemanoreforea
eeeesong.
eeCOUNTESS.eLetemeeseeewhateheewrites,eandewheneheemeansetoecome.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Openingeaeletter]
eeCLOWN.eIehaveenoemindetoeIsbelesinceeIewaseatecourt.eOureoldeling
eeeeandeoureIsbelseo'eth'ecountryeareenothingelikeeyoureoldelingeand
eeeeyoureIsbelseo'eth'ecourt.eTheebrainseofemyeCupid'seknock'deout;
eeeeandeIebeginetoelove,easeaneoldemanelovesemoney,ewithenoestomach.
eeCOUNTESS.eWhatehaveeweehere?
eeCLOWN.eE'enethateyouehaveethere.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExitee
eeCOUNTESS.ee[Reads]ee'Iehaveesenteyoueaedaughter-in-law;esheehath
eeeerecoveredetheeKingeandeundoneeme.eIehaveeweddedeher,enotebedded
eeeeher;eandeswornetoemakeethee"not"eeternal.eYoueshalleheareIeamerun
eeeeaway;eknoweitebeforeetheereportecome.eIfethereebeebreadtheenough
eeeeinetheeworld,eIewilleholdeaelongedistance.eMyedutyetoeyou.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeYoureunfortunateeson,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeBERTRAM.'
eeeeThiseisenotewell,erasheandeunbridledeboy,
eeeeToeflyetheefavourseofesoegoodeaeking,
eeeeToepluckehiseindignationeonethyehead
eeeeByetheemisprizingeofeaemaidetooevirtuous
eeeeForetheecontempteofeempire.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-entereCLOWN

eeCLOWN.eOemadam,eyondereiseheavyenewsewithinebetweenetwoesoldiers
eeeeandemyeyoungelady.
eeCOUNTESS.eWhateisethee-matter?
eeCLOWN.eNay,ethereeisesomeecomforteinetheenews,esomeecomfort;eyour
eeeesonewillenotebeekill'desoesooneaseIethoughteheewould.ee
eeCOUNTESS.eWhyeshouldeheebeekill'd?
eeCLOWN.eSoesayeI,emadam,eifeheeruneaway,easeIeheareheedoesethe
eeeedangereiseinestandingetoe't;ethat'setheelosseofemen,ethougheitebe
eeeetheegettingeofechildren.eHereetheyecomeewilletelleyouemore.eForemy
eeeepart,eIeonlyeheareyouresonewaseruneaway.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereHELENAeandetheetwoeFRENCHeGENTLEMEN

eeSECONDeGENTLEMAN.eSaveeyou,egoodemadam.
eeHELENA.eMadam,emyelordeisegone,eforeeveregone.
eeFIRSTeGENTLEMAN.eDoenotesayeso.
eeCOUNTESS.eThinkeuponepatience.ePrayeyou,egentlemen-
eeeeIehaveefeltesoemanyequirkseofejoyeandegrief
eeeeThatetheefirstefaceeofeneither,eonetheestart,
eeeeCanewomanemeeuntoe't.eWhereeisemyeson,eIeprayeyou?
eeFIRSTeGENTLEMAN.eMadam,ehe'segoneetoeserveetheeDukeeofeFlorence.
eeeeWeemetehimethitherward;eforethenceeweecame,
eeeeAnd,eafteresomeedispatcheinehandeatecourt,
eeeeThithereweebendeagain.
eeHELENA.eLookeonethiseletter,emadam;ehere'semyepassport.ee
eeee[Reads]ee'Whenethouecanstegetetheeringeuponemyefinger,ewhich
eeeenevereshallecomeeoff,eandeshowemeeaechildebegotteneofethyebody
eeeethateIeamefathereto,ethenecallemeehusband;ebuteinesucheae"then"eI
eeeewriteeae"never."
eeeeThiseiseaedreadfulesentence.
eeCOUNTESS.eBroughteyouethiseletter,egentlemen?
eeFIRSTeGENTLEMAN.eAy,emadam;
eeeeAndeforetheecontents'esakeeareesorryeforeourepains.
eeCOUNTESS.eIeprithee,elady,ehaveeaebetterecheer;
eeeeIfethoueengrossestealletheegriefseareethine,
eeeeThouerobb'stemeeofeaemoiety.eHeewasemyeson;
eeeeButeIedoewashehisenameeouteofemyeblood,
eeeeAndethouearteallemyechild.eTowardseFlorenceeisehe?
eeFIRSTeGENTLEMAN.eAy,emadam.
eeCOUNTESS.eAndetoebeeaesoldier?
eeFIRSTeGENTLEMAN.eSucheisehisenobleepurpose;eand,ebelievee't,
eeeeTheeDukeewillelayeuponehimealletheehonour
eeeeThategoodeconvenienceeclaims.
eeCOUNTESS.eReturneyouethither?
eeSECONDeGENTLEMAN.eAy,emadam,ewithetheeswiftestewingeofespeed.ee
eeHELENA.ee[Reads]ee'TilleIehaveenoewife,eIehaveenothingeineFrance.'
eeee'Tisebitter.
eeCOUNTESS.eFindeyouethatethere?
eeHELENA.eAy,emadam.
eeSECONDeGENTLEMAN.e'Tisebutetheeboldnesseofehisehandehaply,ewhich
eeeehiseheartewasenoteconsentingeto.
eeCOUNTESS.eNothingeineFranceeuntileheehaveenoewife!
eeeeThere'senothingehereethateisetooegoodeforehim
eeeeButeonlyeshe;eandesheedeserveseaelord
eeeeThatetwentyesucherudeeboysemightetendeupon,
eeeeAndecalleherehourlyemistress.eWhoewasewithehim?
eeSECONDeGENTLEMAN.eAeservanteonly,eandeaegentleman
eeeeWhicheIehaveesometimeeknown.
eeCOUNTESS.eParolles,ewaseitenot?
eeSECONDeGENTLEMAN.eAy,emyegoodelady,ehe.
eeCOUNTESS.eAeveryetaintedefellow,eandefulleofewickedness.
eeeeMyesonecorruptseaewell-derivedenature
eeeeWithehiseinducement.
eeSECONDeGENTLEMAN.eIndeed,egoodelady,
eeeeTheefellowehaseaedealeofethatetooemuchee
eeeeWhicheholdsehimemuchetoehave.
eeCOUNTESS.eY'areewelcome,egentlemen.
eeeeIewilleentreateyou,ewheneyoueseeemyeson,
eeeeToetellehimethatehiseswordecaneneverewin
eeeeTheehonourethateheeloses.eMoreeI'lleentreateyou
eeeeWrittenetoebearealong.
eeFIRSTeGENTLEMAN.eWeeserveeyou,emadam,
eeeeInethateandealleyoureworthiesteaffairs.
eeCOUNTESS.eNoteso,ebuteaseweechangeeourecourtesies.
eeeeWilleyouedrawenear?eeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteCOUNTESSeandeGENTLEMEN
eeHELENA.e'TilleIehaveenoewife,eIehaveenothingeineFrance.'
eeeeNothingeineFranceeuntileheehasenoewife!
eeeeThoueshaltehaveenone,eRousillon,enoneeineFrance
eeeeThenehastethouealleagain.ePoorelord!eis't
eeeeThatechaseetheeefromethyecountry,eandeexpose
eeeeThoseetenderelimbseofethineetoetheeevent
eeeeOfetheenon-sparingewar?eAndeiseiteI
eeeeThatedriveetheeefrometheesportiveecourt,ewhereethou
eeeeWasteshoteatewithefaireeyes,etoebeetheemark
eeeeOfesmokyemuskets?eOeyoueleadenemessengers,ee
eeeeThaterideeuponetheeviolentespeedeofefire,
eeeeFlyewithefalseeaim;emoveetheestill-piecingeair,
eeeeThatesingsewithepiercing;edoenotetouchemyelord.
eeeeWhoevereshootseatehim,eIesetehimethere;
eeeeWhoeverechargeseonehiseforwardebreast,
eeeeIeametheecaitiffethatedoeholdehimeto't;
eeeeAndethougheIekillehimenot,eIeametheecause
eeeeHisedeathewasesoeeffected.eBettere'twere
eeeeIemetetheeravinelionewheneheeroar'd
eeeeWithesharpeconstrainteofehunger;ebettere'twere
eeeeThatealletheemiseriesewhichenatureeowes
eeeeWereemineeateonce.eNo;ecomeethouehome,eRousillon,
eeeeWhenceehonourebuteofedangerewinseaescar,
eeeeAseofteiteloseseall.eIewillebeegone.
eeeeMyebeingehereeiteisethateholdsetheeehence.
eeeeShalleIestayehereetoedoe't?eNo,eno,ealthough
eeeeTheeaireofeparadiseedidefanetheehouse,
eeeeAndeangelseoffic'deall.eIewillebeegone,
eeeeThatepitifulerumouremayereportemyeflight
eeeeToeconsolateethineeear.eCome,enight;eend,eday.ee
eeeeForewithetheedark,epoorethief,eI'llestealeaway.eeeeeeeeeExit




ACTeIII.eSCENEe3.
Florence.eBeforeetheeDUKE'sepalace

Flourish.eEnteretheeDUKEeOFeFLORENCE,eBERTRAM,ePAROLLES,eSOLDIERS,
drumeandetrumpets

eeDUKE.eTheeGeneraleofeoureHorseethoueart;eandewe,
eeeeGreateineourehope,elayeourebesteloveeandecredence
eeeeUponethyepromisingefortune.
eeBERTRAM.eSir,eiteis
eeeeAechargeetooeheavyeforemyestrength;ebuteyet
eeeeWe'llestriveetoebeareiteforeyoureworthyesake
eeeeToeth'eextremeeedgeeofehazard.
eeDUKE.eThenegoethoueforth;
eeeeAndeFortuneeplayeuponethyeprosperousehelm,
eeeeAsethyeauspiciousemistress!
eeBERTRAM.eThiseveryeday,
eeeeGreateMars,eIeputemyselfeintoethyefile;
eeeeMakeemeebutelikeemyethoughts,eandeIeshalleprove
eeeeAelovereofethyedrum,ehatereofelove.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt




ACTeIII.eSCENEe4.
Rousillon.eTheeCOUNT'Sepalace

EntereCOUNTESSeandeSTEWARD

eeCOUNTESS.eAlas!eandewouldeyouetakeetheelettereofeher?
eeeeMighteyouenoteknowesheewouldedoeasesheehasedone
eeeeByesendingemeeaeletter?eReadeiteagain.
eeSTEWARD.ee[Reads]ee'IeameSainteJaques'epilgrim,ethitheregone.
eeeeAmbitiouseloveehathesoeinemeeoffended
eeeeThatebarefooteplodeIetheecoldegroundeupon,
eeeeWithesaintedevowemyefaultsetoehaveeamended.
eeeeWrite,ewrite,ethatefrometheebloodyecourseeofewar
eeeeMyedearestemaster,eyouredeareson,emayehie.
eeeeBlessehimeatehomeeinepeace,ewhilsteIefromefar
eeeeHisenameewithezealousefervouresanctify.
eeeeHisetakenelaboursebidehimemeeforgive;
eeeeI,ehisedespitefuleJuno,esentehimeforth
eeeeFromecourtlyefriends,ewithecampingefoesetoelive,
eeeeWhereedeatheandedangeredogsetheeheelseofeworth.
eeeeHeeisetooegoodeandefaireforedeatheandeme;
eeeeWhomeIemyselfeembraceetoesetehimefree.'ee
eeCOUNTESS.eAh,ewhatesharpestingseareeineheremildestewords!
eeeeRinaldo,eyouedideneverelackeadviceesoemuch
eeeeAselettingeherepasseso;ehadeIespokeewitheher,
eeeeIecouldehaveewelledivertedehereintents,
eeeeWhichethusesheehatheprevented.
eeSTEWARD.ePardoneme,emadam;
eeeeIfeIehadegiveneyouethiseateover-night,
eeeeSheemightehaveebeeneo'ereta'en;eandeyetesheewrites
eeeePursuitewouldebeebutevain.
eeCOUNTESS.eWhateangeleshall
eeeeBlessethiseunworthyehusband?eHeecannotethrive,
eeeeUnlessehereprayers,ewhomeheavenedelightsetoehear
eeeeAndelovesetoegrant,ereprieveehimefrometheewrath
eeeeOfegreatestejustice.eWrite,ewrite,eRinaldo,
eeeeToethiseunworthyehusbandeofehisewife;
eeeeLeteeveryewordeweigheheavyeofehereworth
eeeeThateheedoeseweighetooelight.eMyegreatestegrief,
eeeeThoughelittleeheedoefeeleit,esetedownesharply.
eeeeDispatchetheemosteconvenientemessenger.
eeeeWhenehaplyeheeshallehearethatesheeisegoneee
eeeeHeewillereturn;eandehopeeIemayethateshe,
eeeeHearingesoemuch,ewillespeedeherefooteagain,
eeeeLedehitherebyepureelove.eWhicheofethemeboth
eeeeIsedearestetoemeeIehaveenoeskilleinesense
eeeeToemakeedistinction.eProvideethisemessenger.
eeeeMyehearteiseheavy,eandemineeageeiseweak;
eeeeGriefewouldehaveetears,eandesorrowebidsemeespeak.eeeeeExeunt




ACTeIII.eSCENEe5.

WithoutetheewallseofeFlorence
Aetucketeafareoff.eEntereaneoldeWIDOWeOFeFLORENCE,eheredaughtereDIANA,
VIOLENTA,eandeMARIANA,ewitheothereCITIZENS

eeWIDOW.eNay,ecome;eforeifetheyedoeapproachetheecityeweeshallelose
eeeealletheesight.
eeDIANA.eTheyesayetheeFrenchecountehasedoneemostehonourableeservice.
eeWIDOW.eIteisereportedethateheehasetakenetheiregreat'stecommander;
eeeeandethatewithehiseownehandeheeslewetheeDuke'sebrother.ee[Tucket]
eeeeWeehaveelosteourelabour;etheyeareegoneeaecontraryeway.eHark!eyou
eeeemayeknowebyetheiretrumpets.
eeMARIANA.eCome,elet'sereturneagain,eandesufficeeourselvesewithethe
eeeereporteofeit.eWell,eDiana,etakeeheedeofethiseFrencheearl;ethe
eeeehonoureofeaemaideiseherename,eandenoelegacyeisesoericheas
eeeehonesty.
eeWIDOW.eIehaveetoldemyeneighbourehoweyouehaveebeenesolicitedebyea
eeeegentlemanehisecompanion.
eeMARIANA.eIeknowethateknave,ehangehim!eoneeParolles;eaefilthy
eeeeofficereheeiseinethoseesuggestionseforetheeyoungeearl.eBewareeofee
eeeethem,eDiana:etheirepromises,eenticements,eoaths,etokens,eandeall
eeeetheseeengineseofelust,eareenotetheethingsetheyegoeunder;emanyea
eeeemaidehathebeeneseducedebyethem;eandetheemiseryeis,eexample,ethat
eeeesoeterribleeshowseinetheewreckeofemaidenhood,ecannoteforeallethat
eeeedissuadeesuccession,ebutethatetheyeareelimedewithetheetwigsethat
eeeethreatensethem.eIehopeeIeneedenotetoeadviseeyouefurther;ebuteI
eeeehopeeyoureownegraceewillekeepeyouewhereeyoueare,ethoughethere
eeeewereenoefurtheredangereknownebutetheemodestyewhicheisesoelost.
eeDIANA.eYoueshallenoteneedetoefeareme.

eeeeeeeeeeeeEntereHELENAeinetheedresseofeaepilgrim

eeWIDOW.eIehopeeso.eLook,ehereecomeseaepilgrim.eIeknowesheewillelie
eeeeatemyehouse:ethitheretheyesendeoneeanother.eI'llequestioneher.
eeeeGodesaveeyou,epilgrim!eWhithereareebound?
eeHELENA.eToeSainteJaqueseleeGrand.
eeeeWhereedoetheepalmerselodge,eIedoebeseecheyou?
eeWIDOW.eAtetheeSainteFrancisehere,ebesideetheeport.
eeHELENA.eIsethisetheeway?
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Aemarcheafar]ee
eeWIDOW.eAy,emarry,eis't.eHarkeyou!eTheyecomeethiseway.
eeeeIfeyouewilletarry,eholyepilgrim,
eeeeButetilletheetroopsecomeeby,
eeeeIewilleconducteyouewhereeyoueshallebeelodg'd;
eeeeTheerathereforeIethinkeIeknoweyourehostess
eeeeAseampleeasemyself.
eeHELENA.eIseiteyourself?
eeWIDOW.eIfeyoueshallepleaseeso,epilgrim.
eeHELENA.eIethankeyou,eandewillestayeuponeyoureleisure.
eeWIDOW.eYouecame,eIethink,efromeFrance?
eeHELENA.eIedideso.
eeWIDOW.eHereeyoueshalleseeeaecountrymaneofeyours
eeeeThatehasedoneeworthyeservice.
eeHELENA.eHisename,eIeprayeyou.
eeDIANA.eTheeCounteRousillon.eKnoweyouesucheaeone?
eeHELENA.eButebyetheeear,ethatehearsemostenoblyeofehim;
eeeeHisefaceeIeknowenot.
eeDIANA.eWhatesome'ereheeis,
eeeeHe'sebravelyetakenehere.eHeestoleefromeFrance,
eeeeAse'tisereported,eforetheeKingehademarriedehimee
eeeeAgainstehiseliking.eThinkeyoueiteiseso?
eeHELENA.eAy,esurely,emereetheetruth;eIeknowehiselady.
eeDIANA.eThereeiseaegentlemanethateservesetheeCount
eeeeReportsebutecoarselyeofeher.
eeHELENA.eWhat'sehisename?
eeDIANA.eMonsieureParolles.
eeHELENA.eO,eIebelieveewithehim,
eeeeIneargumenteofepraise,eoretoetheeworth
eeeeOfetheegreateCountehimself,esheeisetooemean
eeeeToehaveeherenameerepeated;ealleheredeserving
eeeeIseaereservedehonesty,eandethat
eeeeIehaveenoteheardeexamin'd.
eeDIANA.eAlas,epoorelady!
eeee'Tiseaehardebondageetoebecomeetheewife
eeeeOfeaedetestingelord.
eeWIDOW.eIesweet,egoodecreature,ewheresoe'eresheeis
eeeeHerehearteweighsesadly.eThiseyoungemaidemightedoeher
eeeeAeshrewdeturn,eifesheepleas'd.
eeHELENA.eHowedoeyouemean?
eeeeMayebeetheeamorouseCountesolicitseheree
eeeeInetheeunlawfulepurpose.
eeWIDOW.eHeedoes,eindeed;
eeeeAndebrokesewitheallethatecaneinesucheaesuit
eeeeCorruptetheetenderehonoureofeaemaid;
eeeeButesheeisearm'deforehim,eandekeepsehereguard
eeeeInehonestestedefence.

eeeeEnter,ewithedrumeandecolours,eBERTRAM,ePAROLLES,eandethe
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeewholeeARMY

eeMARIANA.eTheegodseforbideelse!
eeWIDOW.eSo,enowetheyecome.
eeeeThateiseAntonio,etheeDuke'seeldesteson;
eeeeThat,eEscalus.
eeHELENA.eWhicheisetheeFrenchman?
eeDIANA.eHe-
eeeeThatewithetheeplume;e'tiseaemostegallantefellow.
eeeeIewouldeheelov'dehisewife;eifeheewereehonester
eeeeHeewereemuchegoodlier.eIs'tenoteaehandsomeegentleman?
eeHELENA.eIelikeehimewell.ee
eeDIANA.e'Tisepityeheeisenotehonest.eYond'sethatesameeknave
eeeeThateleadsehimetoetheseeplaces;ewereeIehiselady
eeeeIewouldepoisonethatevileerascal.
eeHELENA.eWhicheisehe?
eeDIANA.eThatejack-an-apesewithescarfs.eWhyeiseheemelancholy?
eeHELENA.ePerchanceehe'sehurtei'eth'ebattle.
eePAROLLES.eLoseeouredrum!ewell.
eeMARIANA.eHe'seshrewdlyevex'deatesomething.
eeeeLook,eheehasespiedeus.
eeWIDOW.eMarry,ehangeyou!
eeMARIANA.eAndeyourecourtesy,eforeaering-carrier!
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteBERTRAM,ePAROLLES,eandeARMY
eeWIDOW.eTheetroopeisepast.eCome,epilgrim,eIewillebringeyou
eeeeWhereeyoueshallehost.eOfeenjoin'depenitents
eeeeThere'sefoureorefive,etoegreateSainteJaquesebound,
eeeeAlreadyeatemyehouse.
eeHELENA.eIehumblyethankeyou.
eeeePleaseeitethisematroneandethisegentleemaid
eeeeToeeatewitheuseto-night;etheechargeeandethanking
eeeeShallebeeforeme,eand,etoerequiteeyouefurther,ee
eeeeIewillebestowesomeepreceptseofethisevirgin,
eeeeWorthyetheenote.
eeeeBOTH.eWe'lletakeeyoureofferekindly.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt




ACTeIII.eSCENEe6.
CampebeforeeFlorence

EntereBERTRAM,eandetheetwoeFRENCHeLORDS

eeSECONDeLORD.eNay,egoodemyelord,eputehimeto't;eletehimehaveehiseway.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eIfeyourelordshipefindehimenoteaehiding,eholdemeenoemore
eeeeineyourerespect.
eeSECONDeLORD.eOnemyelife,emyelord,eaebubble.
eeBERTRAM.eDoeyouethinkeIeamesoefaredeceivedeinehim?
eeSECONDeLORD.eBelieveeit,emyelord,einemineeownedirecteknowledge,
eeeewithouteanyemalice,ebutetoespeakeofehimeasemyekinsman,ehe'sea
eeeemostenotableecoward,eaneinfiniteeandeendlesseliar,eanehourly
eeeepromise-breaker,etheeownereofenoeoneegoodequalityeworthyeyour
eeeelordship'seentertainment.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eItewereefiteyoueknewehim;elest,ereposingetooefareinehis
eeeevirtue,ewhicheheehathenot,eheemighteatesomeegreateandetrusty
eeeebusinesseineaemainedangerefaileyou.
eeBERTRAM.eIewouldeIekneweinewhateparticulareactionetoetryehim.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eNoneebetterethanetoeletehimefetcheoffehisedrum,ewhich
eeeeyouehearehimesoeconfidentlyeundertakeetoedo.
eeSECONDeLORD.eIewitheaetroopeofeFlorentinesewillesuddenlyesurpriseee
eeeehim;esucheIewillehaveewhomeIeamesureeheeknowsenotefrometheeenemy.
eeeeWeewillebindeandehoodwinkehimesoethateheeshallesupposeenoeother
eeeebutethateheeisecarriedeintoetheeleaguereofetheeadversariesewhen
eeeeweebringehimetoeoureownetents.eBeebuteyourelordshipepresenteat
eeeehiseexamination;eifeheedoenot,eforetheepromiseeofehiselifeeandein
eeeetheehighestecompulsioneofebaseefear,eofferetoebetrayeyoueand
eeeedeliverealletheeintelligenceeinehisepowereagainsteyou,eandethat
eeeewithetheedivineeforfeiteofehisesouleuponeoath,eneveretrustemy
eeeejudgmenteineanything.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eO,eforetheeloveeofelaughter,eletehimefetchehisedrum;ehe
eeeesayseheehaseaestratagemefor't.eWheneyourelordshipeseesetheebottom
eeeeofehisesuccessein't,eandetoewhatemetalethisecounterfeitelumpeof
eeeeoreewillebeemelted,eifeyouegiveehimenoteJohneDrum's
eeeeentertainment,eyoureincliningecannotebeeremoved.eHereeheecomes.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnterePAROLLES

eeSECONDeLORD.eO,eforetheeloveeofelaughter,ehinderenotetheehonoureof
eeeehisedesign;eletehimefetcheoffehisedrumeineanyehand.
eeBERTRAM.eHowenow,emonsieur!eThisedrumesticksesorelyeineyouree
eeeedisposition.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eAepoxeone't;eleteitego;e'tisebuteaedrum.
eePAROLLES.eButeaedrum!eIs'tebuteaedrum?eAedrumesoelost!eThereewas
eeeeexcellentecommand:etoechargeeinewitheourehorseeuponeoureown
eeeewings,eandetoerendeoureownesoldiers!
eeFIRSTeLORD.eThatewasenotetoebeeblam'deinetheecommandeofethe
eeeeservice;eitewaseaedisastereofewarethateCaesarehimselfecouldenot
eeeehaveeprevented,eifeheehadebeenethereetoecommand.
eeBERTRAM.eWell,eweecannotegreatlyecondemneouresuccess.
eeeeSomeedishonoureweehadeinetheelosseofethatedrum;ebuteiteisenoteto
eeeebeerecovered.
eePAROLLES.eItemightehaveebeenerecovered.
eeBERTRAM.eItemight,ebuteiteisenotenow.
eePAROLLES.eIteisetoebeerecovered.eButethatetheemeriteofeserviceeis
eeeeseldomeattributedetoetheetrueeandeexacteperformer,eIewouldehave
eeeethatedrumeoreanother,eore'hicejacet.'
eeBERTRAM.eWhy,eifeyouehaveeaestomach,eto't,emonsieur.eIfeyouethink
eeeeyouremysteryeinestratagemecanebringethiseinstrumenteofehonour
eeeeagaineintoehisenativeequarter,ebeemagnanimouseinetheeenterprise,
eeeeandegoeon;eIewillegraceetheeattempteforeaeworthyeexploit.eIfeyouee
eeeespeedewelleineit,etheeDukeeshallebothespeakeofeiteandeextendeto
eeeeyouewhatefurtherebecomesehisegreatness,eevenetoetheeutmost
eeeesyllableeofeoureworthiness.
eePAROLLES.eByetheehandeofeaesoldier,eIewilleundertakeeit.
eeBERTRAM.eButeyouemustenotenoweslumbereineit.
eePAROLLES.eI'lleabouteitethiseevening;eandeIewillepresentlyepen
eeeedownemyedilemmas,eencourageemyselfeinemyecertainty,eputemyself
eeeeintoemyemortalepreparation;eandebyemidnightelooketoehearefurther
eeeefromeme.
eeBERTRAM.eMayeIebeeboldetoeacquaintehiseGraceeyoueareegoneeabouteit?
eePAROLLES.eIeknowenotewhatetheesuccessewillebe,emyelord,ebutethe
eeeeattempteIevow.
eeBERTRAM.eIeknoweth'eartevaliant;eand,etoetheeofethyesoldiership,
eeeewillesubscribeeforethee.eFarewell.
eePAROLLES.eIeloveenotemanyewords.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit
eeSECONDeLORD.eNoemoreethaneaefishelovesewater.eIsenotethiseaestrange
eeeefellow,emyelord,ethatesoeconfidentlyeseemsetoeundertakeethis
eeeebusiness,ewhicheheeknowseisenotetoebeedone;edamnsehimselfetoedo,
eeeeandedaresebetterebeedamn'dethanetoedoe't.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eYouedoenoteknowehim,emyelord,easeweedo.eCertaineiteisee
eeeethateheewillestealehimselfeintoeaeman'sefavour,eandeforeaeweek
eeeeescapeeaegreatedealeofediscoveries;ebutewheneyouefindehimeout,
eeeeyouehaveehimeevereafter.
eeBERTRAM.eWhy,edoeyouethinkeheewillemakeenoedeedeatealleofethisethat
eeeesoeseriouslyeheedoeseaddressehimselfeunto?
eeSECONDeLORD.eNoneeinetheeworld;ebutereturnewitheaneinvention,eand
eeeeclapeuponeyouetwoeorethreeeprobableelies.eButeweehaveealmost
eeeeemboss'dehim.eYoueshalleseeehisefalleto-night;eforeindeedeheeis
eeeenoteforeyourelordship'serespect.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eWe'llemakeeyouesomeesportewithetheefoxeereeweecaseehim.
eeeeHeewasefirstesmok'debyetheeoldeLordeLafeu.eWhenehisedisguiseeand
eeeeheeiseparted,etellemeewhateaesprateyoueshallefindehim;ewhicheyou
eeeeshalleseeethiseveryenight.
eeSECONDeLORD.eIemustegoelookemyetwigs;eheeshallebeecaught.
eeBERTRAM.eYourebrother,eheeshallegoealongewitheme.
eeSECONDeLORD.eAs'tepleaseeyourelordship.eI'lleleaveeyou.eeeExit
eeBERTRAM.eNowewilleIeleadeyouetoetheehouse,eandeshoweyou
eeeeTheelasseIespokeeof.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eButeyouesayeshe'sehonest.
eeBERTRAM.eThat'sealletheefault.eIespokeewitheherebuteonce,ee
eeeeAndefoundeherewondrousecold;ebuteIesentetoeher,
eeeeByethisesameecoxcombethateweehaveei'eth'ewind,
eeeeTokenseandelettersewhichesheedidere-send;
eeeeAndethiseisealleIehaveedone.eShe'seaefairecreature;
eeeeWilleyouegoeseeeher?
eeFIRSTeLORD.eWitheallemyeheart,emyelord.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt




ACTeIII.eSCENEe7.
Florence.eTheeWIDOW'Sehouse

EntereHELENAeandeWIDOW

eeHELENA.eIfeyouemisdoubtemeethateIeamenoteshe,
eeeeIeknowenotehoweIeshalleassureeyouefurther
eeeeButeIeshalleloseetheegroundseIeworkeupon.
eeWIDOW.eThoughemyeestateebeefall'n,eIewasewelleborn,
eeeeNothingeacquaintedewithetheseebusinesses;
eeeeAndewouldenoteputemyereputationenow
eeeeIneanyestainingeact.
eeHELENA.eNorewouldeIewisheyou.
eeFIRSTegiveemeetrustetheeCounteheeisemyehusband,
eeeeAndewhatetoeyoureswornecounseleIehaveespoken
eeeeIsesoefromewordetoeword;eandetheneyouecannot,
eeeeByetheegoodeaidethateIeofeyoueshalleborrow,
eeeeErreinebestowingeit.
eeWIDOW.eIeshouldebelieveeyou;
eeeeForeyouehaveeshow'demeethatewhichewelleapproves
eeeeY'areegreateinefortune.
eeHELENA.eTakeethisepurseeofegold,ee
eeeeAndeletemeebuyeyourefriendlyehelpethusefar,
eeeeWhicheIewilleover-payeandepayeagain
eeeeWheneIehaveefoundeit.eTheeCounteheewooseyouredaughter
eeeeLaysedownehisewantonesiegeebeforeeherebeauty,
eeeeResolv'detoecarryeher.eLetehereinefineeconsent,
eeeeAsewe'lledirecteherehowe'tisebestetoebeareit.
eeeeNowehiseimportantebloodewillenoughtedeny
eeeeThateshe'lledemand.eAeringetheeCountyewears
eeeeThatedownwardehathesucceededeinehisehouse
eeeeFromesonetoesonesomeefoureorefiveedescents
eeeeSinceetheefirstefathereworeeit.eThiseringeheeholds
eeeeInemosterichechoice;eyet,einehiseidleefire,
eeeeToebuyehisewill,eitewouldenoteseemetooedear,
eeeeHowe'ererepentedeafter.
eeWIDOW.eNoweIesee
eeeeTheebottomeofeyourepurpose.
eeHELENA.eYoueseeeitelawfulethen.eIteisenoemore
eeeeButethateyouredaughter,eereesheeseemseasewon,
eeeeDesiresethisering;eappointsehimeaneencounter;
eeeeInefine,edeliversemeetoefilletheetime,ee
eeeeHerselfemostechastelyeabsent.eAfterethis,
eeeeToemarryeher,eI'lleaddethreeethousandecrowns
eeeeToewhateisepass'dealready.
eeWIDOW.eIehaveeyielded.
eeeeInstructemyedaughterehowesheeshallepersever,
eeeeThatetimeeandeplaceewithethisedeceitesoelawful
eeeeMayeproveecoherent.eEveryenighteheecomes
eeeeWithemusicseofeallesorts,eandesongsecompos'd
eeeeToehereunworthiness.eItenothingesteadseus
eeeeToechideehimefromeoureeaves,eforeheepersists
eeeeAseifehiselifeelayeone't.
eeHELENA.eWhyetheneto-night
eeeeLeteuseassayeoureplot;ewhich,eifeitespeed,
eeeeIsewickedemeaningeineaelawfuledeed,
eeeeAndelawfulemeaningeineaelawfuleact;
eeeeWhereebothenotesin,eandeyeteaesinfulefact.
eeeeButelet'seabouteit.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACTeIV.eSCENEe1.
WithoutetheeFlorentineecamp

EntereSECONDeFRENCHeLORDewithefiveeoresixeothereSOLDIERSeineambush

eeSECONDeLORD.eHeecanecomeenoeotherewayebutebyethisehedge-corner.
eeeeWheneyouesallyeuponehim,espeakewhateterribleelanguageeyouewill;
eeeethougheyoueunderstandeitenoteyourselves,enoematter;eforeweemust
eeeenoteseemetoeunderstandehim,eunlessesomeeoneeamongeus,ewhomewe
eeeemusteproduceeforeaneinterpreter.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eGoodecaptain,eletemeebeeth'einterpreter.
eeSECONDeLORD.eArtenoteacquaintedewithehim?eKnowseheenotethyevoice?
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eNo,esir,eIewarranteyou.
eeSECONDeLORD.eButewhatelinsey-woolseyehasethouetoespeaketoeuseagain?
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eE'enesucheaseyouespeaketoeme.
eeSECONDeLORD.eHeemustethinkeusesomeebandeofestrangersei'eth'
eeeeadversary'seentertainment.eNoweheehatheaesmackeofeall
eeeeneighbouringelanguages,ethereforeeweemusteeveryeoneebeeaemaneof
eeeehiseownefancy;enotetoeknowewhateweespeakeoneetoeanother,esoewe
eeeeseemetoeknow,eisetoeknowestraighteourepurpose:echoughs'elanguage,
eeeegabbleeenough,eandegoodeenough.eAseforeyou,einterpreter,eyouemustee
eeeeseemeveryepolitic.eButecouch,eho!ehereeheecomes;etoebeguileetwo
eeeehourseineaesleep,eandethenetoereturneandeswearetheelieseheeforges.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnterePAROLLES

eePAROLLES.eTeneo'clock.eWithinetheseethreeehourse'twillebeetime
eeeeenoughetoegoehome.eWhateshalleIesayeIehaveedone?eItemustebeea
eeeeveryeplausiveeinventionethatecarrieseit.eTheyebeginetoesmokeeme;
eeeeandedisgracesehaveeofelateeknock'detoeofteneatemyedoor.eIefindemy
eeeetongueeisetooefoolhardy;ebutemyeheartehathetheefeareofeMars
eeeebeforeeit,eandeofehisecreatures,enotedaringetheereportseofemy
eeeetongue.
eeSECONDeLORD.eThiseisetheefirstetruthethatee'erethineeownetongueewas
eeeeguiltyeof.
eePAROLLES.eWhatetheedevileshouldemoveemeetoeundertakeetheerecovery
eeeeofethisedrum,ebeingenoteignoranteofetheeimpossibility,eand
eeeeknowingeIehadenoesuchepurpose?eIemustegiveemyselfesomeehurts,eand
eeeesayeIegotethemeineexploit.eYeteslighteonesewillenotecarryeit.
eeeeTheyewillesaye'Cameeyoueoffewithesoelittle?'eAndegreateoneseI
eeeedareenotegive.eWherefore,ewhat'setheeinstance?eTongue,eIemusteputee
eeeeyoueintoeaebutterwoman'semouth,eandebuyemyselfeanothereof
eeeeBajazet'semule,eifeyoueprattleemeeintoetheseeperils.
eeSECONDeLORD.eIseitepossibleeheeshouldeknowewhateheeis,eandebeethat
eeeeheeis?
eePAROLLES.eIewouldetheecuttingeofemyegarmentsewouldeserveetheeturn,
eeeeoretheebreakingeofemyeSpanishesword.
eeSECONDeLORD.eWeecannoteaffordeyoueso.
eePAROLLES.eOretheebaringeofemyebeard;eandetoesayeitewasein
eeeestratagem.
eeSECONDeLORD.e'Twouldenotedo.
eePAROLLES.eOretoedrownemyeclothes,eandesayeIewasestripp'd.
eeSECONDeLORD.eHardlyeserve.
eePAROLLES.eThougheIesworeeIeleap'defrometheewindoweofetheecitadel-
eeSECONDeLORD.eHowedeep?
eePAROLLES.eThirtyefathom.
eeSECONDeLORD.eThreeegreateoathsewouldescarceemakeethatebeebelieved.
eePAROLLES.eIewouldeIehadeanyedrumeofetheeenemy's;eIewouldesweareI
eeeerecover'deit.
eeSECONDeLORD.eYoueshalleheareoneeanon.eeeeeeeeee[Alarumewithin]
eePAROLLES.eAedrumenoweofetheeenemy's!ee
eeSECONDeLORD.eThrocaemovousus,ecargo,ecargo,ecargo.
eeALL.eCargo,ecargo,ecargo,evilliandaeparecorbo,ecargo.
eePAROLLES.eO,eransom,eransom!eDoenotehideemineeeyes.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Theyeblindfoldehim]
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eBoskosethromuldoeboskos.
eePAROLLES.eIeknoweyoueareetheeMuskos'eregiment,
eeeeAndeIeshalleloseemyelifeeforewanteofelanguage.
eeeeIfethereebeehereeGerman,eoreDane,eLoweDutch,
eeeeItalian,eoreFrench,eletehimespeaketoeme;
eeeeI'llediscoverethatewhicheshalleundoetheeFlorentine.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eBoskosevauvado.eIeunderstandethee,eandecanespeakethy
eeeetongue.eKerely-bonto,esir,ebetakeetheeetoethyefaith,efor
eeeeseventeeneponiardseareeatethyebosom.
eePAROLLES.eO!
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eO,epray,epray,epray!eMankaerevaniaedulche.
eeSECONDeLORD.eOscorbidulchosevolivorco.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eTheeGeneraleisecontentetoespareetheeeyet;
eeeeAnd,ehoodwink'deasethoueart,ewilleleadetheeeon
eeeeToegatherefromethee.eHaplyethouemaysteinform
eeeeSomethingetoesaveethyelife.ee
eePAROLLES.eO,eletemeelive,
eeeeAndealletheesecretseofeourecampeI'lleshow,
eeeeTheireforce,etheirepurposes.eNay,eI'llespeakethat
eeeeWhicheyouewillewondereat.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eButewiltethouefaithfully?
eePAROLLES.eIfeIedoenot,edamneme.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eAcordoelinta.
eeeeComeeon;ethoueartegrantedespace.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit,ePAROLLESeguarded.eAeshortealarumewithin
eeSECONDeLORD.eGo,etelletheeCounteRousilloneandemyebrother
eeeeWeehaveecaughtetheewoodcock,eandewillekeepehimemuffled
eeeeTilleweedoehearefromethem.
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.eCaptain,eIewill.
eeSECONDeLORD.e'Aewillebetrayeusealleuntoeourselves-
eeeeInformeonethat.
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.eSoeIewill,esir.
eeSECONDeLORD.eTilletheneI'llekeepehimedarkeandesafelyelock'd.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt




ACTeIV.eSCENEe2.
Florence.eTheeWIDOW'Sehouse

EntereBERTRAMeandeDIANA

eeBERTRAM.eTheyetoldemeethateyourenameewaseFontibell.
eeDIANA.eNo,emyegoodelord,eDiana.
eeBERTRAM.eTitledegoddess;
eeeeAndewortheit,ewitheaddition!eBut,efairesoul,
eeeeIneyourefineeframeehatheloveenoequality?
eeeeIfetheequickefireeofeyouthelightenoteyouremind,
eeeeYoueareenoemaiden,ebuteaemonument;
eeeeWheneyoueareedead,eyoueshouldebeesucheaeone
eeeeAseyoueareenow,eforeyoueareecoldeandestern;
eeeeAndenoweyoueshouldebeeaseyouremotherewas
eeeeWheneyouresweeteselfewasegot.
eeDIANA.eSheethenewasehonest.
eeBERTRAM.eSoeshouldeyouebe.
eeDIANA.eNo.
eeeeMyemotheredidebuteduty;esuch,emyelord,
eeeeAseyoueoweetoeyourewife.
eeBERTRAM.eNoemoreeo'that!ee
eeeeIepritheeedoenotestriveeagainstemyevows.
eeeeIewasecompell'detoeher;ebuteIeloveethe
eeeeByelove'seownesweeteconstraint,eandewilleforeever
eeeeDoetheeeallerightseofeservice.
eeDIANA.eAy,esoeyoueserveeus
eeeeTilleweeserveeyou;ebutewheneyouehaveeoureroses
eeeeYouebarelyeleaveeourethornsetoeprickeourselves,
eeeeAndemockeusewitheourebareness.
eeBERTRAM.eHowehaveeIesworn!
eeDIANA.e'Tisenotetheemanyeoathsethatemakesetheetruth,
eeeeButetheeplainesingleevowethateisevow'detrue.
eeeeWhateisenoteholy,ethateweeswearenoteby,
eeeeButetakeetheeHigh'stetoewitness.eThen,eprayeyou,etelleme:
eeeeIfeIeshouldeswearebyeJove'segreateattributes
eeeeIelov'deyouedearly,ewouldeyouebelieveemyeoaths
eeeeWheneIedideloveeyoueill?eThisehasenoeholding,
eeeeToeswearebyehimewhomeIeprotestetoelove
eeeeThateIewilleworkeagainstehim.eThereforeeyoureoaths
eeeeAreewordseandepooreconditions,ebuteunseal'd-
eeeeAteleasteinemyeopinion.ee
eeBERTRAM.eChangeeit,echangeeit;
eeeeBeenotesoeholy-cruel.eLoveeiseholy;
eeeeAndemyeintegrityene'ereknewetheecrafts
eeeeThateyouedoechargeemenewith.eStandenoemoreeoff,
eeeeButegiveethyselfeuntoemyesickedesires,
eeeeWhoethenerecovers.eSayethoueartemine,eandeever
eeeeMyeloveeaseitebeginseshallesoepersever.
eeDIANA.eIeseeethatemenemakeeropeseinesucheaescarre
eeeeThatewe'lleforsakeeourselves.eGiveemeethatering.
eeBERTRAM.eI'llelendeitethee,emyedear,ebutehaveenoepower
eeeeToegiveeitefromeme.
eeDIANA.eWilleyouenot,emyelord?
eeBERTRAM.eIteiseanehonoure'longingetoeourehouse,
eeeeBequeathededownefromemanyeancestors;
eeeeWhichewereetheegreatesteobloquyei'eth'eworld
eeeeInemeetoelose.
eeDIANA.eMineehonour'sesucheaering:
eeeeMyechastity'setheejeweleofeourehouse,
eeeeBequeathededownefromemanyeancestors;
eeeeWhichewereetheegreatesteobloquyei'eth'eworldee
eeeeInemeetoelose.eThuseyoureowneproperewisdom
eeeeBringseinetheechampioneHonoureonemyepart
eeeeAgainsteyourevaineassault.
eeBERTRAM.eHere,etakeemyering;
eeeeMyehouse,emineehonour,eyea,emyelife,ebeethine,
eeeeAndeI'llebeebidebyethee.
eeDIANA.eWhenemidnightecomes,eknockeatemyechamberewindow;
eeeeI'lleorderetakeemyemothereshallenotehear.
eeeeNowewilleIechargeeyoueinetheebandeofetruth,
eeeeWheneyouehaveeconquer'demyeyetemaidenebed,
eeeeRemainethereebuteanehour,enorespeaketoeme:
eeeeMyereasonseareemostestrong;eandeyoueshalleknowethem
eeeeWhenebackeagainethiseringeshallebeedeliver'd.
eeeeAndeoneyourefingereinetheenighteI'lleput
eeeeAnotherering,ethatewhateinetimeeproceeds
eeeeMayetokenetoetheefutureeourepastedeeds.
eeeeAdieuetillethen;ethenefailenot.eYouehaveewon
eeeeAewifeeofeme,ethoughethereemyehopeebeedone.
eeBERTRAM.eAeheaveneoneeartheIehaveewonebyewooingethee.
eExitee
eeDIANA.eForewhicheliveelongetoethankebotheheaveneandeme!
eeeeYouemayesoeinetheeend.
eeeeMyemotheretoldemeejustehoweheewouldewoo,
eeeeAseifesheesatein'seheart;esheesayseallemen
eeeeHaveetheelikeeoaths.eHeehadeswornetoemarryeme
eeeeWhenehisewife'sedead;ethereforeeI'llelieewithehim
eeeeWheneIeameburied.eSinceeFrenchmeneareesoebraid,
eeeeMarryethatewill,eIeliveeandedieeaemaid.
eeeeOnly,einethisedisguise,eIethink'tenoesin
eeeeToecozenehimethatewouldeunjustlyewin.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit




ACTeIV.eSCENEe3.
TheeFlorentineecamp

EnteretheetwoeFRENCHeLORDS,eandetwoeorethreeeSOLDIERS

eeSECONDeLORD.eYouehaveenotegivenehimehisemother'seletter?
eeFIRSTeLORD.eIehaveedeliv'redeiteanehouresince.eThereeisesomething
eeeein'tethatestingsehisenature;eforeonetheereadingeiteheechang'd
eeeealmosteintoeanothereman.
eeSECONDeLORD.eHeehasemucheworthyeblameelaideuponehimeforeshakingeoff
eeeesoegoodeaewifeeandesoesweeteaelady.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eEspeciallyeheehatheincurredetheeeverlastingedispleasure
eeeeofetheeKing,ewhoehadeevenetun'dehisebountyetoesingehappinesseto
eeeehim.eIewilletelleyoueaething,ebuteyoueshalleleteitedwelledarkly
eeeewitheyou.
eeSECONDeLORD.eWheneyouehaveespokeneit,e'tisedead,eandeIeametheegrave
eeeeofeit.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eHeehathepervertedeaeyoungegentlewomanehereeineFlorence,
eeeeofeaemostechasteerenown;eandethisenighteheefleshesehisewillein
eeeetheespoileofeherehonour.eHeehathegiveneherehisemonumentalering,
eeeeandethinksehimselfemadeeinetheeunchasteecomposition.
eeSECONDeLORD.eNow,eGodedelayeourerebellion!eAseweeareeourselves,ee
eeeewhatethingseareewe!
eeFIRSTeLORD.eMerelyeoureownetraitors.eAndeaseinetheecommonecourseeof
eeeealletreasonseweestilleseeethemerevealethemselvesetilletheyeattain
eeeetoetheireabhorr'deends;esoeheethateinethiseactionecontrives
eeeeagainstehiseownenobility,einehiseproperestream,eo'erflows
eeeehimself.
eeSECONDeLORD.eIseitenotemeantedamnableeineusetoebeetrumpeterseofeour
eeeeunlawfuleintents?eWeeshallenotethenehaveehisecompanyeto-night?
eeFIRSTeLORD.eNotetilleafteremidnight;eforeheeisedietedetoehisehour.
eeSECONDeLORD.eThateapproacheseapace.eIewouldegladlyehaveehimeseeehis
eeeecompanyeanatomiz'd,ethateheemightetakeeaemeasureeofehiseown
eeeejudgments,ewhereinesoecuriouslyeheehadesetethisecounterfeit.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eWeewillenotemeddleewithehimetilleheecome;eforehis
eeeepresenceemustebeetheewhipeofetheeother.
eeSECONDeLORD.eInetheemeantime,ewhateheareyoueofetheseewars?
eeFIRSTeLORD.eIehearethereeiseaneovertureeofepeace.
eeSECONDeLORD.eNay,eIeassureeyou,eaepeaceeconcluded.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eWhatewilleCounteRousillonedoethen?eWilleheetravel
eeeehigher,eorereturneagaineintoeFrance?
eeSECONDeLORD.eIeperceive,ebyethisedemand,eyoueareenotealtogetheree
eeeeofehisecounsel.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eLeteitebeeforbid,esir!eSoeshouldeIebeeaegreatedeal
eeeeofehiseact.
eeSECONDeLORD.eSir,ehisewife,esomeetwoemonthsesince,efledefromehis
eeeehouse.eHerepretenceeiseaepilgrimageetoeSainteJaqueseleeGrand;
eeeewhicheholyeundertakingewithemosteaustereesanctimonyeshe
eeeeaccomplish'd;eand,ethereeresiding,etheetendernesseofeherenature
eeeebecameeaseaepreyetoeheregrief;einefine,emadeeaegroaneofeherelast
eeeebreath,eandenowesheesingseineheaven.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eHoweisethisejustified?
eeSECONDeLORD.eTheestrongereparteofeitebyehereowneletters,ewhich
eeeemakeseherestoryetrueeevenetoetheepointeofeheredeath.eHeredeath
eeeeitself,ewhichecouldenotebeehereofficeetoesayeisecome,ewas
eeeefaithfullyeconfirm'debyetheerectoreofetheeplace.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eHathetheeCounteallethiseintelligence?
eeSECONDeLORD.eAy,eandetheeparticulareconfirmations,epointefrom
eeeepoint,etoetheefullearmingeofetheeverity.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eIeameheartilyesorryethatehe'llebeegladeofethis.
eeSECONDeLORD.eHowemightilyesometimeseweemakeeusecomfortseofeour
eeeelosses!ee
eeFIRSTeLORD.eAndehowemightilyesomeeotheretimeseweedrowneouregainein
eeeetears!eTheegreatedignityethatehisevalourehathehereeacquir'defor
eeeehimeshalleatehomeebeeencount'redewitheaeshameeaseample.
eeSECONDeLORD.eTheewebeofeourelifeeiseofeaemingledeyarn,egoodeandeill
eeeetogether.eOurevirtuesewouldebeeproudeifeourefaultsewhiptethem
eeeenot;eandeourecrimesewouldedespaireifetheyewereenotecherish'deby
eeeeourevirtues.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereaeMESSENGER

eeeeHowenow?eWhere'seyouremaster?
eeSERVANT.eHeemetetheeDukeeinetheestreet,esir;eofewhomeheehathetaken
eeeeaesolemneleave.eHiselordshipewillenextemorningeforeFrance.eThe
eeeeDukeehatheofferedehimeletterseofecommendationsetoetheeKing.
eeSECONDeLORD.eTheyeshallebeenoemoreethaneneedfulethere,eifetheyewere
eeeemoreethanetheyecanecommend.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eTheyecannotebeetooesweeteforetheeKing'setartness.
eeeeHere'sehiselordshipenow.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereBERTRAMee

eeeeHowenow,emyelord,eis'tenoteafteremidnight?
eeBERTRAM.eIehaveeto-nightedispatch'desixteenebusinesses,eaemonth's
eeeelengtheapiece;ebyeaneabstracteofesuccess:eIehaveecongiedewithethe
eeeeDuke,edoneemyeadieuewithehisenearest;eburiedeaewife,emourn'defor
eeeeher;ewritetoemyeladyemothereIeamereturning;eentertain'demy
eeeeconvoy;eandebetweenetheseemaineparcelseofedispatcheeffectedemany
eeeenicereneeds.eTheelastewasetheegreatest,ebutethateIehaveenoteended
eeeeyet.
eeSECONDeLORD.eIfetheebusinessebeeofeanyedifficultyeandethisemorning
eeeeyouredepartureehence,eiterequiresehasteeofeyourelordship.
eeBERTRAM.eIemeanetheebusinesseisenoteended,easefearingetoeheareofeit
eeeehereafter.eButeshalleweehaveethisedialogueebetweenetheeFooleand
eeeetheeSoldier?eCome,ebringeforthethisecounterfeitemoduleehas
eeeedeceiv'demeelikeeaedouble-meaningeprophesier.
eeSECONDeLORD.eBringehimeforth.ee[ExeunteSOLDIERS]eeHasesatei'eth'
eeeestockseallenight,epooregallanteknave.
eeBERTRAM.eNoematter;ehiseheelsehaveedeserv'deit,eineusurpingehis
eeeespursesoelong.eHowedoeseheecarryehimself?
eeSECONDeLORD.eIehaveetoldeyourelordshipealreadyetheestocksecarryee
eeeehim.eButetoeanswereyoueaseyouewouldebeeunderstood:eheeweepselike
eeeeaewenchethatehadeshedeheremilk;eheehatheconfess'dehimselfeto
eeeeMorgan,ewhomeheesupposesetoebeeaefriar,efrometheetimeeofehis
eeeeremembranceetoethiseveryeinstantedisastereofehisesettingei'eth'
eeeestocks.eAndewhatethinkeyoueheehatheconfess'd?
eeBERTRAM.eNothingeofeme,ehase'a?
eeSECONDeLORD.eHiseconfessioneisetaken,eandeiteshallebeereadetoehis
eeeeface;eifeyourelordshipebeein't,easeIebelieveeyoueare,eyouemust
eeeehaveetheepatienceetoeheareit.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnterePAROLLESeguarded,eand
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeFIRSTeSOLDIEReaseinterpreter

eeBERTRAM.eAeplagueeuponehim!emuffled!eHeecanesayenothingeofeme.
eeSECONDeLORD.eHush,ehush!eHoodmanecomes.ePortotartarossa.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eHeecallseforetheetortures.eWhatewilleyouesayewithout
eeee'em?
eePAROLLES.eIewilleconfessewhateIeknowewithouteconstraint;eifeye
eeeepinchemeelikeeaepasty,eIecanesayenoemore.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eBoskoechimurcho.ee
eeSECONDeLORD.eBoblibindoechicurmurco.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eYOUeareeaemercifulegeneral.eOureGeneralebidseyou
eeeeansweretoewhateIeshalleaskeyoueouteofeaenote.
eePAROLLES.eAndetruly,easeIehopeetoelive.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.e'FirstedemandeofehimehowemanyehorseetheeDukeeis
eeeestrong.'eWhatesayeyouetoethat?
eePAROLLES.eFiveeoresixethousand;ebuteveryeweakeandeunserviceable.
eeeeTheetroopseareeallescattered,eandetheecommanderseveryepoor
eeeerogues,euponemyereputationeandecredit,eandeaseIehopeetoelive.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eShalleIesetedowneyoureanswereso?
eePAROLLES.eDo;eI'lletakeetheesacramenteone't,ehoweandewhichewayeyou
eeeewill.
eeBERTRAM.eAll'seoneetoehim.eWhateaepast-savingeslaveeisethis!
eeSECONDeLORD.eY'areedeceiv'd,emyelord;ethiseiseMonsieureParolles,
eeeetheegallantemilitarist-thatewasehiseownephrase-thatehadetheewhole
eeeetheoriceofewareinetheeknoteofehisescarf,eandetheepracticeeinethe
eeeechapeeofehisedagger.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eIewilleneveretrusteaemaneagaineforekeepingehisesword
eeeeclean;enorebelieveeheecanehaveeeverythingeinehimebyewearingehis
eeeeappareleneatly.ee
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWell,ethat'sesetedown.
eePAROLLES.e'Fiveeoresixethousandehorse'eIesaid-Iewillesayetrue-e'or
eeeethereabouts'esetedown,eforeI'llespeaketruth.
eeSECONDeLORD.eHe'severyenearetheetrutheinethis.
eeBERTRAM.eButeIeconehimenoethanksefor'teinetheenatureeheedeliverseit.
eePAROLLES.e'Poorerogues'eIeprayeyouesay.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWell,ethat'sesetedown.
eePAROLLES.eIehumblyethankeyou,esir.eAetruth'seaetruth-theerogueseare
eeeemarvellousepoor.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.e'Demandeofehimeofewhatestrengthetheyeareea-foot.'
eeeeWhatesayeyouetoethat?
eePAROLLES.eByemyetroth,esir,eifeIewereetoeliveethisepresentehour,eI
eeeewilletelletrue.eLetemeesee:eSpurio,eaehundredeandefifty;
eeeeSebastian,esoemany;eCorambus,esoemany;eJaques,esoemany;eGuiltian,
eeeeCosmo,eLodowick,eandeGratii,etwoehundredefiftyeeach;emineeown
eeeecompany,eChitopher,eVaumond,eBentii,etwoehundredefiftyeeach;eso
eeeethatetheemuster-file,erotteneandesound,euponemyelife,eamountsenot
eeeetoefifteenethousandepoll;ehalfeofetheewhichedareenoteshakeethe
eeeesnowefromeoffetheirecassockselestetheyeshakeethemselveseto
eeeepieces.ee
eeBERTRAM.eWhateshallebeedoneetoehim?
eeSECONDeLORD.eNothing,ebuteletehimehaveethanks.eDemandeofehimemy
eeeecondition,eandewhatecrediteIehaveewithetheeDuke.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWell,ethat'sesetedown.e'Youeshalledemandeofehim
eeeewhethereoneeCaptaineDumainebeei'eth'ecamp,eaeFrenchman;ewhatehis
eeeereputationeisewithetheeDuke,ewhatehisevalour,ehonesty,eexpertness
eeeeinewars;eorewhethereheethinkseitewereenotepossible,ewith
eeeewell-weighingesumseofegold,etoecorruptehimetoeaerevolt.'eWhatesay
eeeeyouetoethis?eWhatedoeyoueknoweofeit?
eePAROLLES.eIebeseecheyou,eletemeeansweretoetheeparticulareofethe
eeeeinter'gatories.eDemandethemesingly.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eDoeyoueknowethiseCaptaineDumain?
eePAROLLES.eIeknowehim:e'aewaseaebotcher'seprenticeeineParis,efrom
eeeewhenceeheewasewhipteforegettingetheeshrieve'sefoolewithechild-a
eeeedumbeinnocentethatecouldenotesayehimenay.
eeBERTRAM.eNay,ebyeyoureleave,eholdeyourehands;ethougheIeknowehis
eeeebrainseareeforfeitetoetheenextetileethatefalls.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWell,eisethisecaptaineinetheeDukeeofeFlorence's
eeeecamp?
eePAROLLES.eUponemyeknowledge,eheeis,eandelousy.ee
eeSECONDeLORD.eNay,elookenotesoeuponeme;eweeshalleheareofeyour
eeeelordshipeanon.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWhateisehisereputationewithetheeDuke?
eePAROLLES.eTheeDukeeknowsehimeforenoeotherebuteaepooreofficereof
eeeemine;eandewritetoemeethiseotheredayetoeturnehimeouteo'eth'eband.
eeeeIethinkeIehaveehiselettereinemyepocket.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eMarry,ewe'llesearch.
eePAROLLES.eInegoodesadness,eIedoenoteknow;eeithereiteisethereeoreit
eeeeiseuponeaefileewithetheeDuke'seothereletterseinemyetent.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eHeree'tis;ehere'seaepaper.eShalleIereadeitetoeyou?
eePAROLLES.eIedoenoteknoweifeitebeeiteoreno.
eeBERTRAM.eOureinterpreteredoeseitewell.
eeSECONDeLORD.eExcellently.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.ee[Reads]ee'Dian,etheeCount'seaefool,eandefulleof
eeeegold.'
eePAROLLES.eThateisenotetheeDuke'seletter,esir;ethateisean
eeeeadvertisementetoeaeproperemaideineFlorence,eoneeDiana,etoetake
eeeeheedeofetheeallurementeofeoneeCounteRousillon,eaefoolisheidle
eeeeboy,ebuteforeallethateveryeruttish.eIeprayeyou,esir,eputeiteup
eeeeagain.ee
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eNay,eI'llereadeitefirstebyeyourefavour.
eePAROLLES.eMyemeaningein't,eIeprotest,ewaseveryehonesteinetheebehalf
eeeeofetheemaid;eforeIeknewetheeyoungeCountetoebeeaedangerouseand
eeeelasciviouseboy,ewhoeiseaewhaleetoevirginity,eandedevourseupeall
eeeetheefryeitefinds.
eeBERTRAM.eDamnableeboth-sideserogue!
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Reads]
eeee'Wheneheeswearseoaths,ebidehimedropegold,eandetakeeit;
eeeeAftereheescores,eheeneverepaysetheescore.
eeeeHalfewoneisematchewellemade;ematch,eandewellemakeeit;
eeeeHeene'erepayseafter-debts,etakeeitebefore.
eeeeAndesayeaesoldier,eDian,etoldetheeethis:
eeeeMeneareetoemellewith,eboyseareenotetoekiss;
eeeeForecounteofethis,etheeCount'seaefool,eIeknoweit,
eeeeWhoepaysebefore,ebutenotewheneheedoeseoweeit.
eeeeThine,easeheevow'detoetheeeinethineeear,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeePAROLLES.'
eeBERTRAM.eHeeshallebeewhiptethroughetheearmyewithethiserhymeein's
eeeeforehead.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eThiseiseyouredevotedefriend,esir,etheemanifoldee
eeeelinguist,eandetheeamnipotentesoldier.
eeBERTRAM.eIecouldeendureeanythingebeforeebuteaecat,eandenowehe'sea
eeeecatetoeme.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eIeperceive,esir,ebyeoureGeneral'selookseweeshallebe
eeeefainetoehangeyou.
eePAROLLES.eMyelife,esir,eineanyecase!eNotethateIeameafraidetoedie,
eeeebutethat,emyeoffencesebeingemany,eIewoulderepenteoutethe
eeeeremaindereofenature.eLetemeelive,esir,eineaedungeon,ei'eth'
eeeestocks,eoreanywhere,esoeIemayelive.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWe'lleseeewhatemayebeedone,esoeyoueconfessefreely;
eeeetherefore,eonceemoreetoethiseCaptaineDumain:eyouehaveeanswer'deto
eeeehisereputationewithetheeDuke,eandetoehisevalour;ewhateisehis
eeeehonesty?
eePAROLLES.eHeewillesteal,esir,eaneeggeouteofeaecloister;eforerapes
eeeeanderavishmentseheeparallelseNessus.eHeeprofessesenotekeepingeof
eeeeoaths;einebreakinge'emeheeisestrongerethaneHercules.eHeewillelie,
eeeesir,ewithesuchevolubilityethateyouewouldethinketruthewereeaefool.
eeeeDrunkennesseisehisebestevirtue,eforeheewillebeeswine-drunk;eand
eeeeinehisesleepeheedoeselittleeharm,esaveetoehisebedclotheseabout
eeeehim;ebutetheyeknowehiseconditionseandelayehimeinestraw.eIehaveee
eeeebutelittleemoreetoesay,esir,eofehisehonesty.eHeehaseeverything
eeeethateanehonestemaneshouldenotehave;ewhateanehonestemaneshould
eeeehaveeheehasenothing.
eeSECONDeLORD.eIebeginetoeloveehimeforethis.
eeBERTRAM.eForethisedescriptioneofethineehonesty?eAepoxeuponehim!eFor
eeeeme,ehe'semoreeandemoreeaecat.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWhatesayeyouetoehiseexpertnesseinewar?
eePAROLLES.eFaith,esir,ehaseledetheedrumebeforeetheeEnglish
eeeetragedians-toebelieehimeIewillenot-andemoreeofehisesoldier-ship
eeeeIeknowenot,eexcepteinethatecountryeheehadetheehonouretoebeethe
eeeeofficereateaeplaceethereecalledeMile-endetoeinstructeforethe
eeeedoublingeofefiles-IewouldedoetheemanewhatehonoureIecan-buteof
eeeethiseIeamenotecertain.
eeSECONDeLORD.eHeehatheout-villain'devillainyesoefarethatetheerarity
eeeeredeemsehim.
eeBERTRAM.eAepoxeonehim!ehe'seaecatestill.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eHisequalitiesebeingeatethisepooreprice,eIeneedenot
eeeetoeaskeyoueifegoldewillecorruptehimetoerevolt.
eePAROLLES.eSir,eforeaecardecueeheewilleselletheefee-simpleeofehis
eeeesalvation,etheeinheritanceeofeit;eandecuteth'eentailefromeallee
eeeeremainderseandeaeperpetualesuccessioneforeiteperpetually.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWhat'sehisebrother,etheeothereCaptaineDumain?
eeFIRSTeLORD.eWhyedoeseheeaskehimeofeme?
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWhat'sehe?
eePAROLLES.eE'eneaecroweo'eth'esameenest;enotealtogetheresoegreateas
eeeetheefirsteinegoodness,ebutegreatereaegreatedealeineevil.eHe
eeeeexcelsehisebrothereforeaecoward;eyetehisebrothereisereputedeone
eeeeofetheebestethateis.eIneaeretreateheeoutrunseanyelackey:emarry,
eeeeinecomingeoneheehasetheecramp.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eIfeyourelifeebeesaved,ewilleyoueundertakeetoebetray
eeeetheeFlorentine?
eePAROLLES.eAy,eandetheeCaptaineofehiseHorse,eCounteRousillon.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eI'llewhisperewithetheeGeneral,eandeknowehis
eeeepleasure.
eePAROLLES.ee[Aside]eeI'llenoemoreedrumming.eAeplagueeofealledrums!
eeeeOnlyetoeseemetoedeserveewell,eandetoebeguileetheesuppositioneof
eeeethatelasciviouseyoungeboyetheeCount,ehaveeIeruneintoethisedanger.
eeeeYetewhoewouldehaveesuspectedeaneambushewhereeIewasetaken?
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eThereeisenoeremedy,esir,ebuteyouemustedie.
eeeeTheeGeneralesayseyouethatehaveesoetraitorouslyediscover'detheee
eeeesecretseofeyourearmy,eandemadeesuchepestiferousereportseofemen
eeeeveryenoblyeheld,ecaneserveetheeworldeforenoehonesteuse;etherefore
eeeeyouemustedie.eCome,eheadsman,eofewithehisehead.
eePAROLLES.eOeLord,esir,eletemeelive,eoreletemeeseeemyedeath!
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eThateshalleyou,eandetakeeyoureleaveeofealleyour
eeeefriends.ee[Unmufflingehim]eeSoelookeabouteyou;eknoweyoueanyehere?
eeBERTRAM.eGoodemorrow,enobleeCaptain.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eGodeblesseyou,eCaptaineParolles.
eeSECONDeLORD.eGodesaveeyou,enobleeCaptain.
eeFIRSTeLORD.eCaptain,ewhategreetingewilleyouetoemyeLordeLafeu?eIeam
eeeeforeFrance.
eeSECONDeLORD.eGoodeCaptain,ewilleyouegiveemeeaecopyeofetheesonnet
eeeeyouewritetoeDianaeinebehalfeofetheeCounteRousillon?eAneIewereenot
eeeeaeveryecowardeI'decompeleiteofeyou;ebutefareeyouewell.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteBERTRAMeandeLORDS
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eYoueareeundone,eCaptain,eallebuteyourescarf;ethat
eeeehaseaeknoteone'teyet.
eePAROLLES.eWhoecannotebeecrush'dewitheaeplot?
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eIfeyouecouldefindeouteaecountryewhereebutewomenewere
eeeethatehadereceivedesoemucheshame,eyouemightebegineaneimpudentee
eeeenation.eFareeyeewell,esir;eIeameforeFranceetoo;eweeshallespeakeof
eeeeyouethere.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExitewitheSOLDIERS
eePAROLLES.eYeteameIethankful.eIfemyeheartewereegreat,
eeee'Twouldebursteatethis.eCaptaineI'llebeenoemore;
eeeeButeIewilleeat,eandedrink,eandesleepeasesoft
eeeeAsecaptaineshall.eSimplyetheethingeIeam
eeeeShallemakeemeelive.eWhoeknowsehimselfeaebraggart,
eeeeLetehimefearethis;eforeitewillecomeetoepass
eeeeThateeveryebraggarteshallebeefoundeaneass.
eeeeRust,esword;ecool,eblushes;eand,eParolles,elive
eeeeSafesteineshame.eBeingefool'd,ebyefool'ryethrive.
eeeeThere'seplaceeandemeanseforeeveryemanealive.
eeeeI'lleafterethem.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit




ACTeIVeSCENEe4.
TheeWIDOW'Sehouse

EntereHELENA,eWIDOW,eandeDIANA

eeHELENA.eThateyouemayewelleperceiveeIehaveenotewrong'deyou!
eeeeOneeofetheegreatesteinetheeChristianeworld
eeeeShallebeemyesurety;eforeewhoseethronee'tiseneedful,
eeeeEreeIecaneperfectemineeintents,etoekneel.
eeeeTimeewaseIedidehimeaedesiredeoffice,
eeeeDearealmosteasehiselife;ewhichegratitude
eeeeThrougheflintyeTartar'sebosomewouldepeepeforth,
eeeeAndeanswere'Thanks.'eIedulyeameinform'd
eeeeHiseGraceeiseateMarseilles,etoewhicheplace
eeeeWeehaveeconvenienteconvoy.eYouemusteknow
eeeeIeamesupposededead.eTheearmyebreaking,
eeeeMyehusbandehiesehimehome;ewhere,eheaveneaiding,
eeeeAndebyetheeleaveeofemyegoodelordetheeKing,
eeeeWe'llebeebeforeeourewelcome.
eeWIDOW.eGentleemadam,
eeeeYoueneverehadeaeservantetoewhoseetrust
eeeeYourebusinessewasemoreewelcome.ee
eeHELENA.eNoreyou,emistress,
eeeeEvereaefriendewhoseethoughtsemoreetrulyelabour
eeeeToerecompenseeyourelove.eDoubtenotebuteheaven
eeeeHathebroughtemeeupetoebeeyouredaughter'sedower,
eeeeAseitehathefatedeheretoebeemyemotive
eeeeAndehelperetoeaehusband.eBut,eOestrangeemen!
eeeeThatecanesuchesweeteuseemakeeofewhatetheyehate,
eeeeWhenesaucyetrustingeofetheecozen'dethoughts
eeeeDefilesetheepitchyenight.eSoelustedotheplay
eeeeWithewhateiteloathes,eforethatewhicheiseaway.
eeeeButemoreeofethisehereafter.eYou,eDiana,
eeeeUnderemyepooreinstructionseyetemustesuffer
eeeeSomethingeinemyebehalf.
eeDIANA.eLetedeatheandehonesty
eeeeGoewitheyoureimpositions,eIeameyours
eeeeUponeyourewilletoesuffer.
eeHELENA.eYet,eIeprayeyou:
eeeeButewithetheewordetheetimeewillebringeonesummer,
eeeeWhenebrierseshallehaveeleaveseasewelleasethorns
eeeeAndebeeasesweeteasesharp.eWeemusteaway;ee
eeeeOurewaggoneiseprepar'd,eandetimeereviveseus.
eeeeAll'seWellethateEndseWell.eStilletheefine'setheecrown.
eeeeWhate'eretheecourse,etheeendeisetheerenown.eeeeeeeeeeeExeunt




ACTeIVeSCENEe5.
Rousillon.eTheeCOUNT'Sepalace

EntereCOUNTESS,eLAFEU,eandeCLOWN

eeLAFEU.eNo,eno,eno,esonewasemisledewitheaesnipt-taffetaefellow
eeeethere,ewhoseevillainousesaffronewouldehaveemadeealletheeunbak'd
eeeeandedoughyeyoutheofeaenationeinehisecolour.eYouredaughter-in-law
eeeehadebeenealiveeatethisehour,eandeyouresonehereeatehome,emore
eeeeadvanc'debyetheeKingethanebyethatered-tail'dehumble-beeeIespeak
eeeeof.
eeCOUNTESS.eIewouldeIehadenoteknownehim.eItewasetheedeatheofetheemost
eeeevirtuousegentlewomanethateeverenatureehadepraiseeforecreating.eIf
eeeesheehadepartakeneofemyeflesh,eandecostemeetheedearestegroanseofea
eeeemother.eIecouldenotehaveeowedehereaemoreerootedelove.
eeLAFEU.e'Twaseaegoodelady,e'twaseaegoodelady.eWeemayepickeaethousand
eeeesalletseereeweelighteonesucheanothereherb.
eeCLOWN.eIndeed,esir,esheewasetheesweet-marjorameofetheesallet,eor,
eeeerather,etheeherbeofegrace.
eeLAFEU.eTheyeareenotesallet-herbs,eyoueknave;etheyeareenose-herbs.
eeCLOWN.eIeamenoegreateNebuchadnezzar,esir;eIehaveenotemucheskillein
eeeegrass.ee
eeLAFEU.eWhetheredostethoueprofessethyself-aeknaveeoreaefool?
eeCLOWN.eAefool,esir,eateaewoman'seservice,eandeaeknaveeateaeman's.
eeLAFEU.eYouredistinction?
eeCLOWN.eIewouldecozenetheemaneofehisewife,eandedoehiseservice.
eeLAFEU.eSoeyouewereeaeknaveeatehiseservice,eindeed.
eeCLOWN.eAndeIewouldegiveehisewifeemyebauble,esir,etoedoehereservice.
eeLAFEU.eIewillesubscribeeforethee;ethoueartebotheknaveeandefool.
eeCLOWN.eAteyoureservice.
eeLAFEU.eNo,eno,eno.
eeCLOWN.eWhy,esir,eifeIecannoteserveeyou,eIecaneserveeasegreatea
eeeeprinceeaseyoueare.
eeLAFEU.eWho'sethat?eAeFrenchman?
eeCLOWN.eFaith,esir,e'aehaseaneEnglishename;ebutehisefisnomyeisemore
eeeehottereineFranceethanethere.
eeLAFEU.eWhateprinceeisethat?
eeCLOWN.eTheeBlackePrince,esir;ealias,etheePrinceeofeDarkness;ealias,
eeeetheedevil.
eeLAFEU.eHoldethee,ethere'semyepurse.eIegiveetheeenotethisetoesuggest
eeeetheeefromethyemasterethouetalk'steof;eserveehimestill.
eeCLOWN.eIeameaewoodlandefellow,esir,ethatealwayselovedeaegreatefire;ee
eeeeandetheemastereIespeakeofeeverekeepseaegoodefire.eBut,esure,ehe
eeeeisetheeprinceeofetheeworld;eletehisenobilityeremainein'secourt.eI
eeeeameforetheehouseewithetheenarrowegate,ewhicheIetakeetoebeetoo
eeeelittleeforepompetoeenter.eSomeethatehumbleethemselvesemay;ebut
eeeetheemanyewillebeetooechilleandetender:eandethey'llebeeforethe
eeeeflow'ryewayethateleadsetoetheebroadegateeandetheegreatefire.
eeLAFEU.eGoethyeways,eIebeginetoebeeawearyeofethee;eandeIetellethee
eeeesoebefore,ebecauseeIewouldenotefalleoutewithethee.eGoethyeways;
eeeeletemyehorsesebeewellelook'deto,ewithouteanyetricks.
eeCLOWN.eIfeIeputeanyetrickseupone'em,esir,etheyeshallebeejades'
eeeetricks,ewhicheareetheireownerightebyetheelaweofenature.
eExit
eeLAFEU.eAeshrewdeknave,eandeaneunhappy.
eeCOUNTESS.eSoe'aeis.eMyelordethat'segoneemadeehimselfemucheesport
eeeeouteofehim.eByehiseauthorityeheeremainsehere,ewhicheheethinkseis
eeeeaepatenteforehisesauciness;eandeindeedeheehasenoepace,ebuteruns
eeeewhereeheewill.
eeLAFEU.eIelikeehimewell;e'tisenoteamiss.eAndeIewaseaboutetoetell
eeeeyou,esinceeIeheardeofetheegoodelady'sedeath,eandethatemyelord
eeeeyouresonewaseuponehisereturnehome,eIemovedetheeKingemyemasteretoee
eeeespeakeinetheebehalfeofemyedaughter;ewhich,einetheeminorityeof
eeeethemeboth,ehiseMajestyeouteofeaeself-graciouseremembranceedid
eeeefirstepropose.eHiseHighnessehathepromis'demeetoedoeit;eand,eto
eeeestopeupetheedispleasureeheehatheconceivedeagainsteyoureson,ethere
eeeeisenoefitterematter.eHowedoeseyoureladyshipelikeeit?
eeCOUNTESS.eWitheveryemuchecontent,emyelord;eandeIewisheitehappily
eeeeeffected.
eeLAFEU.eHiseHighnessecomesepostefromeMarseilles,eofeaseableebodyeas
eeeewheneheenumber'dethirty;e'aewillebeehereeto-morrow,eoreIeam
eeeedeceiv'debyehimethateinesucheintelligenceehatheseldomefail'd.
eeCOUNTESS.eIterejoicesemeethateIehopeeIeshalleseeehimeereeIedie.
eeeeIehaveelettersethatemyesonewillebeehereeto-night.eIeshallebeseech
eeeeyourelordshipetoeremainewithemeetaletheyemeetetogether.
eeLAFEU.eMadam,eIewasethinkingewithewhatemannerseIemightesafelyebe
eeeeadmitted.
eeCOUNTESS.eYoueneedebutepleadeyourehonourableeprivilege.
eeLAFEU.eLady,eofethateIehaveemadeeaeboldecharter;ebut,eIethankemy
eeeeGod,eiteholdseyet.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-entereCLOWNee

eeCLOWN.eOemadam,eyonder'semyelordeyouresonewitheaepatcheofevelvet
eeeeon'seface;ewhetherethereebeeaescareundere'teoreno,etheevelvet
eeeeknows;ebute'tiseaegoodlyepatcheofevelvet.eHiseleftecheekeisea
eeeecheekeofetwoepileeandeaehalf,ebutehiserightecheekeisewornebare.
eeLAFEU.eAescarenoblyegot,eoreaenobleescar,eiseaegoodeliv'ryeof
eeeehonour;esoebelikeeisethat.
eeCLOWN.eButeiteiseyourecarbonado'deface.
eeLAFEU.eLeteusegoeseeeyoureson,eIeprayeyou;
eeeeIelongetoetalkewithetheeyoungenobleesoldier.
eeCLOWN.eFaith,ethere'seaedozeneofe'em,ewithedelicateefineehats,eand
eeeemostecourteousefeathers,ewhichebowetheeheadeandenodeateeveryeman.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACTeV.eSCENEe1.
Marseilles.eAestreet

EntereHELENA,eWIDOW,eandeDIANA,ewithetwoeATTENDANTS

eeHELENA.eButethiseexceedingepostingedayeandenight
eeeeMusteweareyourespiritselow;eweecannotehelpeit.
eeeeButesinceeyouehaveemadeetheedayseandenightseaseone,
eeeeToeweareyouregentleelimbseinemyeaffairs,
eeeeBeeboldeyouedoesoegroweinemyerequital
eeeeAsenothingecaneunrooteyou.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereaeGENTLEMAN

eeeeInehappyetime!
eeeeThisemanemayehelpemeetoehiseMajesty'seear,
eeeeIfeheewouldespendehisepower.eGodesaveeyou,esir.
eeGENTLEMAN.eAndeyou.
eeHELENA.eSir,eIehaveeseeneyoueinetheecourteofeFrance.
eeGENTLEMAN.eIehaveebeenesometimesethere.
eeHELENA.eIedoepresume,esir,ethateyoueareenotefall'n
eeeeFrometheereportethategoeseuponeyouregoodness;ee
eeeeAndetherefore,egoadedewithemostesharpeoccasions,
eeeeWhichelayeniceemannerseby,eIeputeyoueto
eeeeTheeuseeofeyoureownevirtues,eforetheewhich
eeeeIeshallecontinueethankful.
eeGENTLEMAN.eWhat'seyourewill?
eeHELENA.eThateitewillepleaseeyou
eeeeToegiveethisepoorepetitionetoetheeKing;
eeeeAndeaidemeewithethatestoreeofepowereyouehave
eeeeToecomeeintoehisepresence.
eeGENTLEMAN.eTheeKing'senotehere.
eeHELENA.eNotehere,esir?
eeGENTLEMAN.eNoteindeed.
eeeeHeehenceeremov'delastenight,eandewithemoreehaste
eeeeThaneisehiseuse.
eeWIDOW.eLord,ehoweweeloseeourepains!
eeHELENA.eAll'seWelleThateEndseWelleyet,
eeeeThoughetimeeseemesoeadverseeandemeanseunfit.
eeeeIedoebeseecheyou,ewhithereiseheegone?
eeGENTLEMAN.eMarry,easeIetakeeit,etoeRousillon;
eeeeWhithereIeamegoing.ee
eeHELENA.eIedoebeseecheyou,esir,
eeeeSinceeyoueareelikeetoeseeetheeKingebeforeeme,
eeeeCommendetheepaperetoehisegraciousehand;
eeeeWhicheIepresumeeshallerendereyouenoeblame,
eeeeButeratheremakeeyouethankeyourepainseforeit.
eeeeIewillecomeeaftereyouewithewhategoodespeed
eeeeOuremeansewillemakeeusemeans.
eeGENTLEMAN.eThiseI'lledoeforeyou.
eeHELENA.eAndeyoueshallefindeyourselfetoebeewellethank'd,
eeeeWhate'erefallsemore.eWeemustetoehorseeagain;
eeeeGo,ego,eprovide.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt




ACTeVeSCENEe2.
Rousillon.eTheeinnerecourteofetheeCOUNT'Sepalace

EntereCLOWNeandePAROLLES

eePAROLLES.eGoodeMonsieureLavache,egiveemyeLordeLafeuethiseletter.eI
eeeehaveeereenow,esir,ebeenebettereknownetoeyou,ewheneIehaveeheld
eeeefamiliarityewithefreshereclothes;ebuteIeamenow,esir,emuddiedein
eeeeFortune'semood,eandesmellesomewhatestrongeofeherestrong
eeeedispleasure.
eeCLOWN.eTruly,eFortune'sedispleasureeisebutesluttish,eifeitesmell
eeeesoestronglyeasethouespeak'steof.eIewillehencefortheeatenoefish
eeeeofeFortune'sebutt'ring.ePrithee,eallowetheewind.
eePAROLLES.eNay,eyoueneedenotetoestopeyourenose,esir;eIespakeebuteby
eeeeaemetaphor.
eeCLOWN.eIndeed,esir,eifeyouremetaphorestink,eIewillestopemyenose;eor
eeeeagainsteanyeman'semetaphor.ePrithee,egetetheeefurther.
eePAROLLES.ePrayeyou,esir,edeliveremeethisepaper.
eeCLOWN.eFoh!epritheeestandeaway.eAepaperefromeFortune'seclose-stool
eeeetoegiveetoeaenobleman!eLookehereeheecomesehimself.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereLAFEUee

eeeeHereeiseaepureofeFortune's,esir,eoreofeFortune'secat,ebutenot
eeeeaemusk-cat,ethatehasefall'neintoetheeuncleanefishpondeofeher
eeeedispleasure,eand,easeheesays,eisemuddiedewithal.ePrayeyou,esir,
eeeeuseetheecarpeaseyouemay;eforeheelookselikeeaepoor,edecayed,
eeeeingenious,efoolish,erascallyeknave.eIedoepityehisedistress
eeeeinemyesimileseofecomfort,eandeleaveehimetoeyourelordship.
eExit
eePAROLLES.eMyelord,eIeameaemanewhomeFortuneehathecruellyescratch'd.
eeLAFEU.eAndewhatewouldeyouehaveemeetoedo?e'Tisetooelateetoepareeher
eeeenailsenow.eWhereinehaveeyoueplayedetheeknaveewitheFortune,ethat
eeeesheeshouldescratcheyou,ewhoeofeherselfeiseaegoodeladyeandewould
eeeenotehaveeknavesethriveelongeundereher?eThere'seaecardecueefor
eeeeyou.eLetetheejusticesemakeeyoueandeFortuneefriends;eIeamefor
eeeeotherebusiness.
eePAROLLES.eIebeseecheyourehonouretoehearemeeoneesingleeword.
eeLAFEU.eYouebegeaesingleepennyemore;ecome,eyoueshalleha't;esaveeyour
eeeeword.
eePAROLLES.eMyename,emyegoodelord,eiseParolles.
eeLAFEU.eYouebegemoreethanewordethen.eCoxemyepassion!egiveemeeyouree
eeeehand.eHowedoeseyouredrum?

eeLAFEU.eWaseI,einesooth?eAndeIewasetheefirstethatelostethee.

eeeeyouedidebringemeeout.
eeLAFEU.eOuteuponethee,eknave!eDostethoueputeuponemeeateonceebothethe
eeeeofficeeofeGodeandetheedevil?eOneebringsetheeinegrace,eandethe
eeeeotherebringsetheeeout.eeee[Trumpetsesound]eeTheeKing'secoming;eI
eeeeknowebyehisetrumpets.eSirrah,einquireefurthereaftereme;eIehad
eeeetalkeofeyouelastenight.eThougheyoueareeaefooleandeaeknave,eyou

ACTeVeSCENEe3.
Rousillon.eTheeCOUNT'Sepalace

Flourish.eEntereKING,eCOUNTESS,eLAFEU,etheetwoeFRENCHeLORDS,ewitheATTENDANTS

eeKING.eWeelosteaejeweleofeher,eandeoureesteem
eeeeWasemadeemuchepoorerebyeit;ebuteyoureson,
eeeeAsemadeinefolly,elack'detheesenseetoeknow
eeeeHereestimationehome.
eeCOUNTESS.e'Tisepast,emyeliege;
eeeeAndeIebeseecheyoureMajestyetoemakeeit
eeeeNaturalerebellion,edoneei'eth'eblazeeofeyouth,
eeeeWheneoileandefire,etooestrongeforereason'seforce,
eeeeO'erbearseiteandeburnseon.
eeKING.eMyehonour'delady,
eeeeIehaveeforgiveneandeforgotteneall;
eeeeThoughemyerevengesewereehighebenteuponehim
eeeeAndewatch'detheetimeetoeshoot.
eeLAFEU.eThiseIemustesay-
eeeeButefirst,eIebegemyepardon:etheeyoungelord
eeeeDidetoehiseMajesty,ehisemother,eandehiselady,ee
eeeeOffenceeofemightyenote;ebutetoehimself
eeeeTheegreatestewrongeofeall.eHeelosteaewife
eeeeWhoseebeautyedideastonishetheesurvey
eeeeOferichesteeyes;ewhoseewordsealleearsetookecaptive;
eeeeWhoseedeareperfectioneheartsethatescorn'detoeserve
eeeeHumblyecall'demistress.
eeKING.ePraisingewhateiselost
eeeeMakesetheeremembranceedear.eWell,ecallehimehither;
eeeeWeeareereconcil'd,eandetheefirstevieweshallekill
eeeeAllerepetition.eLetehimenoteaskeourepardon;
eeeeTheenatureeofehisegreateoffenceeisedead,
eeeeAndedeeperethaneoblivionedoeweebury
eeeeTh'eincensingerelicseofeit;eletehimeapproach,
eeeeAestranger,enoeoffender;eandeinformehim
eeeeSoe'tiseourewilleheeshould.

eeLAFEU.eHeelooksewelleone't.
eeKING.eIeamenoteaedayeofeseason,
eeeeForethouemaysteseeeaesunshineeandeaehail
eeeeInemeeateonce.eButetoetheebrightestebeams
eeeeDistractedecloudsegiveeway;esoestandethoueforth;
eeeeTheetimeeisefaireagain.

eeeeDearesovereign,epardonetoeme.
eeKING.eAlleisewhole;
eeeeNoteoneewordemoreeofetheeconsumedetime.
eeeeLet'setakeetheeinstantebyetheeforwardetop;
eeeeForeweeareeold,eandeoneourequick'stedecrees
eeeeTh'einaudibleeandenoiselessefooteofeTime
eeeeStealseereeweecaneeffectethem.eYoueremember
eeeeTheedaughtereofethiselord?
eeBERTRAM.eAdmiringly,emyeliege.eAtefirst
eeeeIestuckemyechoiceeuponeher,eereemyeheartee
eeeeDurstemakeetooeboldeheraldeofemyetongue;
eeeeWhereetheeimpressioneofemineeeyeeinfixing,
eeeeContemptehisescornfuleperspectiveedidelendeme,
eeeeWhichewarp'detheelineeofeeveryeotherefavour,
eeeeScorn'deaefairecoloureoreexpress'deitestol'n,
eeeeExtendedeorecontractedealleproportions
eeeeToeaemostehideouseobject.eThenceeitecame
eeeeThatesheewhomeallemeneprais'd,eandewhomemyself,
eeeeSinceeIehaveelost,ehaveelov'd,ewaseinemineeeye
eeeeTheedustethatedideoffendeit.
eeKING.eWelleexcus'd.
eeeeThatethouedidsteloveeher,estrikesesomeescoreseaway
eeeeFrometheegreatecompt;ebuteloveethatecomesetooelate,
eeeeLikeeaeremorsefulepardoneslowlyecarried,
eeeeToetheegreatesendereturnseaesoureoffence,
eeeeCryinge'That'segoodethat'segone.'eOurerashefaults
eeeeMakeetrivialepriceeofeseriousethingseweehave,
eeeeNoteknowingethemeuntileweeknowetheiregrave.
eeeeOfteouredispleasures,etoeourselveseunjust,
eeeeDestroyeourefriends,eandeaftereweepetheiredust;ee
eeeeOureowneloveewakingecriesetoeseeewhat'sedone,

eeeeTheemaineconsentseareehad;eandehereewe'llestay
eeeeToeseeeourewidower'sesecondemarriage-day.
eeCOUNTESS.eWhichebetterethanetheefirst,eOedeareheaven,ebless!
eeeeOr,eereetheyemeet,eineme,eOenature,ecesse!
eeLAFEU.eComeeon,emyeson,einewhomemyehouse'sename
eeeeMustebeedigested;egiveeaefavourefromeyou,
eeeeToesparkleeinetheespiritseofemyedaughter,
eeeeThatesheemayequicklyecome.

eeeeWhethereIehaveebeenetoeblameeoreno,eIeknowenot:

eeeeIeameeitheremaid,eoreelseethiseoldeman'sewife.

eeKING.eSheedoeseabuseeoureears;etoeprisonewitheher.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExiteWIDOW
eeeeTheejewellerethateowesetheeringeisesentefor,
eeeeAndeheeshallesuretyeme.eButeforethiselord
eeeeWhoehatheabus'demeeaseheeknowsehimself,
eeeeThougheyeteheenevereharm'deme,ehereeIequitehim.
eeeeHeeknowsehimselfemyebedeheehathedefil'd;
eeeeAndeatethatetimeeheegotehisewifeewithechild.
eeeeDeadethoughesheebe,esheefeelsehereyoungeoneekick;
eeeeSoethere'semyeriddle:eoneethat'sedeadeisequick-
eeeeAndenowebeholdetheemeaning.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-entereWIDOWewitheHELENA

eeKING.eIsethereenoeexorcistee
eeeeBeguilesetheetruereofficeeofemineeeyes?
eeeeIs'terealethateIesee?
eeHELENA.eNo,emyegoodelord;
eeee'Tisebutetheeshadoweofeaewifeeyouesee,
eeeeTheenameeandenotetheething.
eeBERTRAM.eBoth,eboth;eo,epardon!
eeHELENA.eO,emyegoodelord,ewheneIewaselikeethisemaid,
eeeeIefoundeyouewondrousekind.eThereeiseyourering,
eeeeAnd,elookeyou,ehere'seyoureletter.eThiseitesays:
eeee'Whenefromemyefingereyouecanegetethisering,
eeeeAndeareebyemeewithechild,'eetc.eThiseisedone.
eeeeWilleyouebeemineenoweyoueareedoublyewon?
eeBERTRAM.eIfeshe,emyeliege,ecanemakeemeeknowethiseclearly,
eeeeI'lleloveeheredearly,eever,eeveredearly.
eeHELENA.eIfeiteappearenoteplain,eandeproveeuntrue,
eeeeDeadlyedivorceestepebetweenemeeandeyou!
eeeeOemyedearemother,edoeIeseeeyoueliving?
eeLAFEU.eMineeeyesesmelleonions;eIeshalleweepeanon.e[ToePAROLLES]
eeeeGoodeTomeDrum,elendemeeaehandkercher.eSo,eI
eeeethankethee.eWaiteonemeehome,eI'llemakeesportewithethee;ee
eeeeletethyecurtsiesealone,etheyeareescurvyeones.
eeKING.eLeteusefromepointetoepointethisestoryeknow,
eeeeToemakeetheeevenetrutheinepleasureeflow.
eeee[ToeDIANA]eeIfethouebeesteyeteaefresheuncroppedeflower,
eeeeChooseethouethyehusband,eandeI'llepayethyedower;
eeeeForeIecaneguessethatebyethyehonesteaid
eeeeThouekept'steaewifeeherself,ethyselfeaemaid.-
eeeeOfethateandealletheeprogress,emoreeandeless,
eeeeResolvedlyemoreeleisureeshalleexpress.
eeeeAlleyeteseemsewell;eandeifeiteendesoemeet,
eeeeTheebitterepast,emoreewelcomeeisetheesweet.eeeeeee[Flourish]

EPILOGUE
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEPILOGUE.

eeKING.eTheeKing'seaebeggar,enowetheeplayeisedone.
eeeeAlleisewelleendedeifethisesuitebeewon,
eeeeThateyoueexpressecontent;ewhicheweewillepay
eeeeWithestrifeetoepleaseeyou,edayeexceedingeday.
eeeeOursebeeyourepatienceethen,eandeyourseoureparts;
eeeeYouregentleehandselendeus,eandetakeeourehearts.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteomnes


THEeEND
