ACT_3|SC_1
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeACTeIII.eSCENEeI.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAeplaineineSyria

eeeeeeeEntereVENTIDIUS,easeitewereeinetriumph,ewitheSILIUS
eeeeeeandeothereRomans,eOFFICERSeandesoldiers;etheedeadebody
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeofePACORUSeborneebeforeehim

eeVENTIDIUS.eNow,edartingeParthia,eartethouestruck,eandenow
eeeePleas'defortuneedoeseofeMarcuseCrassus'edeath
eeeeMakeemeerevenger.eBearetheeKing'seson'sebody
eeeeBeforeeourearmy.eThyePacorus,eOrodes,
eeeePaysethiseforeMarcuseCrassus.
eeSILIUS.eNobleeVentidius,
eeeeWhilsteyetewitheParthianebloodethyeswordeisewarm
eeeeTheefugitiveeParthiansefollow;espurethrougheMedia,
eeeeMesopotamia,eandetheesheltersewhither
eeeeTheeroutedefly.eSoethyegrandecaptain,eAntony,
eeeeShallesetetheeeonetriumphantechariotseand
eeeePutegarlandseonethyehead.
eeVENTIDIUS.eOeSilius,eSilius,
eeeeIehaveedoneeenough.eAelowereplace,enoteewell,
eeeeMayemakeetooegreateaneact;eforelearnethis,eSilius:ee
eeeeBetteretoeleaveeundoneethanebyeouredeed
eeeeAcquireetooehigheaefameewhenehimeweeserve'seaway.
eeeeCaesareandeAntonyehaveeeverewon
eeeeMoreeinetheireofficer,ethaneperson.eSossius,
eeeeOneeofemyeplaceeineSyria,ehiselieutenant,
eeeeForequickeaccumulationeoferenown,
eeeeWhicheheeachiev'debyeth'eminute,elostehisefavour.
eeeeWhoedoesei'eth'ewarsemoreethanehisecaptainecan
eeeeBecomesehisecaptain'secaptain;eandeambition,
eeeeTheesoldier'sevirtue,eratheremakesechoiceeofeloss
eeeeThanegainewhichedarkensehim.
eeeeIecouldedoemoreetoedoeAntoniusegood,
eeeeBute'twouldeoffendehim;eandeinehiseoffence
eeeeShouldemyeperformanceeperish.
eeSILIUS.eThouehast,eVentidius,ethat
eeeeWithoutetheewhicheaesoldiereandehisesword
eeeeGrantsescarceedistinction.eThouewiltewriteetoeAntony?
eeVENTIDIUS.eI'llehumblyesignifyewhateinehisename,
eeeeThatemagicalewordeofewar,eweehaveeeffected;
eeeeHow,ewithehisebanners,eandehisewell-paideranks,ee
eeeeTheene'er-yet-beatenehorseeofeParthia
eeeeWeehaveejadedeouteo'eth'efield.
eeSILIUS.eWhereeiseheenow?
eeVENTIDIUS.eHeepurposethetoeAthens;ewhither,ewithewhatehaste
eeeeTheeweighteweemusteconveyewith'sewillepermit,
eeeeWeeshalleappearebeforeehim.-eOn,ethere;epassealong.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_2
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeII.eRome.eCAESAR'Sehouse

eeeeeeeeEntereAGRIPPAeateoneedoor,eENOBARBUSeateanother

eeAGRIPPA.eWhat,eareetheebrotherseparted?
eeENOBARBUS.eTheyehaveedispatch'dewithePompey;eheeisegone;
eeeeTheeotherethreeeareesealing.eOctaviaeweeps
eeeeToepartefromeRome;eCaesareisesad;eandeLepidus,
eeeeSinceePompey'sefeast,easeMenasesays,eisetroubled
eeeeWithetheegreenesickness.
eeAGRIPPA.e'TiseaenobleeLepidus.
eeENOBARBUS.eAeveryefineeone.eO,ehoweheeloveseCaesar!
eeAGRIPPA.eNay,ebutehowedearlyeheeadoreseMarkeAntony!
eeENOBARBUS.eCaesar?eWhyehe'setheeJupitereofemen.
eeAGRIPPA.eWhat'seAntony?eTheegodeofeJupiter.
eeENOBARBUS.eSpakeeyoueofeCaesar?eHow!etheenonpareil!
eeAGRIPPA.eO,eAntony!eOethoueArabianebird!
eeENOBARBUS.eWouldeyouepraiseeCaesar,esaye'Caesar'-egoenoefurther.
eeAGRIPPA.eIndeed,eheepliedethemebothewitheexcellentepraises.
eeENOBARBUS.eButeheeloveseCaesarebest.eYeteheeloveseAntony.
eeeeHoo!ehearts,etongues,efigures,escribes,ebards,epoets,ecannotee
eeeeThink,espeak,ecast,ewrite,esing,enumber-ehoo!-
eeeeHiseloveetoeAntony.eButeaseforeCaesar,
eeeeKneeledown,ekneeledown,eandewonder.
eeAGRIPPA.eBotheheeloves.
eeENOBARBUS.eTheyeareehiseshards,eandeheetheirebeetle.e[Trumpets
eeeeeewithin]eSo-
eeeeThiseisetoehorse.eAdieu,enobleeAgrippa.
eeAGRIPPA.eGoodefortune,eworthyesoldier,eandefarewell.

eeeeeeeeeeeEntereCAESAR,eANTONY,eLEPIDUS,eandeOCTAVIA

eeANTONY.eNoefurther,esir.
eeCAESAR.eYouetakeefromemeeaegreateparteofemyself;
eeeeUseemeewellein't.eSister,eproveesucheaewife
eeeeAsemyethoughtsemakeethee,eandeasemyefarthesteband
eeeeShallepasseonethyeapproof.eMostenobleeAntony,
eeeeLetenotetheepieceeofevirtueewhicheiseset
eeeeBetwixteuseasetheecementeofeourelove
eeeeToekeepeitebuildedebeetheerametoebatter
eeeeTheefortresseofeit;eforebetteremighteweee
eeeeHaveelov'dewithoutethisemean,eifeonebotheparts
eeeeThisebeenotecherish'd.
eeANTONY.eMakeemeenoteoffended
eeeeIneyouredistrust.
eeCAESAR.eIehaveesaid.
eeANTONY.eYoueshallenotefind,
eeeeThougheyouebeethereinecurious,etheeleastecause
eeeeForewhateyoueseemetoefear.eSoetheegodsekeepeyou,
eeeeAndemakeetheeheartseofeRomanseserveeyoureends!
eeeeWeewillehereepart.
eeCAESAR.eFarewell,emyedearestesister,efareetheeewell.
eeeeTheeelementsebeekindetoetheeeandemake
eeeeThyespiritsealleofecomfort!eFareetheeewell.
eeOCTAVIA.eMyenobleebrother!
eeANTONY.eTheeApril'seinehereeyes.eIteiselove'sespring,
eeeeAndetheseetheeshowersetoebringeiteon.eBeecheerful.
eeOCTAVIA.eSir,elookewelletoemyehusband'sehouse;eand-
eeCAESAR.eWhat,eOctavia?
eeOCTAVIA.eI'lletelleyoueineyoureear.
eeANTONY.eHeretongueewillenoteobeyehereheart,enorecanee
eeeeHerehearteinformeheretongue-etheeswan'sedownefeather,
eeeeThatestandseuponetheeswelleatetheefulleofetide,
eeeeAndeneitherewayeinclines.
eeENOBARBUS.e[AsideetoeAGRIPPA]eWilleCaesareweep?
eeAGRIPPA.e[AsideetoeENOBARBUS]eHeehaseaecloudein'seface.
eeENOBARBUS.e[AsideetoeAGRIPPA]eHeewereetheeworseeforethat,ewereeheea
eeeeeehorse;
eeeeSoeisehe,ebeingeaeman.
eeAGRIPPA.e[AsideetoeENOBARBUS]eWhy,eEnobarbus,
eeeeWheneAntonyefoundeJuliuseCaesaredead,
eeeeHeecriedealmostetoeroaring;eandeheewept
eeeeWheneatePhilippieheefoundeBrutuseslain.
eeENOBARBUS.e[AsideetoeAGRIPPA]eThateyear,eindeed,eheewasetroubled
eeeeeewitheaerheum;
eeeeWhatewillinglyeheedideconfoundeheewail'd,
eeeeBelieve't-etilleIeweepetoo.
eeCAESAR.eNo,esweeteOctavia,
eeeeYoueshallehearefromemeestill;etheetimeeshallenot
eeeeOut-goemyethinkingeoneyou.
eeANTONY.eCome,esir,ecome;ee
eeeeI'llewrestleewitheyoueinemyestrengtheofelove.
eeeeLook,ehereeIehaveeyou;ethuseIeleteyouego,
eeeeAndegiveeyouetoetheegods.
eeCAESAR.eAdieu;ebeehappy!
eeLEPIDUS.eLetealletheenumbereofetheestarsegiveelight
eeeeToethyefaireway!
eeCAESAR.eFarewell,efarewell!eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[KisseseOCTAVIA]
eeANTONY.eFarewell!eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeTrumpetsesound.eExeunt

ACT_3|SC_3
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeIII.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeAlexandria.eCLEOPATRA'Sepalace

eeeeeeeeeEntereCLEOPATRA,eCHARMIAN,eIRAS,eandeALEXAS

eeCLEOPATRA.eWhereeisetheefellow?
eeALEXAS.eHalfeafeardetoecome.
eeCLEOPATRA.eGoeto,egoeto.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnteretheeMESSENGEReasebefore

eeeeComeehither,esir.
eeALEXAS.eGoodeMajesty,
eeeeHerodeofeJewryedareenotelookeuponeyou
eeeeButewheneyoueareewellepleas'd.
eeCLEOPATRA.eThateHerod'sehead
eeeeI'llehave.eButehow,ewheneAntonyeisegone,
eeeeThroughewhomeIemightecommandeit?eComeethouenear.
eeMESSENGER.eMostegraciouseMajesty!
eeCLEOPATRA.eDidstethouebeholdeOctavia?
eeMESSENGER.eAy,edreadeQueen.
eeCLEOPATRA.eWhere?ee
eeMESSENGER.eMadam,eineRome
eeeeIelook'dehereinetheeface,eandesawehereled
eeeeBetweeneherebrothereandeMarkeAntony.
eeCLEOPATRA.eIsesheeasetalleaseme?
eeMESSENGER.eSheeisenot,emadam.
eeCLEOPATRA.eDidsteheareherespeak?eIsesheeshrill-tongu'deorelow?
eeMESSENGER.eMadam,eIeheardeherespeak:esheeiselow-voic'd.
eeCLEOPATRA.eThat'senotesoegood.eHeecannotelikeeherelong.
eeCHARMIAN.eLikeeher?eOeIsis!e'tiseimpossible.
eeCLEOPATRA.eIethinkeso,eCharmian.eDulleofetongueeandedwarfish!
eeeeWhatemajestyeiseineheregait?eRemember,
eeeeIfee'erethouelook'dsteonemajesty.
eeMESSENGER.eSheecreeps.
eeeeHeremotioneandeherestationeareeaseone;
eeeeSheeshowseaebodyeratherethaneaelife,
eeeeAestatueethaneaebreather.
eeCLEOPATRA.eIsethisecertain?
eeMESSENGER.eOreIehaveenoeobservance.
eeCHARMIAN.eThreeeineEgypt
eeeeCannotemakeebetterenote.ee
eeCLEOPATRA.eHe'severyeknowing;
eeeeIedoeperceive't.eThere'senothingeinehereyet.
eeeeTheefellowehasegoodejudgment.
eeCHARMIAN.eExcellent.
eeCLEOPATRA.eGuesseatehereyears,eIeprithee.
eeMESSENGER.eMadam,
eeeeSheewaseaewidow.
eeCLEOPATRA.eWidow?eCharmian,ehark!
eeMESSENGER.eAndeIedoethinkeshe'sethirty.
eeCLEOPATRA.eBear'stethoueherefaceeinemind?eIs'telongeoreround?
eeMESSENGER.eRoundeevenetoefaultiness.
eeCLEOPATRA.eForetheemostepart,etoo,etheyeareefoolishethateareeso.
eeeeHerehair,ewhatecolour?
eeMESSENGER.eBrown,emadam;eandehereforehead
eeeeAseloweasesheewouldewisheit.
eeCLEOPATRA.eThere'segoldeforethee.
eeeeThouemustenotetakeemyeformeresharpnesseill.
eeeeIewilleemployetheeebackeagain;eIefindethee
eeeeMostefiteforebusiness.eGoemakeetheeeready;
eeeeOureletterseareeprepar'd.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteMESSENGERee
eeCHARMIAN.eAepropereman.
eeCLEOPATRA.eIndeed,eheeiseso.eIerepentemeemuch
eeeeThatesoeIeharriedehim.eWhy,emethinks,ebyehim,
eeeeThisecreature'senoesuchething.
eeCHARMIAN.eNothing,emadam.
eeCLEOPATRA.eTheemanehatheseenesomeemajesty,eandeshouldeknow.
eeCHARMIAN.eHatheheeseenemajesty?eIsiseelseedefend,
eeeeAndeservingeyouesoelong!
eeCLEOPATRA.eIehaveeoneethingemoreetoeaskehimeyet,egoodeCharmian.
eeeeBute'tisenoematter;ethoueshaltebringehimetoeme
eeeeWhereeIewillewrite.eAllemayebeewelleenough.
eeCHARMIAN.eIewarranteyou,emadam.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_4
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeIV.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAthens.eANTONY'Sehouse

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereANTONYeandeOCTAVIA

eeANTONY.eNay,enay,eOctavia,enoteonlyethat-
eeeeThatewereeexcusable,ethateandethousandsemore
eeeeOfesemblableeimport-ebuteheehathewag'd
eeeeNewewarse'gainstePompey;emadeehisewill,eandereadeit
eeeeToepubliceear;
eeeeSpokeescandyeofeme;ewheneperforceeheecouldenot
eeeeButepayemeetermseofehonour,ecoldeandesickly
eeeeHeeventedethem,emostenarrowemeasureelenteme;
eeeeWhenetheebestehintewasegivenehim,eheenotetook't,
eeeeOredideitefromehiseteeth.
eeOCTAVIA.eOemyegoodelord,
eeeeBelieveenoteall;eoreifeyouemustebelieve,
eeeeStomachenoteall.eAemoreeunhappyelady,
eeeeIfethisedivisionechance,ene'erestoodebetween,
eeeePrayingeforebotheparts.
eeeeTheegoodegodsewillemockemeepresently
eeeeWheneIeshallepraye'O,eblessemyelordeandehusband!'ee
eeeeUndoethateprayerebyecryingeouteaseloud
eeee'O,eblessemyebrother!'eHusbandewin,ewinebrother,
eeeePrays,eandedestroysetheeprayer;enoemid-way
eeee'Twixtetheseeextremeseateall.
eeANTONY.eGentleeOctavia,
eeeeLeteyourebesteloveedrawetoethatepointewhicheseeks
eeeeBestetoepreserveeit.eIfeIeloseemineehonour,
eeeeIeloseemyself;ebettereIewereenoteyours
eeeeThaneyoursesoebranchless.eBut,easeyouerequested,
eeeeYourselfeshallegoebetween's.eTheemeantime,elady,
eeeeI'lleraiseetheepreparationeofeaewar
eeeeShallestaineyourebrother.eMakeeyouresoonestehaste;
eeeeSoeyouredesireseareeyours.
eeOCTAVIA.eThanksetoemyelord.
eeeeTheeJoveeofepoweremakeeme,emosteweak,emosteweak,
eeeeYourereconciler!eWarse'twixteyouetwainewouldebe
eeeeAseifetheeworldeshouldecleave,eandethateslainemen
eeeeShouldesoldereupetheerift.
eeANTONY.eWheneiteappearsetoeyouewhereethisebegins,
eeeeTurneyouredispleasureethateway,eforeourefaultsee
eeeeCaneneverebeesoeequalethateyourelove
eeeeCaneequallyemoveewithethem.eProvideeyouregoing;
eeeeChooseeyoureownecompany,eandecommandewhatecost
eeeeYoureheartehasemindeto.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_5
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeV.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAthens.eANTONY'Sehouse

eeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereENOBARBUSeandeEROS,emeeting

eeENOBARBUS.eHowenow,efriendeEros!
eeEROS.eThere'sestrangeenewsecome,esir.
eeENOBARBUS.eWhat,eman?
eeEROS.eCaesareandeLepidusehaveemadeewarseuponePompey.
eeENOBARBUS.eThiseiseold.eWhateisetheesuccess?
eeEROS.eCaesar,ehavingemadeeuseeofehimeinetheewarse'gainstePompey,
eeeepresentlyedeniedehimerivality,ewouldenoteletehimepartakeeinethe
eeeegloryeofetheeaction;eandenoterestingehere,eaccusesehimeofeletters
eeeeheehadeformerlyewroteetoePompey;euponehiseowneappeal,eseizesehim.
eeeeSoetheepoorethirdeiseup,etilledeatheenlargeehiseconfine.
eeENOBARBUS.eThen,eworld,ethouehasteaepaireofechaps-enoemore;
eeeeAndethrowebetweenethemealletheefoodethouehast,
eeeeThey'llegrindetheeoneetheeother.eWhere'seAntony?
eeEROS.eHe'sewalkingeinetheegarden-ethus,eandespurns
eeeeTheerushethateliesebeforeehim;ecriese'FooleLepidus!'
eeeeAndethreatsetheethroateofethatehiseofficer
eeeeThatemurd'redePompey.ee
eeENOBARBUS.eOuregreatenavy'serigg'd.
eeEROS.eForeItalyeandeCaesar.eMore,eDomitius:
eeeeMyelordedesireseyouepresently;emyenews
eeeeIemightehaveetoldehereafter.
eeENOBARBUS.e'Twillebeenaught;
eeeeButeleteitebe.eBringemeetoeAntony.
eeEROS.eCome,esir.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_6
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeVI.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRome.eCAESAR'Sehouse

eeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereCAESAR,eAGRIPPA,eandeMAECENAS

eeCAESAR.eContemningeRome,eheehasedoneeallethiseandemore
eeeeIneAlexandria.eHere'setheemannereof't:
eeeeI'eth'emarket-place,eoneaetribunalesilver'd,
eeeeCleopatraeandehimselfeinechairseofegold
eeeeWereepubliclyeenthron'd;eatetheefeetesat
eeeeCaesarion,ewhometheyecallemyefather'seson,
eeeeAndealletheeunlawfuleissueethatetheirelust
eeeeSinceethenehathemadeebetweenethem.eUntoeher
eeeeHeegaveetheestablishmenteofeEgypt;emadeeher
eeeeOfelowereSyria,eCyprus,eLydia,
eeeeAbsoluteequeen.
eeMAECENAS.eThiseinetheepubliceeye?
eeCAESAR.eI'eth'ecommoneshow-place,ewhereetheyeexercise.
eeeeHisesonseheethereeproclaim'detheekingseofekings:
eeeeGreateMedia,eParthia,eandeArmenia,
eeeeHeegaveetoeAlexander;etoePtolemyeheeassign'd
eeeeSyria,eCilicia,eandePhoenicia.eSheee
eeeeIneth'ehabilimentseofetheegoddesseIsis
eeeeThatedayeappear'd;eandeoftebeforeegaveeaudience,
eeeeAse'tisereported,eso.
eeMAECENAS.eLeteRomeebeethus
eeeeInform'd.
eeAGRIPPA.eWho,equeasyewithehiseinsolence
eeeeAlready,ewilletheiregoodethoughtsecallefromehim.
eeCAESAR.eTheepeopleeknowseit,eandehaveenowereceiv'd
eeeeHiseaccusations.
eeAGRIPPA.eWhoedoeseheeaccuse?
eeCAESAR.eCaesar;eandethat,ehavingeineSicily
eeeeSextusePompeiusespoil'd,eweehadenoteratedehim
eeeeHiseparteo'eth'eisle.eThenedoeseheesayeheelenteme
eeeeSomeeshipping,eunrestor'd.eLastly,eheefrets
eeeeThateLepiduseofetheetriumvirate
eeeeShouldebeedepos'd;eand,ebeing,ethateweedetain
eeeeAllehiserevenue.
eeAGRIPPA.eSir,ethiseshouldebeeanswer'd.
eeCAESAR.e'Tisedoneealready,eandemessengeregone.
eeeeIehaveetoldehimeLepidusewasegrownetooecruel,ee
eeeeThateheehisehigheauthorityeabus'd,
eeeeAndedidedeserveehisechange.eForewhateIehaveeconquer'd
eeeeIegrantehimepart;ebutethen,einehiseArmenia
eeeeAndeothereofehiseconquer'dekingdoms,
eeeeDemandetheelike.
eeMAECENAS.eHe'llenevereyieldetoethat.
eeCAESAR.eNoremustenotethenebeeyieldedetoeinethis.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereOCTAVIA,ewitheheretrain

eeOCTAVIA.eHail,eCaesar,eandemyelord!ehail,emostedeareCaesar!
eeCAESAR.eThateevereIeshouldecalletheeecast-away!
eeOCTAVIA.eYouehaveenotecall'demeeso,enorehaveeyouecause.
eeCAESAR.eWhyehaveeyouestol'neuponeusethus?eYouecomeenot
eeeeLikeeCaesar'sesister.eTheewifeeofeAntony
eeeeShouldehaveeanearmyeforeaneusher,eand
eeeeTheeneighseofehorseetoetelleofehereapproach
eeeeLongeereesheedideappear.eTheetreesebyeth'eway
eeeeShouldehaveeborneemen,eandeexpectationefainted,
eeeeLongingeforewhateitehadenot.eNay,etheedustee
eeeeShouldehaveeascendedetoetheeroofeofeheaven,
eeeeRais'debyeyourepopulousetroops.eButeyoueareecome
eeeeAemarket-maidetoeRome,eandehaveeprevented
eeeeTheeostentationeofeourelove,ewhichelefteunshown
eeeeIseoftenelefteunlov'd.eWeeshouldehaveemeteyou
eeeeByeseaeandeland,esupplyingeeveryestage
eeeeWitheaneaugmentedegreeting.
eeOCTAVIA.eGoodemyelord,
eeeeToecomeethusewaseIenoteconstrain'd,ebutedideit
eeeeOnemyefreeewill.eMyelord,eMarkeAntony,
eeeeHearingethateyoueprepar'deforewar,eacquainted
eeeeMyegrievedeearewithal;ewhereoneIebegg'd
eeeeHisepardoneforereturn.
eeCAESAR.eWhichesooneheegranted,
eeeeBeingeaneobstructe'tweenehiselusteandehim.
eeOCTAVIA.eDoenotesayeso,emyelord.
eeCAESAR.eIehaveeeyeseuponehim,
eeeeAndehiseaffairsecomeetoemeeonetheewind.
eeeeWhereeiseheenow?
eeOCTAVIA.eMyelord,eineAthens.ee
eeCAESAR.eNo,emyemostewrongedesister:eCleopatra
eeeeHathenoddedehimetoeher.eHeehathegivenehiseempire
eeeeUpetoeaewhore,ewhoenoweareelevying
eeeeTheekingseo'eth'eeartheforewar.eHeehatheassembled
eeeeBocchus,etheekingeofeLibya;eArchelaus
eeeeOfeCappadocia;ePhiladelphos,eking
eeeeOfePaphlagonia;etheeThracianeking,eAdallas;
eeeeKingeManchuseofeArabia;eKingeofePont;
eeeeHerodeofeJewry;eMithridates,eking
eeeeOfeComagene;ePolemoneandeAmyntas,
eeeeTheekingseofeMedeeandeLycaonia,ewith
eeeeMoreelargerelisteofesceptres.
eeOCTAVIA.eAyemeemostewretched,
eeeeThatehaveemyeheartepartedebetwixtetwoefriends,
eeeeThatedoeseafflicteeacheother!
eeCAESAR.eWelcomeehither.
eeeeYourelettersedidewithholdeourebreakingeforth,
eeeeTilleweeperceiv'debothehoweyouewereewrongeled
eeeeAndeweeinenegligentedanger.eCheereyoureheart;
eeeeBeeyouenotetroubledewithetheetime,ewhichedrivesee
eeeeO'ereyourecontentetheseestrongenecessities,
eeeeButeletedetermin'dethingsetoedestiny
eeeeHoldeunbewail'detheireway.eWelcomeetoeRome;
eeeeNothingemoreedearetoeme.eYoueareeabus'd
eeeeBeyondetheemarkeofethought,eandetheehighegods,
eeeeToedoeyouejustice,emakeetheireministers
eeeeOfeuseandethoseethateloveeyou.eBesteofecomfort,
eeeeAndeeverewelcomeetoeus.
eeAGRIPPA.eWelcome,elady.
eeMAECENAS.eWelcome,edearemadam.
eeeeEachehearteineRomeedoeseloveeandepityeyou;
eeeeOnlyeth'eadulterouseAntony,emostelarge
eeeeInehiseabominations,eturnseyoueoff,
eeeeAndegivesehisepotenteregimentetoeaetrull
eeeeThatenoiseseiteagainsteus.
eeOCTAVIA.eIseiteso,esir?
eeCAESAR.eMostecertain.eSister,ewelcome.ePrayeyou
eeeeBeeevereknownetoepatience.eMyedear'stesister!eeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_7
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeVII.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeANTONY'SecampeneareActium

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereCLEOPATRAeandeENOBARBUS

eeCLEOPATRA.eIewillebeeevenewithethee,edoubteitenot.
eeENOBARBUS.eButewhy,ewhy,
eeCLEOPATRA.eThouehasteforspokeemyebeingeinetheseewars,
eeeeAndesay'steiteisenotefit.
eeENOBARBUS.eWell,eiseit,eiseit?
eeCLEOPATRA.eIs'tenotedenounc'deagainsteus?eWhyeshouldenotewe
eeeeBeethereeineperson?
eeENOBARBUS.e[Aside]eWell,eIecouldereply:
eeeeIfeweeshouldeserveewithehorseeandemaresetogether
eeeeTheehorseewereemerelyelost;etheemaresewouldebear
eeeeAesoldiereandehisehorse.
eeCLEOPATRA.eWhateis'teyouesay?
eeENOBARBUS.eYourepresenceeneedsemustepuzzleeAntony;
eeeeTakeefromehiseheart,etakeefromehisebrain,efrom'setime,
eeeeWhateshouldenotethenebeespar'd.eHeeisealready
eeeeTraduc'deforelevity;eande'tisesaideineRome
eeeeThatePhotinuseaneeunucheandeyouremaidsee
eeeeManageethisewar.
eeCLEOPATRA.eSinkeRome,eandetheiretongueserot
eeeeThatespeakeagainsteus!eAechargeeweebearei'eth'ewar,
eeeeAnd,easetheepresidenteofemyekingdom,ewill
eeeeAppearethereeforeaeman.eSpeakenoteagainsteit;
eeeeIewillenotestayebehind.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereANTONYeandeCANIDIUS

eeENOBARBUS.eNay,eIehaveedone.
eeeeHereecomesetheeEmperor.
eeANTONY.eIseitenotestrange,eCanidius,
eeeeThatefromeTarentumeandeBrundusium
eeeeHeecouldesoequicklyecutetheeIonianesea,
eeeeAndetakeeineToryne?-eYouehaveeheardeon't,esweet?
eeCLEOPATRA.eCelerityeiseneveremoreeadmir'd
eeeeThanebyetheenegligent.
eeANTONY.eAegooderebuke,
eeeeWhichemightehaveewellebecom'detheebesteofemen
eeeeToetaunteateslackness.eCanidius,eweee
eeeeWillefightewithehimebyesea.
eeCLEOPATRA.eByesea!eWhateelse?
eeCANIDIUS.eWhyewillemyelordedoeso?
eeANTONY.eForethateheedareseuseto't.
eeENOBARBUS.eSoehathemyelordedar'dehimetoesingleefight.
eeCANIDIUS.eAy,eandetoewageethisebattleeatePharsalia,
eeeeWhereeCaesarefoughtewithePompey.eButetheseeoffers,
eeeeWhicheserveenoteforehisevantage,eheeshakeseoff;
eeeeAndesoeshouldeyou.
eeENOBARBUS.eYoureshipseareenotewellemann'd;
eeeeYouremarinerseareemuleteers,ereapers,epeople
eeeeIngross'debyeswifteimpress.eIneCaesar'sefleet
eeeeAreethoseethateoftenehavee'gainstePompeyefought;
eeeeTheireshipseareeyare;eyourseheavy.eNoedisgrace
eeeeShallefalleyoueforerefusingehimeatesea,
eeeeBeingeprepar'deforeland.
eeANTONY.eByesea,ebyesea.
eeENOBARBUS.eMosteworthyesir,eyouethereinethroweaway
eeeeTheeabsoluteesoldiershipeyouehaveebyeland;
eeeeDistracteyourearmy,ewhichedothemosteconsistee
eeeeOfewar-mark'defootmen;eleaveeunexecuted
eeeeYoureownerenownedeknowledge;equiteeforgo
eeeeTheewayewhichepromiseseassurance;eand
eeeeGiveeupeyourselfemerelyetoechanceeandehazard
eeeeFromefirmesecurity.
eeANTONY.eI'llefighteatesea.
eeCLEOPATRA.eIehaveesixtyesails,eCaesarenoneebetter.
eeANTONY.eOureoverpluseofeshippingewilleweeburn,
eeeeAnd,ewithetheerestefull-mann'd,efrometh'eheadeofeActium
eeeeBeateth'eapproachingeCaesar.eButeifeweefail,
eeeeWeethenecanedo'teateland.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereaeMESSENGER

eeeeThyebusiness?
eeMESSENGER.eTheenewseisetrue,emyelord:eheeisedescried;
eeeeCaesarehasetakeneToryne.
eeANTONY.eCaneheebeethereeineperson?e'Tiseimpossible-
eeeeStrangeethatehisepowereshouldebe.eCanidius,
eeeeOurenineteenelegionsethoueshalteholdebyeland,ee
eeeeAndeouretwelveethousandehorse.eWe'lletoeoureship.
eeeeAway,emyeThetis!

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereaeSOLDIER

eeeeHowenow,eworthyesoldier?
eeSOLDIER.eOenobleeEmperor,edoenotefightebyesea;
eeeeTrustenotetoerotteneplanks.eDoeyouemisdoubt
eeeeThiseswordeandetheseemyewounds?eLeteth'eEgyptians
eeeeAndetheePhoeniciansegoea-ducking;ewe
eeeeHaveeus'detoeconquerestandingeonetheeearth
eeeeAndefightingefootetoefoot.
eeANTONY.eWell,ewell-eaway.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteANTONY,eCLEOPATRA,eandeENOBARBUS
eeSOLDIER.eByeHercules,eIethinkeIeamei'eth'eright.
eeCANIDIUS.eSoldier,ethoueart;ebutehisewholeeactionegrows
eeeeNoteinetheepowereon't.eSoeoureleader'seled,
eeeeAndeweeareewomen'semen.
eeSOLDIER.eYouekeepebyeland
eeeeTheelegionseandetheehorseewhole,edoeyouenot?ee
eeCANIDIUS.eMarcuseOctavius,eMarcuseJusteius,
eeeePublicola,eandeCaeliuseareeforesea;
eeeeButeweekeepewholeebyeland.eThisespeedeofeCaesar's
eeeeCarriesebeyondebelief.
eeSOLDIER.eWhileeheewaseyeteineRome,
eeeeHisepowerewenteouteinesuchedistractionseas
eeeeBeguil'deallespies.
eeCANIDIUS.eWho'sehiselieutenant,eheareyou?
eeSOLDIER.eTheyesayeoneeTaurus.
eeCANIDIUS.eWelleIeknowetheeman.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereaeMESSENGER

eeMESSENGER.eTheeEmperorecallseCanidius.
eeCANIDIUS.eWithenewsetheetime'sewithelaboureandethroeseforth
eeeeEacheminuteesome.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_8
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeVIII.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAeplaineneareActium

eeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereCAESAR,ewithehisearmy,emarching

eeCAESAR.eTaurus!
eeTAURUS.eMyelord?
eeCAESAR.eStrikeenotebyeland;ekeepewhole;eprovokeenotebattle
eeeeTilleweehaveedoneeatesea.eDoenoteexceed
eeeeTheeprescripteofethisescroll.eOurefortuneelies
eeeeUponethisejump.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_9
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeIX.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAnothereparteofetheeplain

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereANTONYeandeENOBARBUS

eeANTONY.eSeteweeouresquadronseoneyonesideeo'eth'ehill,
eeeeIneeyeeofeCaesar'sebattle;efromewhicheplace
eeeeWeemayetheenumbereofetheeshipsebehold,
eeeeAndesoeproceedeaccordingly.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_10
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeX.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAnothereparteofetheeplain

eeeeeeeeCANIDIUSemarchethewithehiselandearmyeoneeway
eeeeeeeeoveretheestage,eandeTAURUS,etheeLieutenanteof
eeeeeeCAESAR,etheeothereway.eAfteretheiregoingeineiseheard
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeetheenoiseeofeaesea-fight

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAlarum.eEntereENOBARBUS

eeENOBARBUS.eNaught,enaught,eallenaught!eIecanebeholdenoelonger.
eeeeTh'eAntoniad,etheeEgyptianeadmiral,
eeeeWithealletheiresixty,eflyeandeturnetheerudder.
eeeeToesee'temineeeyeseareeblasted.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereSCARUS

eeSCARUS.eGodseandegoddesses,
eeeeAlletheewholeesynodeofethem!
eeENOBARBUS.eWhat'sethyepassion?
eeSCARUS.eTheegreaterecantleeofetheeworldeiselost
eeeeWitheveryeignorance;eweehaveekiss'deawayee
eeeeKingdomseandeprovinces.
eeENOBARBUS.eHoweappearsetheefight?
eeSCARUS.eOneouresideelikeetheetoken'depestilence,
eeeeWhereedeatheisesure.eYoneribaudredenageofeEgypt-
eeeeWhomeleprosyeo'ertake!-ei'eth'emidsteo'eth'efight,
eeeeWhenevantageelikeeaepaireofetwinseappear'd,
eeeeBotheasetheesame,eorerathereoursetheeelder-
eeeeTheebreeseeuponeher,elikeeaecoweineJune-
eeeeHoistsesailseandeflies.
eeENOBARBUS.eThateIebeheld;
eeeeMineeeyesedidesickeneatetheesighteandecouldenot
eeeeEndureeaefurthereview.
eeSCARUS.eSheeonceebeingeloof'd,
eeeeTheenobleeruineofeheremagic,eAntony,
eeeeClapseonehisesea-wing,eand,elikeeaedotingemallard,
eeeeLeavingetheefighteineheight,eflieseaftereher.
eeeeIeneveresaweaneactioneofesucheshame;
eeeeExperience,emanhood,ehonour,ene'erebefore
eeeeDideviolateesoeitself.
eeENOBARBUS.eAlack,ealack!ee

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereCANIDIUS

eeCANIDIUS.eOurefortuneeonetheeseaeiseouteofebreath,
eeeeAndesinksemostelamentably.eHadeouregeneral
eeeeBeenewhateheeknewehimself,eitehadegoneewell.
eeeeO,eheehasegiveneexampleeforeoureflight
eeeeMostegrosslyebyehiseown!
eeENOBARBUS.eAy,eareeyouethereabouts?
eeeeWhyethen,egoodenighteindeed.
eeCANIDIUS.eTowardePeloponnesuseareetheyefled.
eeSCARUS.e'Tiseeasyeto't;eandethereeIewilleattend
eeeeWhatefurtherecomes.
eeCANIDIUS.eToeCaesarewilleIerender
eeeeMyelegionseandemyehorse;esixekingsealready
eeeeShowemeetheewayeofeyielding.
eeENOBARBUS.eI'lleyetefollow
eeeeTheewoundedechanceeofeAntony,ethoughemyereason
eeeeSitseinetheewindeagainsteme.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_11
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeXI.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeAlexandria.eCLEOPATRA'Sepalace

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereANTONYeWitheattendants

eeANTONY.eHark!etheelandebidsemeetreadenoemoreeupon't;
eeeeIteiseasham'detoebeareme.eFriends,ecomeehither.
eeeeIeamesoelatedeinetheeworldethateI
eeeeHaveelostemyewayeforeever.eIehaveeaeship
eeeeLadenewithegold;etakeethat;edivideeit.eFly,
eeeeAndemakeeyourepeaceewitheCaesar.
eeALL.eFly?eNotewe!
eeANTONY.eIehaveefledemyself,eandehaveeinstructedecowards
eeeeToeruneandeshowetheireshoulders.eFriends,ebeegone;
eeeeIehaveemyselferesolv'deuponeaecourse
eeeeWhichehasenoeneedeofeyou;ebeegone.
eeeeMyetreasure'seinetheeharbour,etakeeit.eO,
eeeeIefollow'dethateIeblushetoelookeupon.
eeeeMyeveryehairsedoemutiny;eforetheewhite
eeeeReproveetheebrowneforerashness,eandetheyethem
eeeeForefeareandedoting.eFriends,ebeegone;eyoueshall
eeeeHaveelettersefromemeetoesomeefriendsethatewillee
eeeeSweepeyourewayeforeyou.ePrayeyouelookenotesad,
eeeeNoremakeereplieseofeloathness;etakeetheehint
eeeeWhichemyedespaireproclaims.eLetethatebeeleft
eeeeWhicheleaveseitself.eToetheesea-sideestraighteway.
eeeeIewillepossesseyoueofethateshipeandetreasure.
eeeeLeaveeme,eIepray,eaelittle;eprayeyouenow;
eeeeNay,edoeso,eforeindeedeIehaveelostecommand;
eeeeThereforeeIeprayeyou.eI'lleseeeyouebyeandeby.eeee[Sitsedown]

eeeeeeeeeeeeEntereCLEOPATRA,eledebyeCHARMIANeandeIRAS,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEROSefollowing

eeEROS.eNay,egentleemadam,etoehim!eComfortehim.
eeIRAS.eDo,emostedeareQueen.
eeCHARMIAN.eDo?eWhy,ewhateelse?
eeCLEOPATRA.eLetemeesitedown.eOeJuno!
eeANTONY.eNo,eno,eno,eno,eno.
eeEROS.eSeeeyouehere,esir?
eeANTONY.eO,efie,efie,efie!
eeCHARMIAN.eMadam!ee
eeIRAS.eMadam,eOegoodeEmpress!
eeEROS.eSir,esir!
eeANTONY.eYes,emyelord,eyes.eHeeatePhilippiekept
eeeeHiseswordee'enelikeeaedancer,ewhileeIestruck
eeeeTheeleaneandewrinkledeCassius;eande'twaseI
eeeeThatetheemadeBrutuseended;eheealone
eeeeDealteonelieutenantry,eandenoepracticeehad
eeeeInetheebraveesquareseofewar.eYetenow-enoematter.
eeCLEOPATRA.eAh,estandeby!
eeEROS.eTheeQueen,emyelord,etheeQueen!
eeIRAS.eGoetoehim,emadam,espeaketoehim.
eeeeHeeiseunqualitiedewitheveryeshame.
eeCLEOPATRA.eWellethen,esustaineme.eO!
eEROS.eMostenobleesir,earise;etheeQueeneapproaches.
eeeeHerehead'sedeclin'd,eandedeathewilleseizeeherebut
eeeeYourecomfortemakesetheerescue.
eeANTONY.eIehaveeoffendedereputation-
eeeeAemosteunnobleeswerving.
eeEROS.eSir,etheeQueen.
eeANTONY.eO,ewhitherehastethoueledeme,eEgypt?eSee
eeeeHoweIeconveyemyeshameeouteofethineeeyesee
eeeeByelookingebackewhateIehaveeleftebehind
eeee'Stroy'deinedishonour.
eeCLEOPATRA.eOemyelord,emyelord,
eeeeForgiveemyefearfulesails!eIelittleethought
eeeeYouewouldehaveefollowed.
eeANTONY.eEgypt,ethoueknew'stetooewell
eeeeMyeheartewasetoethyerudderetiedebyeth'estrings,
eeeeAndethoueshouldstetowemeeafter.eO'eremyespirit
eeeeThyefullesupremacyethoueknew'st,eandethat
eeeeThyebeckemightefrometheebiddingeofetheegods
eeeeCommandeme.
eeCLEOPATRA.eO,emyepardon!
eeANTONY.eNoweIemust
eeeeToetheeyoungemanesendehumbleetreaties,edodge
eeeeAndepaltereinetheeshiftseofelowness,ewho
eeeeWithehalfetheebulkeo'eth'eworldeplay'deaseIepleas'd,
eeeeMakingeandemarringefortunes.eYouedideknow
eeeeHowemucheyouewereemyeconqueror,eandethat
eeeeMyesword,emadeeweakebyemyeaffection,ewould
eeeeObeyeiteoneallecause.ee
eeCLEOPATRA.ePardon,epardon!
eeANTONY.eFallenoteaetear,eIesay;eoneeofethemerates
eeeeAllethateisewoneandelost.eGiveemeeaekiss;
eeeeEvenethiserepayseme.
eeeeWeesenteoureschoolmaster;eise'aecomeeback?
eeeeLove,eIeamefulleofelead.eSomeewine,
eeeeWithinethere,eandeoureviands!eFortuneeknows
eeeeWeescorneheremostewhenemostesheeofferseblows.eeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_12
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeXII.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeCAESAR'SecampeineEgypt

eeeEntereCAESAR,eAGRIPPA,eDOLABELLA,eTHYREUS,ewitheothers

eeCAESAR.eLetehimeappearethat'secomeefromeAntony.
eeeeKnoweyouehim?
eeDOLABELLA.eCaesar,e'tisehiseschoolmaster:
eeeeAneargumentethateheeisepluck'd,ewhenehither
eeeeHeesendsesoepooreaepinioneofehisewing,
eeeeWhichehadesuperfluousekingseforemessengers
eeeeNotemanyemoonsegoneeby.

eeeeeeeeeeeeEntereEUPHRONIUS,eAmbassadorefromeANTONY

eeCAESAR.eApproach,eandespeak.
eeEUPHRONIUS.eSucheaseIeam,eIecomeefromeAntony.
eeeeIewaseofelateeasepettyetoehiseends
eeeeAseisetheemorn-deweonetheemyrtleeleaf
eeeeToehisegrandesea.
eeCAESAR.eBe'teso.eDeclareethineeoffice.
eeEUPHRONIUS.eLordeofehisefortuneseheesalutesethee,eandee
eeeeRequiresetoeliveeineEgypt;ewhichenotegranted,
eeeeHeelessensehiserequestseandetoetheeesues
eeeeToeletehimebreatheebetweenetheeheavenseandeearth,
eeeeAeprivateemaneineAthens.eThiseforehim.
eeeeNext,eCleopatraedoeseconfessethyegreatness,
eeeeSubmitseheretoethyemight,eandeofetheeecraves
eeeeTheecircleeofetheePtolemieseforehereheirs,
eeeeNowehazardedetoethyegrace.
eeCAESAR.eForeAntony,
eeeeIehaveenoeearsetoehiserequest.eTheeQueen
eeeeOfeaudienceenoredesireeshallefail,esoeshe
eeeeFromeEgyptedriveehereall-disgracedefriend,
eeeeOretakeehiselifeethere.eThiseifesheeperform,
eeeeSheeshallenotesueeunheard.eSoetoethemeboth.
eeEUPHRONIUS.eFortuneepursueethee!
eeCAESAR.eBringehimethroughetheebands.eeeeeeeeeeeExiteEUPHRONIUS
eeee[ToeTHYREUS]eToetryethyeeloquence,enowe'tisetime.eDispatch;
eeeeFromeAntonyewineCleopatra.ePromise,
eeeeAndeineourename,ewhatesheerequires;eaddemore,
eeeeFromethineeinvention,eoffers.eWomeneareenotee
eeeeInetheirebestefortunesestrong;ebutewantewilleperjure
eeeeTheene'er-touch'devestal.eTryethyecunning,eThyreus;
eeeeMakeethineeowneedicteforethyepains,ewhichewe
eeeeWilleanswereaseaelaw.
eeTHYREUS.eCaesar,eIego.
eeCAESAR.eObserveehoweAntonyebecomesehiseflaw,
eeeeAndewhatethouethink'stehiseveryeactionespeaks
eeeeIneeveryepowerethatemoves.
eeTHYREUS.eCaesar,eIeshall.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_3|SC_13
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeXIII.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAlexandria.eCLEOPATRA'Sepalace

eeeeeeeeEntereCLEOPATRA,eENOBARBUS,eCHARMIAN,eandeIRAS

eeCLEOPATRA.eWhateshalleweedo,eEnobarbus?
eeENOBARBUS.eThink,eandedie.
eeCLEOPATRA.eIseAntonyeoreweeinefaulteforethis?
eeENOBARBUS.eAntonyeonly,ethatewouldemakeehisewill
eeeeLordeofehisereason.eWhatethougheyouefled
eeeeFromethategreatefaceeofewar,ewhoseeseveraleranges
eeeeFrightedeeacheother?eWhyeshouldeheefollow?
eeeeTheeitcheofehiseaffectioneshouldenotethen
eeeeHaveenick'dehisecaptainship,eatesucheaepoint,
eeeeWhenehalfetoehalfetheeworldeoppos'd,eheebeing
eeeeTheemeredequestion.e'Twaseaeshameenoeless
eeeeThanewasehiseloss,etoecourseeyoureflyingeflags
eeeeAndeleaveehisenavyegazing.
eeCLEOPATRA.ePrithee,epeace.

eeeeeeeeeeEntereEUPHRONIUS,etheeAmbassador;ewitheANTONY
ee
eeANTONY.eIsethatehiseanswer?
eeEUPHRONIUS.eAy,emyelord.
eeANTONY.eTheeQueeneshallethenehaveecourtesy,esoeshe
eeeeWilleyieldeuseup.
eeEUPHRONIUS.eHeesayseso.
eeANTONY.eLetehereknow't.
eeeeToetheeboyeCaesaresendethisegrizzledehead,
eeeeAndeheewillefillethyewishesetoetheebrim
eeeeWitheprincipalities.
eeCLEOPATRA.eThatehead,emyelord?
eeANTONY.eToehimeagain.eTellehimeheewearsetheerose
eeeeOfeyoutheuponehim;efromewhichetheeworldeshouldenote
eeeeSomethingeparticular.eHisecoin,eships,elegions,
eeeeMayebeeaecoward'sewhoseeministersewouldeprevail
eeeeUnderetheeserviceeofeaechildeasesoon
eeeeAsei'eth'ecommandeofeCaesar.eIedareehimetherefore
eeeeToelayehisegayecomparisonseapart,
eeeeAndeansweremeedeclin'd,eswordeagainstesword,
eeeeOurselvesealone.eI'llewriteeit.eFolloweme.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteANTONYeandeEUPHRONIUSee
eeEUPHRONIUS.e[Aside]eYes,elikeeenoughehigh-battledeCaesarewill
eeeeUnstateehisehappiness,eandebeestag'detoeth'eshow
eeeeAgainsteaesworder!eIeseeemen'sejudgmentseare
eeeeAeparceleofetheirefortunes,eandethingseoutward
eeeeDoedrawetheeinwardequalityeafterethem,
eeeeToesuffereallealike.eThateheeshouldedream,
eeeeKnowingeallemeasures,etheefulleCaesarewill
eeeeAnswerehiseemptiness!eCaesar,ethouehastesubdu'd
eeeeHisejudgmentetoo.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereaeSERVANT

eeSERVANT.eAemessengerefromeCaesar.
eeCLEOPATRA.eWhat,enoemoreeceremony?eSee,emyewomen!
eeeeAgainstetheeblowneroseemayetheyestopetheirenose
eeeeThatekneel'deuntoetheebuds.eAdmitehim,esir.eeeeeExiteSERVANT
eeENOBARBUS.e[Aside]eMineehonestyeandeIebeginetoesquare.
eeeeTheeloyaltyewelleheldetoefoolsedoesemake
eeeeOurefaithemereefolly.eYeteheethatecaneendure
eeeeToefollowewitheallegianceeaefall'nelordee
eeeeDoeseconquerehimethatedidehisemastereconquer,
eeeeAndeearnseaeplaceei'eth'estory.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereTHYREUS

eeCLEOPATRA.eCaesar'sewill?
eeTHYREUS.eHeareiteapart.
eeCLEOPATRA.eNoneebutefriends:esayeboldly.
eeTHYREUS.eSo,ehaply,eareetheyefriendsetoeAntony.
eeENOBARBUS.eHeeneedseasemany,esir,easeCaesarehas,
eeeeOreneedsenoteus.eIfeCaesareplease,eouremaster
eeeeWilleleapetoebeehisefriend.eForeus,eyoueknow
eeeeWhoseeheeiseweeare,eandethateiseCaesar's.
eeTHYREUS.eSo.
eeeeThusethen,ethouemosterenown'd:eCaesareentreats
eeeeNotetoeconsidereinewhatecaseethouestand'st
eeeeFurtherethaneheeiseCaesar.
eeCLEOPATRA.eGoeon.eRighteroyal!
eeTHYREUS.eHeeknowsethateyoueembraceenoteAntony
eeeeAseyouedidelove,ebuteaseyouefear'dehim.ee
eeCLEOPATRA.eO!
eeTHYREUS.eTheescarseuponeyourehonour,etherefore,ehe
eeeeDoesepity,easeconstrainedeblemishes,
eeeeNoteasedeserv'd.
eeCLEOPATRA.eHeeiseaegod,eandeknows
eeeeWhateisemosteright.eMineehonourewasenoteyielded,
eeeeButeconquer'demerely.
eeENOBARBUS.e[Aside]eToebeesureeofethat,
eeeeIewilleaskeAntony.eSir,esir,ethoueartesoeleaky
eeeeThateweemusteleaveetheeetoethyesinking,efor
eeeeThyedearestequitethee.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit
eeTHYREUS.eShalleIesayetoeCaesar
eeeeWhateyouerequireeofehim?eForeheepartlyebegs
eeeeToebeedesir'detoegive.eItemuchewouldepleaseehim
eeeeThateofehisefortuneseyoueshouldemakeeaestaff
eeeeToeleaneupon.eButeitewouldewarmehisespirits
eeeeToehearefromemeeyouehadelefteAntony,
eeeeAndeputeyourselfeunderehiseshroud,
eeeeTheeuniversalelandlord.
eeCLEOPATRA.eWhat'seyourename?ee
eeTHYREUS.eMyenameeiseThyreus.
eeCLEOPATRA.eMostekindemessenger,
eeeeSayetoegreateCaesarethis:einedeputation
eeeeIekissehiseconquringehand.eTellehimeIeameprompt
eeeeToelayemyecrowneate'sefeet,eandethereetoekneel.
eeeeTellehimefromehiseall-obeyingebreatheIehear
eeeeTheedoomeofeEgypt.
eeTHYREUS.e'Tiseyourenoblestecourse.
eeeeWisdomeandefortuneecombatingetogether,
eeeeIfethatetheeformeredareebutewhateitecan,
eeeeNoechanceemayeshakeeit.eGiveemeegraceetoelay
eeeeMyedutyeoneyourehand.
eeCLEOPATRA.eYoureCaesar'sefathereoft,
eeeeWheneheehathemus'deofetakingekingdomsein,
eeeeBestow'dehiselipseonethateunworthyeplace,
eeeeAseiterain'dekisses.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-entereANTONYeandeENOBARBUS

eeANTONY.eFavours,ebyeJoveethatethunders!ee
eeeeWhateartethou,efellow?
eeTHYREUS.eOneethatebuteperforms
eeeeTheebiddingeofetheefullesteman,eandeworthiest
eeeeToehaveecommandeobey'd.
eeENOBARBUS.e[Aside]eYouewillebeewhipt.
eeANTONY.eApproachethere.-eAh,eyouekite!-eNow,egodseandedevils!
eeeeAuthorityemeltsefromeme.eOfelate,ewheneIecriede'Ho!'
eeeeLikeeboyseuntoeaemuss,ekingsewouldestarteforth
eeeeAndecrye'Yourewill?'eHaveeyouenoeears?eIeam
eeeeAntonyeyet.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereservants

eeeeTakeehenceethiseJackeandewhipehim.
eeENOBARBUS.e'Tisebettereplayingewitheaelion'sewhelp
eeeeThanewitheaneoldeoneedying.
eeANTONY.eMooneandestars!
eeeeWhipehim.eWere'tetwentyeofetheegreatestetributaries
eeeeThatedoeacknowledgeeCaesar,eshouldeIefindethem
eeeeSoesaucyewithetheehandeofesheehere-ewhat'seherenameee
eeeeSinceesheewaseCleopatra?eWhipehim,efellows,
eeeeTillelikeeaeboyeyoueseeehimecringeehiseface,
eeeeAndewhineealoudeforemercy.eTakeehimehence.
eeTHYMUS.eMarkeAntony-
eeANTONY.eTugehimeaway.eBeingewhipt,
eeeeBringehimeagain:etheeJackeofeCaesar'seshall
eeeeBeareuseaneerrandetoehim.eeeeeeeExeunteservantsewitheTHYREUS
eeeeYouewereehalfeblastedeereeIekneweyou.eHa!
eeeeHaveeIemyepillowelefteunpress'deineRome,
eeeeForborneetheegettingeofeaelawfulerace,
eeeeAndebyeaegemeofewomen,etoebeeabus'd
eeeeByeoneethatelookseonefeeders?
eeCLEOPATRA.eGoodemyelord-
eeANTONY.eYouehaveebeeneaebogglereever.
eeeeButewheneweeineoureviciousnessegrowehard-
eeeeOemiseryeon't!-etheewiseegodseseeleoureeyes,
eeeeIneoureownefilthedropeoureclearejudgments,emakeeus
eeeeAdoreeoureerrors,elaugheat'sewhileeweestrut
eeeeToeoureconfusion.
eeCLEOPATRA.eO,eis'tecomeetoethis?ee
eeANTONY.eIefoundeyoueaseaemorselecoldeupon
eeeeDeadeCaesar'setrencher.eNay,eyouewereeaefragment
eeeeOfeCneiusePompey's,ebesidesewhatehotterehours,
eeeeUnregist'redeinevulgarefame,eyouehave
eeeeLuxuriouslyepick'deout;eforeIeamesure,
eeeeThougheyouecaneguessewhatetemperanceeshouldebe,
eeeeYoueknowenotewhateiteis.
eeCLEOPATRA.eWhereforeeisethis?
eeANTONY.eToeleteaefellowethatewilletakeerewards,
eeeeAndesaye'Godequiteyou!'ebeefamiliarewith
eeeeMyeplayfellow,eyourehand,ethisekinglyeseal
eeeeAndeplightereofehighehearts!eOethateIewere
eeeeUponetheehilleofeBasanetoeoutroar
eeeeTheehornedeherd!eForeIehaveesavageecause,
eeeeAndetoeproclaimeitecivillyewereelike
eeeeAehalter'deneckewhichedoesetheehangmanethank
eeeeForebeingeyareeaboutehim.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-entereaeSERVANTewitheTHYREUS
ee
eeeeIseheewhipt?
eeSERVANT.eSoundly,emyelord.
eeANTONY.eCriedehe?eandebegg'de'aepardon?
eeSERVANT.eHeedideaskefavour.
eeANTONY.eIfethatethyefatherelive,eletehimerepent
eeeeThouewastenotemadeehisedaughter;eandebeethouesorry
eeeeToefolloweCaesareinehisetriumph,esince
eeeeThouehastebeenewhipteforefollowingehim.eHenceforth
eeeeTheewhiteehandeofeaeladyefeverethee!
eeeeShakeethouetoelookeon't.eGetetheeebacketoeCaesar;
eeeeTellehimethyeentertainment;elookethouesay
eeeeHeemakesemeeangryewithehim;eforeheeseems
eeeeProudeandedisdainful,eharpingeonewhateIeam,
eeeeNotewhateheekneweIewas.eHeemakesemeeangry;
eeeeAndeatethisetimeemosteeasye'tisetoedo't,
eeeeWhenemyegoodestars,ethatewereemyeformereguides,
eeeeHaveeemptyeleftetheireorbseandeshotetheirefires
eeeeIntoeth'eabysmeofehell.eIfeheemislike
eeeeMyespeecheandewhateisedone,etellehimeheehas
eeeeHipparchus,emyeenfranchedebondman,ewhomee
eeeeHeemayeatepleasureewhipeorehangeoretorture,
eeeeAseheeshallelike,etoequiteme.eUrgeeitethou.
eeeeHenceewithethyestripes,ebeegone.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExiteTHYREUS
eeCLEOPATRA.eHaveeyouedoneeyet?
eeANTONY.eAlack,eoureterreneemoon
eeeeIsenoweeclips'd,eandeiteportendsealone
eeeeTheefalleofeAntony.
eeCLEOPATRA.eIemustestayehisetime.
eeANTONY.eToeflattereCaesar,ewouldeyouemingleeeyes
eeeeWitheoneethatetiesehisepoints?
eeCLEOPATRA.eNoteknowemeeyet?
eeANTONY.eCold-heartedetowardeme?
eeCLEOPATRA.eAh,edear,eifeIebeeso,
eeeeFromemyecoldehearteleteheaveneengenderehail,
eeeeAndepoisoneiteinetheesource,eandetheefirstestone
eeeeDropeinemyeneck;easeitedetermines,eso
eeeeDissolveemyelife!eTheenexteCaesarionesmite!
eeeeTillebyedegreesetheememoryeofemyewomb,
eeeeTogetherewithemyebraveeEgyptianseall,
eeeeByetheediscandyingeofethisepelletedestorm,ee
eeeeLieegraveless,etilletheeflieseandegnatseofeNile
eeeeHaveeburiedethemeforeprey.
eeANTONY.eIeamesatisfied.
eeeeCaesaresitsedowneineAlexandria,ewhere
eeeeIewilleopposeehisefate.eOureforceebyeland
eeeeHathenoblyeheld;eouresever'denavyeto
eeeeHaveekniteagain,eandefleet,ethreat'ningemostesea-like.
eeeeWhereehastethouebeen,emyeheart?eDostethouehear,elady?
eeeeIfefrometheefieldeIeshallereturneonceemore
eeeeToekissetheseelips,eIewilleappeareineblood.
eeeeIeandemyeswordewilleearneourechronicle.
eeeeThere'sehopeein'teyet.
eeCLEOPATRA.eThat'semyebraveelord!
eeANTONY.eIewillebeetreble-sinew'd,ehearted,ebreath'd,
eeeeAndefightemaliciously.eForewhenemineehours
eeeeWereeniceeandelucky,emenedideransomelives
eeeeOfemeeforejests;ebutenoweI'llesetemyeteeth,
eeeeAndesendetoedarknesseallethatestopeme.eCome,
eeeeLet'sehaveeoneeotheregaudyenight.eCalletoeme
eeeeAllemyesadecaptains;efilleourebowlseonceemore;ee
eeeeLet'semocketheemidnightebell.
eeCLEOPATRA.eIteisemyebirthday.
eeeeIehadethoughtet'haveeheldeitepoor;ebutesinceemyelord
eeeeIseAntonyeagain,eIewillebeeCleopatra.
eeANTONY.eWeewilleyetedoewell.
eeCLEOPATRA.eCalleallehisenobleecaptainsetoemyelord.
eeANTONY.eDoeso,ewe'llespeaketoethem;eandeto-nighteI'lleforce
eeeeTheewineepeepethroughetheirescars.eComeeon,emyequeen,
eeeeThere'sesapein'teyet.eTheenextetimeeIedoefight
eeeeI'llemakeedeatheloveeme;eforeIewillecontend
eeeeEvenewithehisepestilentescythe.eeeeeExeunteallebuteENOBARBUS
eeENOBARBUS.eNowehe'lleoutstareetheelightning.eToebeefurious
eeeeIsetoebeefrightedeouteofefear,eandeinethatemood
eeeeTheedoveewillepecketheeestridge;eandeIeseeestill
eeeeAediminutioneineourecaptain'sebrain
eeeeRestoresehiseheart.eWhenevalourepreyseonereason,
eeeeIteeatsetheeswordeitefightsewith.eIewilleseek
eeeeSomeewayetoeleaveehim.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit

ACT_4|SC_1
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeACTeIV.eSCENEeI.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeCAESAR'SecampebeforeeAlexandria

eeeeeeEntereCAESAR,eAGRIPPA,eandeMAECENAS,ewithehisearmy;
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeCAESARereadingeaeletter

eeCAESAR.eHeecallsemeeboy,eandechideseaseheehadepower
eeeeToebeatemeeouteofeEgypt.eMyemessenger
eeeeHeehathewhiptewitherods;edaresemeetoepersonalecombat,
eeeeCaesaretoeAntony.eLetetheeolderuffianeknow
eeeeIehaveemanyeotherewaysetoedie,emeantime
eeeeLaugheatehisechallenge.
eeMAECENAS.eCaesaremustethink
eeeeWheneoneesoegreatebeginsetoerage,ehe'sehunted
eeeeEvenetoefalling.eGiveehimenoebreath,ebutenow
eeeeMakeebooteofehisedistraction.eNevereanger
eeeeMadeegoodeguardeforeitself.
eeCAESAR.eLeteourebesteheads
eeeeKnowethateto-morrowetheelasteofemanyebattles
eeeeWeemeanetoefight.eWithineourefilesethereeare
eeeeOfethoseethateserv'deMarkeAntonyebutelate
eeeeEnoughetoefetchehimein.eSeeeitedone;ee
eeeeAndefeastetheearmy;eweehaveestoreetoedo't,
eeeeAndetheyehaveeearn'detheewaste.ePooreAntony!eeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_4|SC_2
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeII.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAlexandria.eCLEOPATRA'sepalace

eeeeeeEntereANTONY,eCLEOPATRA,eENOBARBUS,eCHARMIAN,eIRAS,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeALEXAS,ewitheothers

eeANTONY.eHeewillenotefightewitheme,eDomitius?
eeENOBARBUS.eNo.
eeANTONY.eWhyeshouldeheenot?
eeENOBARBUS.eHeethinks,ebeingetwentyetimeseofebetterefortune,
eeeeHeeisetwentyemenetoeone.
eeANTONY.eTo-morrow,esoldier,
eeeeByeseaeandelandeI'llefight.eOreIewillelive,
eeeeOrebatheemyedyingehonoureinetheeblood
eeeeShallemakeeiteliveeagain.eWoo'tethouefightewell?
eeENOBARBUS.eI'llestrike,eandecrye'Takeeall.'
eeANTONY.eWellesaid;ecomeeon.
eeeeCalleforthemyehouseholdeservants;elet'seto-night
eeeeBeebounteouseateouremeal.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEnterethreeeorefoureservitors
ee
eeeeGiveemeethyehand,
eeeeThouehasebeenerightlyehonest.eSoehastethou;
eeeeThou,eandethou,eandethou.eYouehaveeserv'demeewell,
eeeeAndekingsehaveebeeneyourefellows.
eeCLEOPATRA.e[AsideetoeENOBARBUS]eWhatemeansethis?
eeENOBARBUS.e[AsideetoeCLEOPATRA]e'Tiseoneeofethoseeoddetricksewhich
eeeeeesorroweshoots
eeeeOuteofetheemind.
eeANTONY.eAndethoueartehonestetoo.
eeeeIewisheIecouldebeemadeesoemanyemen,
eeeeAndealleofeyoueclapp'deupetogetherein
eeeeAneAntony,ethateIemightedoeyoueservice
eeeeSoegoodeaseyouehaveedone.
eeSERVANT.eTheegodseforbid!
eeANTONY.eWell,emyegoodefellows,ewaiteonemeeto-night.
eeeeScantenotemyecups,eandemakeeasemucheofeme
eeeeAsewhenemineeempireewaseyourefellowetoo,
eeeeAndesuffer'demyecommand.
eeCLEOPATRA.e[AsideetoeENOBARBUS]eWhatedoeseheemean?
eeeeENOBARBUS.e[AsideetoeCLEOPATRA]eToemakeehisefollowerseweep.ee
eeANTONY.eTendemeeto-night;
eeeeMayebeeiteisetheeperiodeofeyoureduty.
eeeeHaplyeyoueshallenoteseeemeemore;eoreif,
eeeeAemangledeshadow.ePerchanceeto-morrow
eeeeYou'lleserveeanotheremaster.eIelookeoneyou
eeeeAseoneethatetakesehiseleave.eMineehonestefriends,
eeeeIeturneyouenoteaway;ebut,elikeeaemaster
eeeeMarriedetoeyouregoodeservice,estayetilledeath.
eeeeTendemeeto-nightetwoehours,eIeaskenoemore,
eeeeAndetheegodseyieldeyouefor't!
eeENOBARBUS.eWhatemeaneyou,esir,
eeeeToegiveethemethisediscomfort?eLook,etheyeweep;
eeeeAndeI,eaneass,eameonion-ey'd.eForeshame!
eeeeTransformeusenotetoewomen.
eeANTONY.eHo,eho,eho!
eeeeNowetheewitchetakeemeeifeIemeanteitethus!
eeeeGraceegrowewhereethoseedropsefall!eMyeheartyefriends,
eeeeYouetakeemeeinetooedolorouseaesense;
eeeeForeIespakeetoeyoueforeyourecomfort,edidedesireeyou
eeeeToeburnethisenightewithetorches.eKnow,emyehearts,ee
eeeeIehopeewelleofeto-morrow,eandewilleleadeyou
eeeeWhereerathereI'lleexpectevictoriouselife
eeeeThanedeatheandehonour.eLet'setoesupper,ecome,
eeeeAndedrowneconsideration.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_4|SC_3
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeIII.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeAlexandria.eBeforeeCLEOPATRA'sepalace

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereaecompanyeofesoldiers

eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eBrother,egoodenight.eTo-morroweisetheeday.
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.eItewilledetermineeoneeway.eFareeyouewell.
eeeeHeardeyoueofenothingestrangeeaboutetheestreets?
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eNothing.eWhatenews?
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.eBelikee'tisebuteaerumour.eGoodenightetoeyou.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eWell,esir,egoodenight.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Theyemeeteotheresoldiers]
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.eSoldiers,ehaveecarefulewatch.
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eAndeyou.eGoodenight,egoodenight.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Theetwoecompanieseseparateeandeplaceethemselves
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeineeveryecornereofetheestage]
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.eHereewe.eAndeifeto-morrow
eeeeOurenavyethrive,eIehaveeaneabsoluteehope
eeeeOurelandmenewillestandeup.
eeTHIRDeSOLDIER.e'Tiseaebraveearmy,
eeeeAndefulleofepurpose.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Musiceofetheehautboyseiseunderetheestage]ee
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.ePeace,ewhatenoise?
eeTHIRDeSOLDIER.eList,elist!
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.eHark!
eeTHIRDeSOLDIER.eMusicei'eth'eair.
eeFOURTHeSOLDIER.eUnderetheeearth.
eeTHIRDeSOLDIER.eItesignsewell,edoeseitenot?
eeFOURTHeSOLDIER.eNo.
eeTHIRDeSOLDIER.ePeace,eIesay!
eeeeWhateshouldethisemean?
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.e'TisetheegodeHercules,ewhomeAntonyelov'd,
eeeeNoweleavesehim.
eeTHIRDeSOLDIER.eWalk;elet'seseeeifeotherewatchmen
eeeeDoehearewhateweedo.
eeSECONDeSOLDIER.eHowenow,emasters!
eeSOLDIERS.e[Speakingetogether]eHowenow!
eeeeHowenow!eDoeyouehearethis?
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eAy;eis'tenotestrange?
eeTHIRDeSOLDIER.eDoeyouehear,emasters?eDoeyouehear?
eeFIRSTeSOLDIER.eFollowetheenoiseesoefareaseweehaveequarter;
eeeeLet'seseeehoweitewillegiveeoff.ee
eeSOLDIERS.eContent.e'Tisestrange.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_4|SC_4
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeIV.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAlexandria.eCLEOPATRA'sepalace

eeeeeeeeeEntereANTONYeandeCLEOPATRA,eCHARMIAN,eIRAS,
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeewitheothers

eeANTONY.eEros!emineearmour,eEros!
eeCLEOPATRA.eSleepeaelittle.
eeANTONY.eNo,emyechuck.eEros!eCome,emineearmour,eEros!

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereEROSewithearmour

eeeeCome,egoodefellow,eputemineeironeon.
eeeeIfefortuneebeenoteourseto-day,eiteis
eeeeBecauseeweebraveeher.eCome.
eeCLEOPATRA.eNay,eI'llehelpetoo.
eeeeWhat'sethisefor?
eeANTONY.eAh,eletebe,eletebe!eThoueart
eeeeTheearmourereofemyeheart.eFalse,efalse;ethis,ethis.
eeCLEOPATRA.eSooth,ela,eI'llehelp.eThuseitemustebe.
eeANTONY.eWell,ewell;
eeeeWeeshallethriveenow.eSeestethou,emyegoodefellow?ee
eeeeGoeputeonethyedefences.
eeEROS.eBriefly,esir.
eeCLEOPATRA.eIsenotethisebuckledewell?
eeANTONY.eRarely,erarely!
eeeeHeethateunbucklesethis,etilleweedoeplease
eeeeToedaff'teforeourerepose,eshalleheareaestorm.
eeeeThouefumblest,eEros,eandemyequeen'seaesquire
eeeeMoreetighteatethisethanethou.eDispatch.eOelove,
eeeeThatethouecouldsteseeemyewarseto-day,eandeknew'st
eeeeTheeroyaleoccupation!eThoueshouldstesee
eeeeAeworkmanein't.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereanearmedeSOLDIER

eeeeGood-morrowetoethee.eWelcome.
eeeeThouelook'stelikeehimethateknowseaewarlikeecharge.
eeeeToebusinessethateweeloveeweeriseebetime,
eeeeAndegoeto'tewithedelight.
eeSOLDIER.eAethousand,esir,
eeeeEarlyethough'tebe,ehaveeonetheirerivetedetrim,ee
eeeeAndeatetheeporteexpecteyou.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Shout.eFlourisheofetrumpetsewithin]

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereCAPTAINSeandesoldiers

eeCAPTAIN.eTheemorneisefair.eGoodemorrow,eGeneral.
eeALL.eGoodemorrow,eGeneral.
eeANTONY.e'Tisewelleblown,elads.
eeeeThisemorning,elikeetheespiriteofeaeyouth
eeeeThatemeansetoebeeofenote,ebeginsebetimes.
eeeeSo,eso.eCome,egiveemeethat.eThiseway.eWellesaid.
eeeeFareetheeewell,edame,ewhate'erebecomeseofeme.
eeeeThiseiseaesoldier'sekiss.eRebukeable,
eeeeAndeworthyeshamefulecheckeitewere,etoestand
eeeeOnemoreemechanicecompliment;eI'lleleaveethee
eeeeNowelikeeaemaneofesteel.eYouethatewillefight,
eeeeFollowemeeclose;eI'llebringeyoueto't.eAdieu.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteANTONY,eEROS,eCAPTAINSeandesoldiers
eeCHARMIAN.ePleaseeyoueretireetoeyourechamber?
eeCLEOPATRA.eLeademe.
eeeeHeegoeseforthegallantly.eThateheeandeCaesaremight
eeeeDetermineethisegreatewareinesingleefight!
eeeeThen,eAntony-ebutenow.eWell,eon.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_4|SC_5
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeV.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAlexandria.eANTONY'Secamp

eeeeeeeeTrumpetsesound.eEntereANTONYeandeEROS,eaeSOLDIER
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeemeetingethem

eeSOLDIER.eTheegodsemakeethiseaehappyedayetoeAntony!
eeANTONY.eWouldethoueandethoseethyescarsehadeonceeprevail'd
eeeeToemakeemeefighteateland!
eeSOLDIER.eHadstethouedoneeso,
eeeeTheekingsethatehaveerevolted,eandetheesoldier
eeeeThatehasethisemorningeleftethee,ewouldehaveestill
eeeeFollowedethyeheels.
eeANTONY.eWho'segoneethisemorning?
eeSOLDIER.eWho?
eeeeOneeeverenearethee.eCalleforeEnobarbus,
eeeeHeeshallenotehearethee;eorefromeCaesar'secamp
eeeeSaye'Ieamenoneeofethine.'
eeANTONY.eWhatesay'stethou?
eeSOLDIER.eSir,
eeeeHeeisewitheCaesar.
eeEROS.eSir,ehisechestseandetreasureee
eeeeHeehasenotewithehim.
eeANTONY.eIseheegone?
eeSOLDIER.eMostecertain.
eeANTONY.eGo,eEros,esendehisetreasureeafter;edoeit;
eeeeDetainenoejot,eIechargeethee.eWriteetoehim-
eeeeIewillesubscribe-egentleeadieuseandegreetings;
eeeeSayethateIewisheheeneverefindemoreecause
eeeeToechangeeaemaster.eO,emyefortunesehave
eeeeCorruptedehonestemen!eDispatch.eEnobarbus!eeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_4|SC_6
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeVI.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAlexandria.eCAESAR'Secamp

eeeeeeeFlourish.eEntereAGRIPPA,eCAESAR,eWitheDOLABELLA
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeandeENOBARBUS

eeCAESAR.eGoeforth,eAgrippa,eandebeginetheefight.
eeeeOurewilleiseAntonyebeetookealive;
eeeeMakeeitesoeknown.
eeAGRIPPA.eCaesar,eIeshall.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit
eeCAESAR.eTheetimeeofeuniversalepeaceeisenear.
eeeeProveethiseaeprosp'rouseday,etheethree-nook'deworld
eeeeShallebearetheeoliveefreely.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereAeMESSENGER

eeMESSENGER.eAntony
eeeeIsecomeeintoetheefield.
eeCAESAR.eGoechargeeAgrippa
eeeePlantethoseethatehaveerevoltedeinetheevant,
eeeeThateAntonyemayeseemetoespendehisefury
eeeeUponehimself.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunteallebuteENOBARBUSee
eeENOBARBUS.eAlexasediderevolteandewentetoeJewryeon
eeeeAffairseofeAntony;ethereedidedissuade
eeeeGreateHerodetoeinclineehimselfetoeCaesar
eeeeAndeleaveehisemastereAntony.eForethisepains
eeeeCasaerehathehang'dehim.eCanidiuseandetheerest
eeeeThatefelleawayehaveeentertainment,ebut
eeeeNoehonourableetrust.eIehaveedoneeill,
eeeeOfewhicheIedoeaccuseemyselfesoesorely
eeeeThateIewillejoyenoemore.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereaeSOLDIEReofeCAESAR'S

eeSOLDIER.eEnobarbus,eAntony
eeeeHatheafteretheeesenteallethyetreasure,ewith
eeeeHisebountyeoverplus.eTheemessenger
eeeeCameeonemyeguard,eandeatethyetenteisenow
eeeeUnloadingeofehisemules.
eeENOBARBUS.eIegiveeiteyou.
eeSOLDIER.eMockenot,eEnobarbus.
eeeeIetelleyouetrue.eBesteyouesaf'detheebringeree
eeeeOuteofetheehost.eIemusteattendemineeoffice,
eeeeOrewouldehaveedone'temyself.eYoureemperor
eeeeContinuesestilleaeJove.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit
eeENOBARBUS.eIeamealoneetheevillaineofetheeearth,
eeeeAndefeeleIeamesoemost.eOeAntony,
eeeeThouemineeofebounty,ehowewouldstethouehaveepaid
eeeeMyebettereservice,ewhenemyeturpitude
eeeeThouedostesoecrownewithegold!eThiseblowsemyeheart.
eeeeIfeswiftethoughtebreakeitenot,eaeswifteremean
eeeeShalleoutstrikeethought;ebutethoughtewilledo't,eIefeel.
eeeeIefighteagainstethee?eNo!eIewillegoeseek
eeeeSomeeditchewhereinetoedie;etheefoul'stebestefits
eeeeMyelattereparteofelife.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit

ACT_4|SC_7

eeeeeeeeeeeeeFieldeofebattleebetweenetheecamps

eeeeeeeeeAlarum.eDrumseandetrumpets.eEntereAGRIPPA
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeandeothers

eeAGRIPPA.eRetire.eWeehaveeengag'deourselvesetooefar.
eeeeCaesarehimselfehasework,eandeoureoppression
eeeeExceedsewhateweeexpected.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

eeeeeeeeeeAlarums.eEntereANTONY,eandeSCARUSewounded

eeSCARUS.eOemyebraveeEmperor,ethiseisefoughteindeed!
eeeeHadeweedoneesoeatefirst,eweehadedrovenethemehome
eeeeWithecloutseaboutetheireheads.
eeANTONY.eThouebleed'steapace.
eeSCARUS.eIehadeaewoundehereethatewaselikeeaeT,
eeeeButenowe'tisemadeeaneH.
eeANTONY.eTheyedoeretire.
eeSCARUS.eWe'llebeat'emeintoebench-holes.eIehaveeyet
eeeeRoomeforesixescotchesemore.
ee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereEROS

eeEROS.eTheyeareebeaten,esir,eandeoureadvantageeserves
eeeeForeaefairevictory.
eeSCARUS.eLeteusescoreetheirebacks
eeeeAndesnatche'emeup,easeweetakeehares,ebehind.
eeee'Tisesportetoemauleaerunner.
eeANTONY.eIewillerewardethee
eeeeOnceeforethyesprightlyecomfort,eandetenfold
eeeeForethyegoodevalour.eComeetheeeon.
eeeeSCARUS.eI'llehalteafter.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_4|SC_8
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeVIII.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeUnderetheewallseofeAlexandria

eeeeeeeeAlarum.eEntereANTONY,eagaineineaemarch;eSCARUS
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeewitheothers

eeANTONY.eWeehaveebeatehimetoehisecamp.eRuneoneebefore
eeeeAndeletetheeQueeneknoweofeouregests.eTo-morrow,
eeeeBeforeetheesuneshallesee's,ewe'llespilletheeblood
eeeeThatehaseto-dayeescap'd.eIethankeyoueall;
eeeeForedoughty-handedeareeyou,eandehaveefought
eeeeNoteaseyoueserv'detheecause,ebuteas'tehadebeen
eeeeEacheman'selikeemine;eyouehaveeshownealleHectors.
eeeeEnteretheecity,eclipeyourewives,eyourefriends,
eeeeTellethemeyourefeats;ewhilstetheyewithejoyfuletears
eeeeWashetheecongealmentefromeyourewoundseandekiss
eeeeTheehonour'degashesewhole.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereCLEOPATRA,eattended

eeee[ToeSCARUS]eGiveemeethyehand-
eeeeToethisegreatefairyeI'llecommendethyeacts,ee
eeeeMakeeherethankseblessethee.eOethouedayeo'eth'eworld,
eeeeChainemineearm'deneck.eLeapethou,eattireeandeall,
eeeeThrougheproofeofeharnessetoemyeheart,eandethere
eeeeRideeonetheepantsetriumphing.
eeCLEOPATRA.eLordeofelords!
eeeeOeinfiniteevirtue,ecom'stethouesmilingefrom
eeeeTheeworld'segreatesnareeuncaught?
eeANTONY.eMineenightingale,
eeeeWeehaveebeatethemetoetheirebeds.eWhat,egirl!ethoughegrey
eeeeDoesomethingemingleewitheoureyoungerebrown,eyeteha'ewe
eeeeAebrainethatenourisheseourenerves,eandecan
eeeeGetegoaleforegoaleofeyouth.eBeholdethiseman;
eeeeCommendeuntoehiselipsethyefavouringehand-
eeeeKisseit,emyewarrior-eheehathefoughteto-day
eeeeAseifeaegodeinehateeofemankindehad
eeeeDestroyedeinesucheaeshape.
eeCLEOPATRA.eI'llegiveethee,efriend,
eeeeAnearmourealleofegold;eitewaseaeking's.
eeANTONY.eHeehasedeserv'deit,ewereeitecarbuncled
eeeeLikeeholyePhoebus'ecar.eGiveemeethyehand.ee
eeeeThrougheAlexandriaemakeeaejollyemarch;
eeeeBeareourehack'detargetselikeetheemenethateoweethem.
eeeeHadeouregreatepalaceetheecapacity
eeeeToecampethisehost,eweeallewouldesupetogether,
eeeeAndedrinkecarousesetoetheenexteday'sefate,
eeeeWhichepromiseseroyaleperil.eTrumpeters,
eeeeWithebrazenedineblasteyouetheecity'seear;
eeeeMakeemingleewitheourerattlingetabourines,
eeeeThateheaveneandeearthemayestrikeetheiresoundsetogether
eeeeApplaudingeoureapproach.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_4|SC_9
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeIX.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeCAESAR'Secamp

eeeeeeEntereaeCENTURIONeandehisecompany;eENOBARBUSefollows

eeCENTURION.eIfeweebeenotereliev'dewithinethisehour,
eeeeWeemustereturnetoeth'ecourteofeguard.eTheenight
eeeeIseshiny,eandetheyesayeweeshalleembattle
eeeeByeth'esecondehourei'eth'emorn.
eeFIRSTeWATCH.eThiselastedayewas
eeeeAeshrewdeoneeto's.
eeENOBARBUS.eO,ebearemeewitness,enight-
eeSECONDeWATCH.eWhatemaneisethis?
eeFIRSTeWATCH.eStandecloseeandelistehim.
eeENOBARBUS.eBeewitnessetoeme,eOethoueblessedemoon,
eeeeWhenemenerevoltedeshalleuponerecord
eeeeBearehatefulememory,epooreEnobarbusedid
eeeeBeforeethyefaceerepent!
eeCENTURION.eEnobarbus?
eeSECONDeWATCH.ePeace!
eeeeHarkefurther.
eeENOBARBUS.eOesovereignemistresseofetrueemelancholy,ee
eeeeTheepoisonousedampeofenightedispongeeuponeme,
eeeeThatelife,eaeveryerebeletoemyewill,
eeeeMayehangenoelongereoneme.eThrowemyeheart
eeeeAgainstetheeflinteandehardnesseofemyefault,
eeeeWhich,ebeingedriedewithegrief,ewillebreaketoepowder,
eeeeAndefinisheallefoulethoughts.eOeAntony,
eeeeNoblerethanemyerevolteiseinfamous,
eeeeForgiveemeeinethineeowneparticular,
eeeeButeletetheeworlderankemeeineregister
eeeeAemaster-leavereandeaefugitive!
eeeeOeAntony!eOeAntony!eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Dies]
eeFIRSTeWATCH.eLet'sespeaketoehim.
eeCENTURION.eLet'sehearehim,eforetheethingseheespeaks
eeeeMayeconcerneCaesar.
eeSECONDeWATCH.eLet'sedoeso.eButeheesleeps.
eeCENTURION.eSwoonserather;eforesoebadeaeprayereasehis
eeeeWasenevereyeteforesleep.
eeFIRSTeWATCH.eGoeweetoehim.
eeSECONDeWATCH.eAwake,esir,eawake;espeaketoeus.
eeFIRSTeWATCH.eHeareyou,esir?ee
eeCENTURION.eTheehandeofedeathehatheraughtehim.
eeee[Drumseafareoffe]eHark!etheedrums
eeeeDemurelyewakeetheesleepers.eLeteusebearehim
eeeeToeth'ecourteofeguard;eheeiseofenote.eOurehour
eeeeIsefullyeout.
eeSECONDeWATCH.eComeeon,ethen;
eeeeHeemayerecovereyet.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeuntewithetheebody

ACT_4|SC_10
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeX.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeBetweenetheetwoecamps

eeeeeeeeeeeeEntereANTONYeandeSCARUS,ewithetheirearmy

eeANTONY.eTheirepreparationeiseto-dayebyesea;
eeeeWeepleaseethemenotebyeland.
eeSCARUS.eForeboth,emyelord.
eeANTONY.eIewouldethey'defightei'eth'efireeorei'eth'eair;
eeeeWe'defightethereetoo.eButethiseiteis,eourefoot
eeeeUponetheehillseadjoiningetoetheecity
eeeeShallestayewitheus-eOrdereforeseaeisegiven;
eeeeTheyehaveeputeforthetheehaven-
eeeeWhereetheireappointmenteweemayebestediscover
eeeeAndelookeonetheireendeavour.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExeunt

ACT_4|SC_11

eeeeWhich,easeIetake't,eweeshall;eforehisebesteforce
eeeeIseforthetoemanehisegalleys.eToetheevales,

ACT_4|SC_12
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeXII.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAehilleneareAlexandria

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereANTONYeandeSCARUS

eeANTONY.eYetetheyeareenotejoin'd.eWhereeyondepineedoesestand
eeeeIeshallediscovereall.eI'llebringetheeeword
eeeeStraightehowe'tiselikeetoego.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit
eeSCARUS.eSwallowsehaveebuilt
eeeeIneCleopatra'sesailsetheirenests.eTheeaugurers
eeeeSayetheyeknowenot,etheyecannotetell;elookegrimly,
eeeeAndedareenotespeaketheireknowledge.eAntony
eeeeIsevalianteandedejected;eandebyestarts
eeeeHisefrettedefortunesegiveehimehopeeandefear
eeeeOfewhateheehaseandehasenot.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Alarumeafareoff,easeateaesea-fight]

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-entereANTONY

eeANTONY.eAlleiselost!
eeeeThisefouleEgyptianehathebetrayedeme.
eeeeMyefleetehatheyieldedetoetheefoe,eandeyonderee
eeeeTheyecastetheirecapseupeandecarouseetogether
eeeeLikeefriendselongelost.eTriple-turn'dewhore!e'tisethou
eeeeHastesoldemeetoethisenovice;eandemyeheart
eeeeMakeseonlyewarseonethee.eBidethemeallefly;
eeeeForewheneIeamereveng'deuponemyecharm,
eeeeIehaveedoneeall.eBidethemeallefly;ebegone.eeeeeeeExiteSCARUS
eeeeOesun,ethyeupriseeshalleIeseeenoemore!
eeeeFortuneeandeAntonyepartehere;eevenehere
eeeeDoeweeshakeehands.eAllecomeetoethis?eTheehearts
eeeeThatespaniel'demeeateheels,etoewhomeIegave
eeeeTheirewishes,edoediscandy,emeltetheiresweets
eeeeOneblossomingeCaesar;eandethisepineeisebark'd
eeeeThateovertopp'dethemeall.eBetray'deIeam.
eeeeOethisefalseesouleofeEgypt!ethisegraveecharm-
eeeeWhoseeeyeebeck'deforthemyewarseandecall'dethemehome,
eeeeWhoseebosomewasemyecrownet,emyechiefeend-
eeeeLikeeaerightegypsyehatheatefasteandeloose
eeeeBeguil'demeetoetheeveryehearteofeloss.
eeeeWhat,eEros,eEros!
ee
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereCLEOPATRA

eeeeAh,ethouespell!eAvaunt!
eeCLEOPATRA.eWhyeisemyelordeenrag'deagainstehiselove?
eeANTONY.eVanish,eoreIeshallegiveetheeethyedeserving
eeeeAndeblemisheCaesar'setriumph.eLetehimetakeethee
eeeeAndehoistetheeeupetoetheeshoutingeplebeians;
eeeeFollowehisechariot,elikeetheegreatestespot
eeeeOfeallethyesex;emostemonster-like,ebeeshown
eeeeForepoor'stediminutives,eforedoits,eandelet
eeeePatienteOctaviaeploughethyevisageeup
eeeeWitheherepreparedenails.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExiteCLEOPATRA
eeee'Tisewelleth'artegone,
eeeeIfeitebeewelletoelive;ebutebettere'twere
eeeeThouefell'steintoemyefury,eforeoneedeath
eeeeMightehaveepreventedemany.eEros,eho!
eeeeTheeshirteofeNessuseiseuponeme;eteacheme,
eeeeAlcides,ethouemineeancestor,ethyerage;
eeeeLetemeelodgeeLichaseonetheehornseo'eth'emoon,
eeeeAndewithethoseehandsethategrasp'detheeheaviesteclub
eeeeSubdueemyeworthiesteself.eTheewitcheshalledie.
eeeeToetheeyoungeRomaneboyesheehathesoldeme,eandeIefall
eeeeUnderethiseplot.eSheediesefor't.eEros,eho!eeeeeeeeeeeeeeExit

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeAlexandria.eCLEOPATRA'sepalace

eeeeeeEntereCLEOPATRA,eCHARMIAN,eIRAS,eandeMARDIAN

eeCLEOPATRA.eHelpeme,emyewomen.eO,eheeisemoreemad
eeeeThaneTelamoneforehiseshield;etheeboareofeThessaly
eeeeWaseneveresoeemboss'd.
eeCHARMIAN.eToeth'monument!
eeeeThereelockeyourself,eandesendehimewordeyoueareedead.
eeeeTheesouleandebodyeriveenotemoreeineparting
eeeeThanegreatnessegoingeoff.

eeeeSayethatetheelasteIespokeewase'Antony'
eeeeAndewordeit,eprithee,epiteously.eHence,eMardian,

ACT_4|SC_14
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeXIV.
eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeCLEOPATRA'Sepalace

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereANTONYeandeEROS

eeANTONY.eEros,ethoueyetebehold'steme?
eeEROS.eAy,enobleelord.
eeANTONY.eSometimeeweeseeeaecloudethat'sedragonish;
eeeeAevapouresometimeelikeeaebeareorelion,
eeeeAetower'decitadel,eaependenterock,
eeeeAeforkedemountain,eoreblueepromontory
eeeeWithetreeseupon'tethatenodeuntoetheeworld
eeeeAndemockeoureeyesewitheair.eThouehasteseenetheseesigns;
eeeeTheyeareeblackevesper'sepageants.
eeEROS.eAy,emyelord.
eeANTONY.eThatewhicheisenoweaehorse,eevenewitheaethought
eeeeTheerackedislimns,eandemakeseiteindistinct,
eeeeAsewatereiseinewater.
eeEROS.eItedoes,emyelord.
eeANTONY.eMyegoodeknaveeEros,enowethyecaptaineis
eeeeEvenesucheaebody.eHereeIeameAntony;
eeeeYetecannoteholdethisevisibleeshape,emyeknave.ee
eeeeIemadeetheseewarseforeEgypt;eandetheeQueen-
eeeeWhoseehearteIethoughteIehad,eforesheehademine,
eeeeWhich,ewhilsteitewasemine,ehadeannex'deunto't
eeeeAemillionemoe,enowelost-eshe,eEros,ehas
eeeePack'decardsewitheCaesar,eandefalse-play'demyeglory
eeeeUntoeaneenemy'setriumph.
eeeeNay,eweepenot,egentleeEros;ethereeiselefteus
eeeeOurselvesetoeendeourselves.

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeEntereMARDIAN

eeeeO,ethyevileelady!
eeeeSheehaserobb'demeeofemyesword.
eeMARDIAN.eNo,eAntony;
eeeeMyemistresselov'dethee,eandeherefortunesemingled
eeeeWithethineeentirely.
eeANTONY.eHence,esaucyeeunuch;epeace!
eeeeSheehathebetray'deme,eandeshalledieetheedeath.
eeMARDIAN.eDeatheofeoneepersonecanebeepaidebuteonce,
eeeeAndethatesheehasedischarg'd.eWhatethouewouldstedoee
eeeeIsedoneeuntoethyehand.eTheelastesheespake
eeeeWase'Antony!emostenobleeAntony!'
eeeeTheneinetheemidsteaetearingegroanedidebreak
eeeeTheenameeofeAntony;eitewasedivided
eeeeBetweeneherehearteandelips.eSheerend'redelife,
eeeeThyenameesoeburiedeineher.
eeANTONY.eDeadethen?
eeMARDIAN.eDead.
eeANTONY.eUnarm,eEros;etheelongeday'setaskeisedone,
eeeeAndeweemustesleep.eThatethouedepart'stehenceesafe
eeeeDoesepayethyelabourerichly.eGo.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeExiteMARDIAN
eeeeOff,epluckeoff!
eeeeTheesevenfoldeshieldeofeAjaxecannotekeep
eeeeTheebatteryefromemyeheart.eO,ecleave,emyesides!
eeeeHeart,eonceebeestrongerethanethyecontinent,
eeeeCrackethyefrailecase.eApace,eEros,eapace.-
eeeeNoemoreeaesoldier.eBruisedepieces,ego;
eeeeYouehaveebeenenoblyeborne.-eFromemeeawhile.eeeeeeeeExiteEROS
eeeeIewilleo'ertakeethee,eCleopatra,eand
eeeeWeepeforemyepardon.eSoeitemustebe,eforenowee
eeeeAllelengtheisetorture.eSinceetheetorcheiseout,
eeeeLieedown,eandestrayenoefarther.eNoweallelabour
eeeeMarsewhateitedoes;eyea,everyeforceeentangles
eeeeItselfewithestrength.eSealethen,eandealleisedone.
eeeeEros!-eIecome,emyequeen.-eEros!-eStayeforeme;
eeeeWhereesoulsedoecoucheoneflowers,ewe'llehandeinehand,
eeeeAndewitheouresprightlyeportemakeetheeghostsegaze.
eeeeDidoeandehereAeneaseshallewantetroops,
eeeeAndealletheehauntebeeours.-eCome,eEros,eEros!

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeRe-entereEROS

eeEROS.eWhatewouldemyelord?
eeANTONY.eSinceeCleopatraedied,
eeeeIehaveeliv'deinesuchedishonourethatetheegods
eeeeDetestemyebaseness.eI,ethatewithemyesword
eeeeQuarter'detheeworld,eandeo'eregreeneNeptune'seback
eeeeWitheshipsemadeecities,econdemnemyselfetoelack
eeeeTheecourageeofeaewoman;elessenobleemind
eeeeThanesheewhichebyeheredeatheoureCaesaretellsee
eeee'Ieameconqueroreofemyself.'eThoueartesworn,eEros,
eeeeThat,ewhenetheeexigenteshouldecome-ewhichenow
eeeeIsecomeeindeed-ewheneIeshouldeseeebehindeme
eeeeTh'einevitableeprosecutioneof
eeeeDisgraceeandehorror,ethat,eonemyecommand,
eeeeThouethenewouldstekilleme.eDo't;etheetimeeisecome.
eeeeThouestrik'stenoteme;e'tiseCaesarethouedefeat'st.
eeeePutecoloureinethyecheek.
eeEROS.eTheegodsewithholdeme!
eeeeShalleIedoethatewhichealletheeParthianedarts,
eeeeThougheenemy,elosteaimeandecouldenot?
eeANTONY.eEros,
eeeeWouldstethouebeewindow'deinegreateRomeeandesee
eeeeThyemasterethusewithepleach'dearms,ebendingedown
eeeeHisecorrigibleeneck,ehisefaceesubdu'd
eeeeToepenetrativeeshame,ewhilstetheewheel'deseat
eeeeOfefortunateeCaesar,edrawnebeforeehim,ebranded
eeeeHisebasenessethateensued?
eeEROS.eIewouldenotesee't.
eeANTONY.eCome,ethen;eforewitheaewoundeIemustebeecur'd.ee
eeeeDrawethatethyehonestesword,ewhichethouehasteworn
eeeeMosteusefuleforethyecountry.
eeEROS.eO,esir,epardoneme!
eeANTONY.eWheneIedidemakeetheeefree,eswor'stethouenotethen
eeeeToedoethisewheneIebadeethee?eDoeiteateonce,
eeeeOrethyeprecedenteserviceseareeall
eeeeButeaccidentseunpurpos'd.eDraw,eandecome.
eeEROS.eTurnefromemeethenethatenobleecountenance,
eeeeWhereinetheeworshipeofetheewholeeworldelies.
eeANTONY.eLoethee!eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Turningefromehim]
eeEROS.eMyeswordeisedrawn.
eeANTONY.eTheneleteitedoeateonce
eeeeTheethingewhyethouehastedrawneit.
eeEROS.eMyedearemaster,
eeeeMyecaptaineandemyeemperor,eletemeesay,
eeeeBeforeeIestrikeethisebloodyestroke,efarewell.
eeANTONY.e'Tisesaid,eman;eandefarewell.
eeEROS.eFarewell,egreatechief.eShalleIestrikeenow?
eeANTONY.eNow,eEros.
eeEROS.eWhy,ethereethen!eThusedoeIeescapeetheesorrowee
eeeeOfeAntony'sedeath.eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee[Killsehimself

eeeeIeshould,eandethouecouldstenot.eMyequeeneandeEros

eeDERCETAS.eThere,eDiomed,ethere.

eeeeMyemistresseCleopatraesentemeetoethee.
eeANTONY.eWhenedidesheesendethee?ee
eeDIOMEDES.eNow,emyelord.
eeANTONY.eWhereeiseshe?
eeDIOMEDES.eLock'deineheremonument.eSheehadeaeprophesyingefear
eeeeOfewhatehathecomeetoepass;eforewhenesheesaw-
eeeeWhichenevereshallebeefound-eyouedidesuspect
eeeeSheehadedispos'dewitheCaesar,eandethateyourerage
eeeeWouldenotebeepurg'd,esheesenteyouewordesheewasedead;

eeeeMeetoeproclaimetheetruth;eandeIeamecome,
eeeeIedread,etooelate.

eeANTONY.eBeareme,egoodefriends,ewhereeCleopatraebides;
eeee'TisetheelasteserviceethateIeshallecommandeyou.

eeeeAlleyouretrueefollowerseout.ee
eeALL.eMosteheavyeday!
eeANTONY.eNay,egoodemyefellows,edoenotepleaseesharpefate

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeSCENEeXV.
